0831180509000002--.name: Hi, $OwnerName$, what can I do for you?

0831180509000003--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000004--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000006--.name: Today is quite wonderful, isn't it?

0831180509000007--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000008--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000011--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000012--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000014--.name: I'm glad I can spend time with you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000015--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000016--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000018--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000019--.name: I know I'm not perfect, but I always do my best for you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000020--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000021--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000023--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000024--.name: $OwnerName$, welcome back! I've been waiting for you.

0831180509000025--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000026--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000028--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000029--.name: Are you giving me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000030--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509000032--.name: Time flies, but maybe that's just because I'm spending it with you, $OwnerName$!

0831180509000033--.name: You're the best boss a person could ever ask for. Thank you, $OwnerName$!

0831180509000034--.name: I know things have been tough, $OwnerName$, and I've been worried, too, but thank you for deciding to keep me in your service!

0831180509000035--.name: I wasn't sure I'd be able to stay with you... But this means I can, right? Yay!

0831180509000036--.name: Did you know that your contract with me is about to expire, $OwnerName$? You've been so busy. I completely understand.

0831180509000037--.name: Reminding you about your schedule is also part of my job!

0831180509000038--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000039--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000041--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000042--.name: Oh, do you have something to tell me?

0831180509000043--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000044--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000046--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000047--.name: Is there something you wish to tell me?

0831180509000048--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000049--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000051--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000052--.name: Did you want to talk to me?

0831180509000053--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000054--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000056--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000057--.name: You don't have to pay me this much! I don't want to be a burden. Cheer up, $OwnerName$! I'll be rooting for you!

0831180509000058--.name: Mm, what is this? My paycheck? Oh, $OwnerName$, you already paid me for this month. I didn't know you could be so forgetful, hehe.

0831180509000059--.name: Oh... $OwnerName$... Are you having a hard time lately? Does... Does this mean I can't stay with you any more, $OwnerName$?

0831180509000060--.name: I don't know what to do... Ah, $OwnerName$. Please give me a moment. Yikes, now where did I leave the handbook I got from Helping Hands?

0831180509000061--.name: I don't have money for living expenses. It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid...

0831180509000062--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000063--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000065--.name: Mm... Does this mean I can't stay with you any more, $OwnerName$?

0831180509000066--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000067--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000069--.name: This difficult time will pass. It has to, right?

0831180509000070--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000071--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000073--.name: Um, $OwnerName$...? This might not be the best time, but I just got a call from Helping Hands. My contract with you is up...

0831180509000074--.name: Ah, $OwnerName$, that's not important right now. I got a phone call from my coordinator at Helping Hands. She said our contract has expired.

0831180509000076--.name: I know this is harder for you than it is for me, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000077--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000078--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000080--.name: $OwnerName$... What's going to happen to me now?

0831180509000081--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000082--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000084--.name: $OwnerName$, are you having a hard time these days? Stay strong. I will, too! I'll be counting on you! We c-can get through this... Together!

0831180509000085--.name: $OwnerName$, don't you want me here anymore? Please don't do this! I know things have been tough, but... I'm sorry.

0831180509000086--.name: $OwnerName$, I didn't mean to be a burden to you. I thought I was doing my best to be helpful. Maybe I didn't try hard enough...

0831180509000087--.name: I can't say I'm a good cook, but I'm really good with beads!

0831180509000088--.name: If you want a necklace, just let me know!

0831180509000089--.name: Is there anything else you want to know about me?

0831180509000090--.name: Is there... Is there something you want to tell me? Oh I don't know, something... romantic, maybe?

0831180509000091--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000092--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000094--.name: $OwnerName$... I want to stay with you for as long as I can.

0831180509000095--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000096--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000098--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000099--.name: Oh, do you have something to tell me?

0831180509000104--.name: Is there something you wish to tell me?

0831180509000109--.name: Did you want to talk to me?

0831180509000114--.name: Oh, do you have something to tell me?

0831180509000115--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000116--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000118--.name: Is there something you wish to tell me?

0831180509000119--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000120--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000122--.name: Did you want to talk to me?

0831180509000123--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000124--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000126--.name: Oh, yes! I've got something to tell you.

0831180509000127--.name: I was in the mood to cook, so I made this for you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000128--.name: I may have accidentally used salt instead of sugar, but it tasted okay to me! How do you like it?

0831180509000131--.name: Really? I guess I'm not such a good cook after all. Don't eat any more of it. I'll eat it. As punishment.

0831180509000132--.name: Huh? It is? I'm so sorry! But you didn't have to say it so rudely... Excuse me. I'd like to be alone for a moment.

0831180509000133--.name: I knew you'd like it! Hmm, should I make it again for you tomorrow?

0831180509000134--.name: Right? Hehe. I might not be good at much, but I'm great at cooking!

0831180509000136--.name: I thought you might be hungry, so I bought snacks! Want to eat them with me? No, actually... I'll just watch you eat.

0831180509000137--.name: I've gained a few pounds since starting this job. Probably because I'm so happy! But I should probably cut down on the snacks.

0831180509000139--.name: Yeah, you could stand to lose a few...

0831180509000140--.name: Are... are you calling me fat, $OwnerName$? How rude!

0831180509000141--.name: Is that so... Well, I was going to tell you something important, but whoops, I forgot what it was. Too bad.

0831180509000142--.name: You... you think so? You think I look great? Wow! Hehehe. Thanks!

0831180509000143--.name: Really? Hehe, in that case, I'll take a nibble... or two... or three... You know what, just give me that whole piece over there! Hehe!

0831180509000144--.name: You're so busy all the time! You need to take better care of yourself! Here, I made this nutritious drink just for you!

0831180509000145--.name: It contains $npc:21000052$ claws, $npc:21000023$ droppings, $npc:21000074$, and tons of other goodies that are great for your health. Drink up!

0831180509000148--.name: What?! Why?? Do you know tough it was to get those ingredients? I almost died in $map:2000174$! Aagh!

0831180509000149--.name: No way... I stayed up three days straight to brew that for you, $OwnerName$... No, I can't give up. I'll make you another one! This is for the good of your health, $OwnerName$!

0831180509000150--.name: How do you feel? Amazing, huh? I witch I met in $map:2000006$ was right! I'll make you some more!

0831180509000151--.name: Huh. The witch said this would instantly make you as strong as $npc:23090005[gender:0]$! Did she lie to me? I'll make her pay!

0831180509000152--.name: $OwnerName$, I cooked this for you. It's a specialty from my hometown. It was my favorite when I was little! I hope you like it.

0831180509000153--.name: So... what do you think? You... like it, right?

0831180509000156--.name: Too rugged and low brow for you, isn't it? You don't have to eat it. I'll put in the fridge and eat it when you're not home.

0831180509000157--.name: Oh. Okay. Sorry, $OwnerName$. I should've made something I knew you liked, instead of something that was special only to me.

0831180509000158--.name: Yay! I'm glad you like it.

0831180509000159--.name: Whew, I was worried for nothing. Let's eat some more... together! Heehee.

0831180509000160--.name: I found this while cleaning the house today. I thought I should ask you before throwing it out.

0831180509000161--.name: Did you drop this hairpin? It is yours... isn't it?

0831180509000163--.name: Never seen it before. Nooo idea whose it could be...

0831180509000164--.name: Huh? It's not yours. But it's not mine either. Then whose is it?

0831180509000165--.name: How strange! You and I are the only ones who live here. If it's not yours, then... No, no... It can't be...

0831180509000166--.name: I knew it belonged to you, $OwnerName$! We're the only one who live here. If it's not mine, then it has to be yours! That's domestic bliss, hehe.

0831180509000167--.name: I'm so glad I found it for you. So helpful, right? Hehe.

0831180509000168--.name: I found this chair when I was grocery shopping in $map:2000001$ today! Heehee! Lucky, right? Oh, no... but what if it belongs to someone?

0831180509000169--.name: What if they're looking for it right now? What if they're worried and sad?

0831180509000170--.name: Why are you bringing trash into my house?

0831180509000171--.name: I don't think anyone's sad about this chair.

0831180509000172--.name: Trash? This chair is in excellent used condition! But fine. Your house, your rules. I won't do it again. I'm sorry.

0831180509000173--.name: I lugged it all the way here because we need a chair! How can you call it trash? Even you have to admit it matches the decor perfectly... Hmph.

0831180509000174--.name: You mean someone threw away such a nice chair on purpose? You're trying to tell me in a nice way that I picked up someone else's garbage, aren't you?

0831180509000175--.name: Their loss, our gain! Sheesh, the people here must think money grows on trees!

0831180509000176--.name: The weather was so nice today! Perfect for laundry! But guess what I found in your clothes...

0831180509000178--.name: Did you remember to use fabric softener?

0831180509000180--.name: Fabric what? From where I come from, people wash their clothes in the stream and dry the under the sun. Oh, dear. Being a servant is tougher than I expected.

0831180509000181--.name: F-Fabric softener? Mm, just one second. Now where did I leave my Helping Hands servent guidebook?

0831180509000182--.name: Heehee, you're welcome, $OwnerName$! I'm forgetful, too. Once, I put my glasses in the washing machine!

0831180509000183--.name: I knew it! Heehee, I'd better check your clothes more thoroughly before I wash them!

0831180509000184--.name: La, la, la... La, la, la...

0831180509000185--.name: When you leave me alone here all day, it gets a little lonely, so I sing to cheer myself up, heehee.

0831180509000186--.name: You should stop. You'll scare the furniture.

0831180509000188--.name: Oh! Sorry... I'll never sing around you ever again. Sniff.

0831180509000189--.name: $OwnerName$, why are you so mean? You could word it a little more nicely. "Scare the furniture." Hmph.

0831180509000190--.name: You really think so? Heehee. Thanks, $OwnerName$! Maybe I'll sing for you one day. No, no. I'm much too shy.

0831180509000191--.name: Oh, stop. You're making me blush! Heehee.

0831180509000192--.name: Not a thing! Don't worry. I'll hold down the fort when you're away!

0831180509000193--.name: Huh? My hair looks funny? Well, you know how an iron smooths wrinkles out of clothes? I wanted to do the same thing for my hair.

0831180509000194--.name: Maybe I set the temperature too high. I'll keep trying until I get it right.

0831180509000195--.name: Nothing much. Oh! I almost forgot! A group of masked people barged in, asking if I was alone.

0831180509000196--.name: I told them you're always by my side, because, you know, I always hold you close to my heart. Anyway, they couldn't leave fast enough. Heehee.

0831180509000197--.name: Not a single thing, besides the fact that you were gone for way too long, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000198--.name: I'm okay. If I get bored, I can invite people over for a party or borrow your stuff and play outside.

0831180509000199--.name: Hmmm, I might head to $map:2000235$ for a picnic tomorrow. I love the $item:20000093$ that's sold there! I'll bring some home for you, okay?

0831180509000200--.name: It's so different here than Cadimia Island, my home. So many people and things I've never seen before!

0831180509000201--.name: Someday I'll tell you all about Cadimia Island, heehee.

0831180509000202--.name: But $OwnerName$, when you're home with me, you can show your true feelings. I know you can't really be as happy as you always pretend.

0831180509000203--.name: I spend a lot of time thinking about how to better serve you. You've been so kind, even though I've made a lot of mistakes.

0831180509000204--.name: $OwnerName$, don't forget I'm here for you!

0831180509000205--.name: Let me be your cheerleader today, for luck! Just don't blame me if anything bad happens, heehee.

0831180509000206--.name: I'm always in tip top shape, and it's thanks to you, $OwnerName$! I'll do my best for you today!

0831180509000207--.name: Ever since you told me to stop putting dishes in the laundry machine, I haven't dared to use it. But can I make an exception for this sword? It's really rusty and could use a good washing!

0831180509000208--.name: Before I became a servant, I lived on Cadimia Island. It's pretty tiny, most people have never even heard of it.

0831180509000209--.name: It was just me and gramps, living happily amongst the friendly island critters, trees, grass, and insects. I'm so far now and miss each and every one terribly.

0831180509000210--.name: Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$ used to drop by the island to tell us news of the outside world. It's been years since I've seen him. I wonder how he's doing...

0831180509000211--.name: You want to know how I became an assistant? Well, after gramps passed away, I lived alone for a while. One day, Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$ visited.

0831180509000212--.name: He said I needed to see more of the world, meet new people, and try new things.

0831180509000213--.name: At first, I was terrified. I had never left the island in my life. But I thought of gramps, and that gave me courage.

0831180509000214--.name: After I arrived on Victoria Island, I wasn't quite sure what to do, but I stumbled upon Helping Hands and learned how to work as an assistant. Now here I am, taking care of your home!

0831180509000215--.name: Come to think of it, if it weren't for Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$, I would've never met you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000216--.name: You're curious if I miss gramps? Well, sure. I mean, of course I do.

0831180509000217--.name: But I'm all right. He's been gone a long time, and he'd want me to remember the good times, not mope around being sad, you know?

0831180509000218--.name: Sometimes, I really miss him a lot. But life is full of hello's and goodbye's. Speaking of which, I want to create lots of great memories with you while I can, $OwnerName$!

0831180509000219--.name: Mm, I don't mind talking about myself, but I'd love to hear your story too, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000220--.name: $OwnerName$, what kind of food do you like?...Huh? You want to know my favorite food? Mmm, I like seafood.

0831180509000221--.name: $OwnerName$, what kind of animals do you like? ...Huh? You want me to answer first? I like all animals. I couldn't possibly pick a favorite.

0831180509000222--.name: $OwnerName$, what's your favorite color? ...Oh, of course you want me to answer first. Hmmm, I like blue, like the ocean.

0831180509000223--.name: Hmph, this was a waste of time! I wanted to learn more about you, but I ended up talking about me! Heehee, I still like talking to you, though.

0831180509000224--.name: Hello. Are you here to visit master?

0831180509000228--.name: Then you must know master well. Please have a seat.

0831180509000229--.name: I see. Please make yourself comfortable. But to be clear, I belong to master and am nobody else's assistant. Thank you.

0831180509000230--.name: Then why are you here? It's not nice to just barge into people's houses, you know.

0831180509000231--.name: If you have no business here, I must ask you to leave.

0831180509000232--.name: Shouldn't you tell me who you are first? Master would be jealous if I gave you too much attention... I hope.

0831180509000233--.name: My name is $MaidName$, and I'm an assistant of this household. How may I help you?

0831180509000236--.name: May I ask who you are?

0831180509000241--.name: Whew... What should I do next?

0831180509000248--.name: Eww, how did this get here?

0831180509000252--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000253--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000255--.name: Is there anything I can help you with?

0831180509000256--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000257--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000260--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000261--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000264--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000265--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000267--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000268--.name: Is there anything I can help you with?

0831180509000269--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000270--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000272--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000274--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000275--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000277--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000278--.name: Are you giving me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000279--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509000281--.name: Thank you for hiring me for another month. You won't regret it.

0831180509000282--.name: Thank you for paying me on time, $OwnerName$. My bosses at Helping Hands just can't stop talking about how wonderful you are.

0831180509000283--.name: I thought you'd forgotten about me. You were late, but you made it before I had no choice but to leave. Now, would you like a cup of tea?

0831180509000284--.name: Thank you for not disappointing me $OwnerName$. It is my pleasure to stay under your employment.

0831180509000285--.name: Just so you are aware, it is almost payday.

0831180509000286--.name: I hope you haven't forgotten about it.

0831180509000287--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000288--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000290--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000291--.name: Sure, $OwnerName$. I always enjoy talking to you.

0831180509000292--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000293--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000295--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000296--.name: Sometimes, I feel quite close to you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000297--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000298--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000300--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000302--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000303--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000305--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000306--.name: If you can't afford to pay me yet, I can wait. But please understand that Helping Hands has a no pay, no work policy.

0831180509000307--.name: You've already paid me this month. You must be a little stressed out.

0831180509000308--.name: I have to follow company policy. I can't work until you pay me. I'm sorry.

0831180509000309--.name: I have an unusual migraine. Please try talking to me again later.

0831180509000310--.name: It's a violation of company policy to work without being paid on time.

0831180509000311--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000312--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000314--.name: You are already $MaidPassedDay$ late on my paycheck.

0831180509000315--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000316--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000318--.name: I understand that you're having financial difficulties, $OwnerName$, but I'm afraid I can't offer you any more leeway.

0831180509000319--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000320--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000322--.name: Apologies. Company policy prohibits me from working under an expired contract.

0831180509000323--.name: $OwnerName$, shouldn't we be talking how you're $MaidPassedDay$ overdue on my paycheck instead?

0831180509000324--.name: I don't really have much to say.

0831180509000326--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000327--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000330--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000331--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000333--.name: You're $MaidPassedDay$ behind on my paycheck. I know we're friends, but policy is policy.

0831180509000334--.name: You may think my mind is always on business, but you're $MaidPassedDay$ overdue on paying me, and I have bills, too...

0831180509000335--.name: I never thought you'd be like this, $OwnerName$. A contract is a promise between two parties. You seemed like someone who would keep $male:his,female:her$ word.

0831180509000336--.name: Would you like me to craft you a ring?

0831180509000337--.name: Feel free to discuss rings with me whenever you like.

0831180509000338--.name: Ah, you must wish to learn more about me.

0831180509000339--.name: But I just don't feel comfortable going into too much detail about myself...

0831180509000340--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000341--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000343--.name: But I just don't feel comfortable going into too much detail about myself...

0831180509000344--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000345--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000347--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000348--.name: You look happy today. What did you want to talk about?

0831180509000350--.name: May I have a cup of tea?

0831180509000351--.name: Let's talk for a bit, me and you.

0831180509000353--.name: Oh? You have something you'd like to talk to me about?

0831180509000355--.name: May I have a cup of tea?

0831180509000356--.name: Let's talk for a bit, me and you.

0831180509000358--.name: I'm not much of a talker, but as you wish.

0831180509000360--.name: May I have a cup of tea?

0831180509000361--.name: Let's talk for a bit, me and you.

0831180509000363--.name: Sure, $OwnerName$. I always enjoy talking to you.

0831180509000364--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000365--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000367--.name: Sometimes, I feel quite close to you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000368--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000369--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000372--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000373--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000375--.name: While nothing particularly interesting occurred today, I try to appreciate every single day that passes. Once it's gone, you can never get it back.

0831180509000376--.name: When you take time to be grateful, the world around you changes. The flowers you see, the sky above your head, even the bus that stops by the house at the same time each day, all of those become special. In the end, you realize that no two days are ever the same.

0831180509000377--.name: For example, today, right now, I'm talking to you, $OwnerName$, and that makes this moment special. Every moment we share is special.

0831180509000380--.name: I apologize. I should be working, not spouting philosophy. If you'll excuse me...

0831180509000381--.name: You may think it's corny, but there are many books that go into great depth about this topic. But perhaps I should keep my thoughts to myself.

0831180509000382--.name: I knew you would, $OwnerName$. Some may think what I said is corny, but I knew you would understand.

0831180509000383--.name: Take a deep breath. Ahhh. See? Even the air is more invigorating when you take a moment to treasure it. Thank you for chatting with me about this, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000384--.name: I was gardening today, when a grubby little dog showed up and started running around.

0831180509000385--.name: He came up to me, wagging his tail as if he wanted to play. I was elbows deep in weeds, so I wasn't sure what to do.

0831180509000386--.name: You let a filthy dog into my garden?!

0831180509000387--.name: Awww, did you play with him? And feed him?

0831180509000388--.name: Ah, I sent him away, as gently as I could, and wiped away all his paw prints. That's all.

0831180509000389--.name: I didn't "let" him, he jumped the fence. It was no big deal. He didn't mess up your flowers or anything.

0831180509000390--.name: He was such a cute little thing. I couldn't scold him. He was so cute, you wouldn't have been able to either, $OwnerName$.

0831180509000391--.name: I did. In fact, I probably should've asked permission before I did this, but...

0831180509000392--.name: I also gave him a much-needed bath. He was such a cute little guy. I hope he comes back.

0831180509000393--.name: I knew you'd say that, $OwnerName$. You're just like me.

0831180509000394--.name: I not only fed him and played with him, I also gave him a bath and brushed his fur. Then he settled down for a nice long nap at my side while I finished with the garden.

0831180509000395--.name: I had a terrible day, $OwnerName$. Are you ready to hear my horrific story?

0831180509000396--.name: I was ironing your clothes, and for some reason, I just couldn't get the seams perfect! I tried over and over and over. Seams are one of my specialties, you know.

0831180509000397--.name: I was so frustrated! I tried ironing my own clothes, starting with the one I'm wearing now.

0831180509000398--.name: And wouldn't you know, it turned out perfectly! So I went back to ironing yours, and I just couldn't do it. Ugh...

0831180509000399--.name: To conclude, none of your clothes have been ironed. What a nightmare.

0831180509000400--.name: Hey, at least your shirt looks good.

0831180509000401--.name: Wait, so I don't have any ironed clothes to wear tomorrow?

0831180509000402--.name: That's correct. I'm so, so sorry. I feel absolutely horrible.

0831180509000403--.name: I have no excuse. I will stay up all through the night to attempt to get at least one outfit wrinkle-free for you to wear tomorrow.

0831180509000404--.name: I'm so sorry, I know I've completely ruined your— Excuse me? Did you just compliment me? Heh, I guess my shirt does look pretty good, doesn't it?

0831180509000405--.name: $OwnerName$, you are an amazing person. I am honored to work for you. Let me try ironing your clothes one more time. I think I can do it this time!

0831180509000406--.name: Oh! Um. Heh. T-thank you. A servant should look presentable and sharp at all times. See this edge here? I'm normally so good at getting the seams to an extra sharp point!

0831180509000407--.name: I feel inspired and motivated now. I will collect my ironing kit and try ironing your clothes again. Thank you for the compliment.

0831180509000408--.name: A-ah! W-what? N-nothing! Nothing happened today! N-n-nothing!

0831180509000409--.name: Ahhh, how do you always know when I'm trying to hide something, $OwnerName$?

0831180509000410--.name: Here, take a look at this paper. It says, "Your soul mate is lurking nearby. Expect an unexpected kiss at an unexpected place."

0831180509000411--.name: I got it from a fortune cookie sample at the grocery store.

0831180509000412--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He takes back the paper and daintily places it in his inner pocket.)</font>
I told you it was nothing.

0831180509000413--.name: You're not taking a fortune cookie seriously, are you?

0831180509000415--.name: Who says I'm taking it seriously? You asked if anything interesting happened. I answered. Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go mend your socks.

0831180509000416--.name: Of course not. Do you take me for an idiot? For the record, I've always carried I pack of mints on me. I didn't just start today.

0831180509000417--.name: Wh-what? No! It's not... I'm not... Ahem. Let's not talk about this anymore.

0831180509000418--.name: You've got it all wrong, $OwnerName$. It's just a silly fortune. I'm not stupid enough to get all excited over it.

0831180509000419--.name:
Now if you'll excuse me, I believe I hear the kettle. Your tea is almost ready. Ahem.
<font color="#909090">(He walks away, blushing hard.)</font>

0831180509000420--.name: Ah, today was just an ordinary day. Nothing to report, really.

0831180509000422--.name: Ah, I see. Some days pass by so peacefully. Perhaps it's days like this that make us truly happy.

0831180509000423--.name: The most notable event of the day is you talking to me, $OwnerName$. Other than that, I've just been listening to the birds chirping.

0831180509000424--.name: On days like this, I like to relax with a nice cup of tea.

0831180509000425--.name: In fact, that's just what you should do. Nothing like a sunny afternoon sipping a cup of tea. Just give me a moment to prepare it...

0831180509000426--.name: There you go. How do you like it? It's Royal Blend with a touch of cream, perfect for an afternoon as beautiful as this one. I'll leave you to enjoy your tea in peace.

0831180509000427--.name: I recently purchases an amazing Earl Grey tea. How about I treat you to a cup, $OwnerName$? Just give me a moment, and you'll have the best tea you've ever tasted in your life.

0831180509000428--.name: Here you go. My favorite Earl Grey blend. Do you taste the bergamot flavor? Magnificent! Do you like it?

0831180509000429--.name: I knew you would like it. The secret to brewing the perfect cup of tea is whispering for it to be delicious as you prepare it, and that's just what I did today.

0831180509000430--.name: Apologies, but I can't join you for tea at the moment. There are some items that require my immediate attention. Perhaps later.

0831180509000431--.name: Oh, would you like coffee instead of tea today? I will prepare your favorite latte, then.

0831180509000432--.name: I've carefully brewed the espresso and added fresh milk. I hope you like it. Oh, no, you don't need to save any for me. I don't drink coffee.

0831180509000433--.name: You want to know about my home? Hmm, I don't usually talk about myself. Let's see...

0831180509000434--.name: I come from a beautiful little place right by the sea, near a sharp cliff. It's cold and windy there, but the people are kind and love to sing.

0831180509000435--.name: I've been drinking tea since before I could walk.  It reminds me of home. Oh, don't worry. I'm content with my life here. I just like to reminisce sometimes.

0831180509000436--.name: You want to know my favorite hand cream? You're aware I wear gloves, aren't you? Even if I didn't, scented creams would disrupt the delicate glean of teacups and plates. It would ruin the entire tea-drinking experience.

0831180509000437--.name: When I go out out, however, I have been known to dab on a small amount of light lavender or verbena scented lotion.

0831180509000439--.name: Curiosity is a powerful thing. It cultivates knowledge! It is the foundation of human civilization! Perhaps you're curious about the linen towel draped over my arm?

0831180509000440--.name: Linen towels are essential for a servant. When a spot of tea drips from a spout, the linen towel comes to the rescue. When an errant crumb falls from a cracker, the linen towel brushes it away.

0831180509000441--.name: The most important rule is to use fresh towels every hour, pristine and crisply folded. If dirtied, it is perfectly acceptable to replace the towel more often than that.

0831180509000442--.name: The linen towel has become an icon of cleanliness, professionalism, comfort, and bliss.

0831180509000443--.name: Ah, what a wonderful day. The dishes were washed to a sparkle! My heart fluttered watching the laundry fluttering in the breeze!

0831180509000444--.name: The tea I poured reminded me of someone I knew, and the water I squeezed the linen towel felt like the melody of her voice.

0831180509000445--.name: She was a childhood friend. I still remember how she held onto her wide-brimmed hat against the breeze atop that cliff, how the skirt of her white dress caressed her legs.

0831180509000446--.name: ...What am I talking about? I apologize, $OwnerName$. I've grown too comfortable around you. I never meant to share such a private memory.

0831180509000447--.name: Please forget what I just told you. I suppose even I get sentimental sometimes.

0831180509000448--.name: Hello. I don't think I've seen you before. How may I help you?

0831180509000449--.name: I'm here to see your master.

0831180509000451--.name: Hey, do I smell tea? It smells good!

0831180509000452--.name: Ah. Any friend of $OwnerName$ is an important guest. Please, make yourself comfortable.

0831180509000453--.name: Ah, please make yourself at home. Let me know if I can help you with anything.

0831180509000454--.name: Then why are you here? This property belongs to $OwnerName$. You, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, are trespassing!

0831180509000455--.name: Excuse me? Then you've come into this home uninvited? I'll be watching you. One wrong move, and I'm calling the authorities.

0831180509000456--.name: Why, yes! I'm brewing my favorite blend of Earl Grey. Would you like a cup?

0831180509000457--.name: It does, doesn't it? Such fine tea can be recognized by scent alone. I just brewed my last scoop of English Breakfast tea. I don't know when I'll be able to get tea that fine again.

0831180509000458--.name: I need to get to work. I wonder where $OwnerName$ is?

0831180509000459--.name: I will give this next task my all.

0831180509000461--.name: May I ask who you're looking for?

0831180509000464--.name: It disappoints me when people don't keep their promises.

0831180509000465--.name: Rules are meant to be followed.

0831180509000466--.name: Hmm, the distinctive bitterness of Earl Grey becomes more prominent when sipped without a squeeze of lemon.

0831180509000467--.name: Oh, dear! I speck of dust on my shoe? I must polish it before anyone else notices!

0831180509000468--.name: I wonder what the world would look like if I had perfect vision?

0831180509000471--.name: Yes? How may I help you?

0831180509000473--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000474--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000476--.name: You got home later than usual.

0831180509000477--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000478--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000481--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000482--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000485--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000486--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000488--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000489--.name: You got home later than usual.

0831180509000490--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000491--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000493--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000495--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000496--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000498--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000499--.name: Are you talking about my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000502--.name:
Received. Thank you.
<font color="#909090">(A fleeting smile appears on $MaidName$'s face.)</font>

0831180509000503--.name: It's been that long already, huh? ...Thank you.

0831180509000504--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She glances at the paycheck.)</font>
I'm not quite sure what to say. Hmm... I'm glad this worked out.

0831180509000505--.name:
Then... I can go back to work, right? ...Good.
<font color="#909090">(A small smile flashes quickly across $MaidName$'s face.)</font>

0831180509000508--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000509--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000511--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000513--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000514--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000516--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000517--.name: You look like you have something to tell me.

0831180509000518--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000519--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000521--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000523--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000524--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000526--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000527--.name: You don't have enough money to pay me. This is not good.

0831180509000528--.name: You've already paid me for the month. Well, everyone forgets, now and then.

0831180509000529--.name: You must be having a hard time. Things always don't go the way you planned. Don't worry about me.

0831180509000530--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She stares at you for a while.)</font>
I don't understand what you just said. Can you repeat it?

0831180509000532--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000533--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000535--.name: ... (She doesn't even look at you. Her eyes are closed.)

0831180509000536--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000537--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000539--.name: ... (She stares at the floor with a troubled look on her face.)

0831180509000540--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000541--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000543--.name: $OwnerName$... My contract has expired. I... Oh, never mind.

0831180509000544--.name: $OwnerName$... My contract has expired. I... Oh, never mind.

0831180509000545--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She refuses to meet your eyes as she mumbles.)</font>
You're $MaidPassedDay$ behind on paying me.

0831180509000547--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000548--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000551--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000552--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000554--.name: What do people usually say in a situation like this?

0831180509000555--.name: It's just that our contract has expired. You can renew it if you want.

0831180509000556--.name: <font color="#909090">($MaidName$ sighs, staring at the door. You can't tell what she's thinking.)</font>

0831180509000559--.name:
You want to see my profile?
<font color="#909090">(She smooths her apron, which is already perfectly smooth.)</font>

0831180509000560--.name:
No big deal...
<font color="#909090">(She avoids looking you in the eye.)</font>

0831180509000561--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000562--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000564--.name:
No big deal...
<font color="#909090">(She avoids looking you in the eye.)</font>

0831180509000565--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000566--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000568--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000585--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000586--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000588--.name: You look like you have something to tell me.

0831180509000589--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000590--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000593--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000594--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000596--.name: ($MaidName$ presents to you a small, lidded pot. She waits patiently for you to take it.)

0831180509000599--.name: (She pushes it closer toward you, until it's practically in your hands.)

0831180509000602--.name: Orange mushroom stew. I made it for you, but...

0831180509000604--.name: Orange Mushroom stew. I made it for you.

0831180509000605--.name: It's orange mushroom stew. Eat it before it gets cold. It's really yummy.

0831180509000606--.name: Um... I broke another plate. While cleaning up the mess, I kind of cut my finger.

0831180509000607--.name: There was a lot of blood, but the cut wasn't very deep.

0831180509000608--.name: (Grab her hand to check the cut.)

0831180509000609--.name: Try to be more careful so you don't hurt yourself.

0831180509000610--.name: I will. At least you're not yelling at me for breaking another plate.

0831180509000612--.name:
I'm okay! See? The bleeding has stopped!
<font color="#909090">(She averts her eyes quickly. Is she... blushing?)</font>

0831180509000613--.name:
I'm grateful for your concern but... that's the wrong hand. It was just a cut. I'm okay.
<font color="#909090">(A fleeting smile passes across her face.)</font>

0831180509000614--.name: My hands slipped while washing the dishes. I, um, broke another plate.

0831180509000615--.name: It's probably not a surprise, but I thought you should know.

0831180509000616--.name: How many plates have you broken since starting this job?

0831180509000617--.name: It's okay. I'm just glad you're not hurt.

0831180509000618--.name: Hm, I usually break one every couple days, so that's... Hmmm... Just a few.

0831180509000619--.name: I'm not sure... I've lost count, to be honest.

0831180509000620--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Her cheeks turn red.)</font>
Oh. Um. Thank you for your concern.

0831180509000621--.name:
Thanks, $OwnerName$.
<font color="#909090">(She gives you a tiny smile.)</font>

0831180509000622--.name: Every time I see you, you're always smiling. Did you know that, $OwnerName$?

0831180509000623--.name: I like you even if you don't smile much.

0831180509000624--.name: Someday, I'd love to see your smile, $MaidName$.

0831180509000627--.name:
Like... like this?
<font color="#909090">(She uses her fingers to lift the side of her lips upwards.)</font>

0831180509000628--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Her cheeks turn red.)</font>
I'll try... someday.

0831180509000629--.name: No matter how much I mop, the floor is always a muddy mess. I don't mind when it's your tracks, but who are those strangers barging into the house?

0831180509000631--.name: Sorry for always making a mess.

0831180509000633--.name: <font color="#909090">(She stares at you for a while, and then closes her eyes.)</font>

0831180509000635--.name:
...Okay.
<font color="#909090">(She nods her head, looking away.)</font>

0831180509000636--.name: I've prepared your lunch. I already ate.

0831180509000638--.name: I grabbed some spicy rice cakes from a food stall on the way back from the supermarket.

0831180509000640--.name: Yum, I want to try them!

0831180509000641--.name: They were... all right, I guess.

0831180509000643--.name: Oh, you do? Here, let me give you directions. Um... Shoot, I should've written it down...

0831180509000644--.name: Oh. Well, I don't mind. When do you want to go? I wonder if they're still open?

0831180509000645--.name:
Take this. 
<font color="#909090">(She holds out the broom in her hand, her eyes boring into you.)</font>

0831180509000648--.name: Except that you came home so late...

0831180509000650--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She quickly glances away.)</font>
Nothing. I didn't say anything.

0831180509000651--.name: You keep asking me what I like. What do you like, $OwnerName$?

0831180509000652--.name:
Just a moment.
<font color="#909090">(She rummages through her pocket.)</font>

0831180509000653--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She pulls out a pen and a memo pad.)</font>
Okay, go ahead. I'm listening.

0831180509000654--.name: I've purchased some Dutch coffee beans. Would you like to try?

0831180509000655--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She looks down at her feet.)</font>
I really love Dutch coffee. That aroma...

0831180509000656--.name: Huh? I didn't say anything. You probably imagined it.

0831180509000658--.name: We can't always do what we like. There many things we don't like, but we still have to do them.

0831180509000659--.name: Ah, don't get me wrong. I'm not saying I don't like this job.

0831180509000660--.name: I just... I don't know what I like.

0831180509000661--.name: I know what I don't like, though: sweets.

0831180509000662--.name: I worked as a maid for a noble family before I met you.

0831180509000663--.name: I was... let go. I'll tell you why when I'm ready. But I can never ever tell you which family it was.

0831180509000664--.name: My task at my last job was cooking. I wasn't very good, but having to do it every day helped me improve.

0831180509000665--.name: That's why I came to work for you as a cook. Do you like the food I make?

0831180509000666--.name: No, don't answer that. I don't think I want to know. Anyway, I feel most at home when I'm in the kitchen.

0831180509000667--.name: Especially yours, since most of your dishes are now shatter-resistant and easily replaceable.

0831180509000668--.name: I'm not sloppy. I just... have a knack for breaking things.

0831180509000669--.name: I got yelled at a lot by my previous employer because of it. It didn't upset me. I deserved it.

0831180509000670--.name: One day, while I was dusting as punishment for breaking too many dishes, I broke a flower vase.

0831180509000671--.name: It happened to be a gift from the royal family. That's why they fired me. But it's okay... I have a much better boss now.

0831180509000672--.name: $OwnerName$, if there are items you treasure and don't want broken, please keep them out of my reach.

0831180509000673--.name:
Can I tell you something?
<font color="#909090">(She stares at her shoes.)</font>

0831180509000674--.name: I'm not friendly or outgoing. A lot of people think I'm aloof.

0831180509000675--.name: But I'm just not good at expressing myself. I have a hard time looking people in the eye while talking to them.

0831180509000676--.name: <font color="#909090">(She peeks up, to see you listening intently.)</font>

0831180509000677--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Her face turns red and she immediately looks back down at the ground.)</font>
So, I just wanted to say...

0831180509000679--.name:
Ah!
<font color="#909090">(She drops the plate she was holding when she notices you.)</font>

0831180509000680--.name: There goes another plate... Who are you?

0831180509000681--.name: I could ask you the same thing.

0831180509000682--.name: I'm here to visit the person who lives here.

0831180509000683--.name: Sorry about the plate. Let me reimburse you for it.

0831180509000684--.name:
That's none of your business.
<font color="#909090">(She turns away coldly.)</font>

0831180509000685--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She stares at you for a long moment.)</font>
Please step aside. I have a mess to clean up.

0831180509000686--.name: Of course. Enjoy your visit with $OwnerName$.

0831180509000687--.name: I see. Then I'll let you get to it.

0831180509000688--.name: You didn't break it. I did. Don't worry about it.

0831180509000689--.name: It's all right. $OwnerName$ won't get upset over something so trivial.

0831180509000694--.name: I knew you had to return home soon.

0831180509000705--.name: Mm... How may I help you?

0831180509000707--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000708--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000710--.name: Very well. I was just taking a break.

0831180509000711--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000712--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000714--.name: Oh, I didn't see you there. I was just... thinking. What can I do for you?

0831180509000715--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000716--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000719--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000720--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000722--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000723--.name: Very well. I was just taking a break.

0831180509000724--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000725--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000727--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000728--.name: Oh, I didn't see you there. I was just... thinking. What can I do for you?

0831180509000729--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000730--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000732--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509000733--.name: Hm, my paycheck, huh? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509000736--.name:
You're paying me early. $OwnerName$, you like to get things done efficiently, don't you. You're my favorite kind of boss.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles softly.)</font>

0831180509000737--.name:
Here I was, thinking our time together was about to come to an end. I guess not.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>

0831180509000738--.name:
I thought our contract had expired, though I suppose if you're that desperate to keep me, I can serve you for a little longer.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>

0831180509000739--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font>
You've changed your mind? I won't say I'm happy, but I will agree to renew our contract. My own plans will be put on hold for a little longer.

0831180509000740--.name: It doesn't matter to me, but our contract expires soon. I just want you to know you'll have to pay me if you want me to continue working for you.

0831180509000741--.name: Our relationship is strictly business. We don't have to get emotional.

0831180509000742--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509000743--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509000745--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)
