0831180509001414--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001415--.name: Huh? You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001416--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509001418--.name: Paying your employees on time is a good practice. Keep up the good work.

0831180509001419--.name: Now that I've been paid, I'm going to treat myself to a feast. I love to have food delivered to the house!

0831180509001420--.name: Remember not to get behind on paying me. Ugh, I thought I was going to starve to death. Now that I have my paycheck, I'm going to order some pizza.

0831180509001421--.name: I was going to leave if you didn't pay me by the end of the day. You're lucky you did.

0831180509001422--.name: $OwnerName$, you should check the calendar sometimes. Our contract expires soon. You can't always be so busy that forget.

0831180509001423--.name: Do I really have to remind you of this?

0831180509001424--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001425--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001427--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001428--.name: Aw man, that nap hit the spot.

0831180509001429--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001430--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001432--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001433--.name: Acting friendly isn't going to get you anything.

0831180509001434--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001435--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001437--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001438--.name: Don't talk to me. I don't want to do anything right now.

0831180509001439--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001440--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001442--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001443--.name: Oh no, don't you have money to pay me? This is not acceptable. $OwnerName$, you'd better go out and earn some money.

0831180509001444--.name: You already paid me for this month. And just because I look tough doesn't mean I'm a chat. Sheesh, $OwnerName$, who do you think I am?

0831180509001445--.name: I'm in no mood for games! Just give me my money! It's been day since you were supposed to pay me. I'm so hungry, I'm getting dizzy...

0831180509001446--.name: What? What's going on? $OwnerName$, I don't know what the problem is. You take care of it.

0831180509001448--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001449--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001452--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001453--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001455--.name: I told you, I'm not going to work unless you pay me.

0831180509001456--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001457--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001459--.name: Our contract expired, so I'm just going to take a nap, okay?

0831180509001460--.name: You're trying to get out of paying me, aren't you? Our contract has expired. You can't fool me. If you want something from me, pay up.

0831180509001461--.name: I haven't eaten for $MaidPassedDay$! My clothes are practically falling off!

0831180509001462--.name: $OwnerName$, why are you doing this to me?

0831180509001463--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001464--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001466--.name: It's not like I'm asking for a raise... Ugh.

0831180509001467--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001468--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001470--.name: I need a meal, a real meal. Not a snack, but a full on, three course meal!

0831180509001471--.name: Are you torturing me because I grumble sometimes? But I still clean and do everything you ask. Why aren't you paying me? If you don't pay me, why, I'll... I'll... I'll go on strike! I mean it!

0831180509001472--.name: You can't take home groceries until you've paid for them first, right? Same with my services. You have to pay for them first!

0831180509001473--.name: Nobody compares to me when it comes to alchemy!

0831180509001474--.name: You just let old $MaidName$ handle your potion-making.

0831180509001475--.name: Why are you asking so many personal questions?

0831180509001476--.name: Stop asking the same questions over and over.

0831180509001477--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001478--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001480--.name: Stop asking the same questions over and over.

0831180509001481--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001482--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001484--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001485--.name: When are you going to buy me some snacks?

0831180509001500--.name: Aw man, that nap hit the spot.

0831180509001501--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001502--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001504--.name: Acting friendly isn't going to get you anything.

0831180509001505--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001506--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001508--.name: Don't talk to me. I don't want to do anything right now.

0831180509001509--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001510--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001513--.name: I just had this delivered, and I don't like it. You can eat it if you want.

0831180509001514--.name: It's a bit cold by now, though.

0831180509001517--.name: If you don't want to eat it, then don't eat it! Ingrate.

0831180509001518--.name: Cold or hot, your belly doesn't know the difference. Just eat what I feed you.

0831180509001519--.name: Of course, it's delicious. It's a gift from me. Next time, I'm going to eat it all myself. Don't even think of asking for a bite.

0831180509001520--.name: It's exactly what you wanted, isn't it? Don't worry, I'll order from that restaurant again soon.

0831180509001521--.name: It's exhausting taking care of you...

0831180509001522--.name: $OwnerName$, I'd like to offer you my leftover snacks from yesterday. They're a bit stale, but you can eat them if you want.

0831180509001523--.name: If you eat even a bite, I expect you to get me more delicious snacks in return.

0831180509001526--.name: That was yesterday! A new day requires new snacks! What, are you really that stingy?

0831180509001527--.name: Are you calling me ungrateful? Forget it. I'll buy my own snacks!

0831180509001528--.name: Bwahahaha! Just the thought of new snakes makes my mouth water!

0831180509001529--.name: Why don't you go now, then? I want my snacks right now!

0831180509001530--.name: Whew, it's hot in here. Take this cool drink to refresh yourself.

0831180509001531--.name: Don't you think it's like an oven in here?

0831180509001532--.name: Thanks for the drink! Just what I needed.

0831180509001534--.name: If you're cold, you're dehydrated. That's what I always say!

0831180509001535--.name:
Pssh, I'm sweating! How can you be cold?
<font color="#909090">(He scratches at the patch of white fur on his neck.)</font>

0831180509001536--.name: I thought it was just me, because of my fur. But it seems like you're hot, too.

0831180509001537--.name: Am I hot because of my fur or because of the weather?

0831180509001538--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ gave me some of food he cooked, but I don't think I like it. Taste it.

0831180509001539--.name: How does it taste? Well? Well??

0831180509001542--.name: Why should I? $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ always gives me food.

0831180509001543--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ asked me the same question as she passed, but she wouldn't have dared if she knew I was older than her.

0831180509001544--.name: I love $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$'s food! It's my favorite!

0831180509001545--.name: ...I feel hungry all of a sudden. Come on, share with me!

0831180509001546--.name: $OwnerName$, I found this while napping inside the storage chest.

0831180509001548--.name: Never seen it before. Nooo idea whose it could be...

0831180509001550--.name: Then give it back! I'm going to keep it.

0831180509001551--.name: Strange. I thought I already swept this place for valuables... Where did this come from?

0831180509001552--.name: I would've kept it if I knew it belonged to you. Bah, I shouldn't have even asked.

0831180509001553--.name: I found something you lost. To pay me back, give me some snacks.

0831180509001554--.name: I found this while playing in $map:2000001$. Your house is too empty. Use it to decorate a bit more.

0831180509001555--.name: Make the house more comfortable for me, all right?

0831180509001558--.name: But there aren't enough comfy places for me to lie down! Come on, just use it!

0831180509001559--.name: Are you saying you don't want things from me? I brought it all the way home, and you don't even say thank you.

0831180509001560--.name: I want this place to feel more homey. Decorate for me, okay?

0831180509001561--.name: The more furniture you have, the less floor for me to mop. Fill your house up with stuff, okay?

0831180509001562--.name: I found this between the sheets of your bed.

0831180509001564--.name: What were you doing on my bed?

0831180509001566--.name: Searching for this item you lost! Obviously! Not taking a nap...

0831180509001567--.name: I got tired while cleaning, so I put my feet up for a minute. I'm entitled to breaks, you know.

0831180509001568--.name: I was going to keep it, but I changed my mind. Lucky you.

0831180509001569--.name: It was good I decided to take a break, wasn't it?

0831180509001570--.name: Stop trying to tell me how I do my job, and just go out there and... do whatever it is that you do!

0831180509001571--.name: The house is so dusty because you keep tracking in dirt!

0831180509001572--.name: I just don't understand why you're so dirty. Stop fooling around and take a shower!

0831180509001573--.name: One of your friends stopped by but left without giving me a name.

0831180509001574--.name: I didn't ask because... I didn't think of it, okay?

0831180509001575--.name: I don't feel like doing anything today. If you insist that I pick something to do, I choose to lie down and rest.

0831180509001576--.name: What do you mean resting isn't work? Of course it is! It involves thinking!

0831180509001577--.name: I have to think real hard about what snacks I should eat today, tomorrow, the rest of the week... That stuff is really important to me!

0831180509001578--.name: Okay, okay! I'll do it! I'll clean! Sheesh.

0831180509001579--.name: Why do you want me to clean all the time? The house will just end up getting dirty again. Why can't I just leave it dirty?

0831180509001580--.name: You know those rough-looking guys in $map:2000001$? Yeah, I'm their leader. Stop scolding or I'll tell them to make your life difficult.

0831180509001581--.name: What do you mean, you're not scared of my friends. They're level 10. Got that? Level 10!

0831180509001582--.name: Stop harassing me or I'll quit, I mean it!

0831180509001583--.name: If I quit, you won't have anyone to keep your house clean. It doesn't just clean itself, you know?

0831180509001585--.name: Argh! Why do you treat me like this? I just want to be happy and take naps. Is that too much to ask?

0831180509001586--.name: Why can't you just let me be happy?! Don't you think I deserve it?

0831180509001587--.name: I came to $map:2000001$ for $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s event. I've always been in love with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, ever since I was little. I even dream about her sometimes.

0831180509001588--.name: I fell in love with the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ because of a book. She was illustrated as a character in it, and the moment I saw the picture, that was it for me.

0831180509001589--.name: I came to $map:2000001$ to see the love of my life, $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, but then the ceremony was canceled.

0831180509001590--.name: I was so desperate to see her, I sprinted toward the palace. All I wanted was a glance. Instead, $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ appeared.

0831180509001591--.name: I tried to shove past him, but he tripped me. Can you believe that? Who is he to stop me from seeing her?

0831180509001592--.name: I accepted this job because it's the best! I get to live in someone else's house, eat their food, sleep in their bed, and I even get paid! All I have to do in return is a bit of cleaning.

0831180509001593--.name: But the cleaning part isn't as easy as you'd think.

0831180509001594--.name: Dust bunnies lurk in every corner. As soon as you sweep, the dust scatters.

0831180509001595--.name: And where do you think that dust goes? Your bed! The bathroom sink! Between the cracks of the living room floor! And the it's back to square one for me.

0831180509001596--.name: Now if I just leave the dust bunnies where they are, what do you think happens? They accumulate until they grow so big, you can just pluck them away. So you see, the less you clean, the better.

0831180509001597--.name: Ever wonder why I complain so much? I wasn't always like this, you know. The world has made me what I am.

0831180509001598--.name: Everyone I've met has been mean to me. I tried to be nice to them, but all I got back was bullying and name-calling.

0831180509001599--.name: You don't have to be nice to others, $OwnerName$. They'll only hurt you, no matter how nice you are to them.

0831180509001600--.name: Don't show the world your weaknesses. You'll always regret it.

0831180509001601--.name: Have you met $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$? I used to be good friends with him.

0831180509001602--.name: He's not the sharpest, but he's stronger than anyone else I know. Let me tell you a story about him and $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$.

0831180509001603--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ has loved cooking since she was young. She was always searching for ingredients. One day, she went to $map:2000043$ even though the grownups told her not to. She was climbing a hill, when suddenly the ground shook and a big rock came rolling straight toward her!

0831180509001604--.name: She was so scared that she fainted. $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ saw what was happening, leapt over, and shattered the rock with a single punch! He saved $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$. That's how strong $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ is.

0831180509001605--.name: $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ thinks $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$'s father saved her, but I saw it all. He used to be so nice when he was young. I don't know what changed him over the years.

0831180509001606--.name: Huh? What was I doing in $map:2000043$? That's none of your business!

0831180509001607--.name:
<font color="#909090">(He wipes crumbs away from his mouth.)</font>
Who are you? You friends with my boss?

0831180509001611--.name: If you've got business with the boss, what're you talking to me for? Sheesh.

0831180509001612--.name: Then sit down and stay quiet. We'll see what the boss has to say.

0831180509001613--.name: They what are you doing here? Get out, before I make you get out!

0831180509001614--.name: Great timing. I'm starving. Why don't you go get me something to eat?

0831180509001615--.name: I'm the glue that holds this household together. Name's $MaidName$. Night to meet you.

0831180509001616--.name: Why don't you tell me who you are first? Sheesh.

0831180509001617--.name: What? Where the heck am I?

0831180509001621--.name: Did you bring me some good snacks?

0831180509001622--.name: Such a mess. I'm tired of cleaning!

0831180509001624--.name: I'm not gonna do nothing today.

0831180509001626--.name: Why is this house so messy?

0831180509001627--.name: This place is so messy, it's taking forever to clean it.

0831180509001628--.name: I know I stashed a snack around here somewhere...

0831180509001631--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001632--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001635--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001636--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001639--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001640--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001643--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001644--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001646--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001648--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001649--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001651--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001653--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001654--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001656--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001657--.name: Mm? Are you going to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001660--.name: Oh, I'm so glad you found me useful. Thank you for extending our contract. I'm happy to stay with you for another month.

0831180509001661--.name: Hah hah hah, it feels great to get paid for my work work. Thank you.

0831180509001662--.name: Ah, this explains your cheerful mood. What's good for you is good for me, and vice versa. That's what friends are for, right? To share in each other's happiness.

0831180509001663--.name: Ah, I know I said everything was fine, but it really wasn't. I didn't want to tell you the truth, because I knew it was harder on you than it was on me. I'm glad everything worked out! Hah hah!

0831180509001664--.name: In case you've forgotten, our contract expires soon. I know it's not easy keeping track of everything going on in your life.

0831180509001665--.name: But that's what I'm here for. Hah hah.

0831180509001666--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001667--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001669--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001671--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001672--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001674--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001675--.name: Sometimes, I feel lonely when I'm by myself.

0831180509001676--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001677--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001679--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001680--.name: Yikes... My back's killing me today...

0831180509001681--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001682--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001684--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001685--.name: Oh, aren't you a bit short on funds right now? Thank you for at least trying to pay me. I'm sure you'll get some mesos soon, so don't feel too bad. Hah hah hah.

0831180509001686--.name: You want to pay me? But you've already paid me for the month. You're as forgetful as I am sometimes.

0831180509001687--.name: You've got nothing but dust in your pockets. I kind of knew this was the case. It's all right. Don't you worry about this old man...

0831180509001688--.name: Hm, strange things happen all the time. Don't panic. Calm yourself and try again.

0831180509001689--.name: Aww... Why do you look so exhausted?

0831180509001690--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001691--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001693--.name: The older you get, the less food your body needs.

0831180509001694--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001695--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001697--.name: Having nothing to do is so dull. It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I've had a job.

0831180509001698--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001699--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001701--.name: Ah, if we could take a moment to talk about my contract... I believe it's expired.

0831180509001702--.name: Sure, but if we could take a moment to talk about my contract... I believe it's expired.

0831180509001703--.name: I told you not to worry about me. Everything will work out eventually.

0831180509001704--.name: The power of positive thinking, right? Hah hah.

0831180509001705--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001706--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001708--.name: I don't think I can go for a walk today. My knees are aching...

0831180509001709--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001710--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001712--.name: When the wind becomes overwhelming, mimic the reeds. Follow the wind without losing your footing. Hah hah hah, are you thinking I've finally lost my mind? I just thought you could use some encouragement.

0831180509001713--.name: I miss my wife. When things got tough for us, like they are for your now, Madelle helped me get through it. What I'm trying to say is, I may not be able to do much, but I'm here for you.

0831180509001714--.name: Everyone should experience poverty at least once. It gives you perspective. Once you've climbed a cliff, even the steepest hill is no longer intimidating.

0831180509001715--.name: Ask me for anything. I'll make it for you if I can.

0831180509001716--.name: Don't worry about it. I'm doing this to pass time.

0831180509001717--.name: Do you have questions for me?

0831180509001718--.name: Hm, it's not easy to describe oneself in just a few words.

0831180509001719--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001720--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001722--.name: Hm, it's not easy to describe oneself in just a few words.

0831180509001723--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001724--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001726--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001732--.name: Oh, you want to keep this old man company?

0831180509001737--.name: What kind of story? Is there something in particular you want to hear?

0831180509001743--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001744--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001746--.name: Sometimes, I feel lonely when I'm by myself.

0831180509001747--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001748--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001750--.name: Yikes... My back's killing me today...

0831180509001751--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001752--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001755--.name: It felt so strange cooking for the first time in decades. Worse, everything was so blurry I could hardly tell the difference between sugar and salt.

0831180509001756--.name: So I just used the first thing I grabbed. Turns out, it was the wrong one. But you looked hungry, so here it is!

0831180509001759--.name: Is it? Then please spit it out. This is your house and I'm your employee. You don't have to eat it if you don't want to.

0831180509001760--.name: Consuming too much salt makes you thirsty, which leads to drinking too much water, which leads to swelling in your face. So you should stop eating the food.

0831180509001761--.name: Hah hah hah, I know I'm not a good cook. Thank you for saying that.

0831180509001762--.name: When you're hungry, anything you eat tastes good. Hah hah hah, slow down. No one's going to fight you for that.

0831180509001763--.name: Guess what I have in my hand...?

0831180509001764--.name: Snacks! I thought you might be hungry.

0831180509001765--.name: It tastes better than it looks. I hope.

0831180509001766--.name: Great! I was feeling a little hungry!

0831180509001767--.name: I'll pass. I'm, um, trying to lose weight. Yeah.

0831180509001768--.name: Why? You're nothing but skin and bone. You look like you could blow away in the wind. Come on, just eat it.

0831180509001769--.name: Are you? Being overweight can cause diabetes, high blood pressure, hardening of the arteries, and other chronic diseases. Hm, should I be worried?

0831180509001770--.name: Hah hah hah, that's why I've made this! When you're my age, you get to read people more easily.

0831180509001771--.name: Do you get always get hungry around this time? Because I do.

0831180509001772--.name: I was visiting the senior center today, and someone gave me this drink. I thought you might like it.

0831180509001773--.name: When you get to be my age, you already know what you like and don't want to try new things.

0831180509001774--.name: Aw, you should try it. You might like it.

0831180509001776--.name: No, thank you. New food stopped tasting good to me some time ago. At first, it all tasted disgusting, but now it just doesn't taste like anything.

0831180509001777--.name: I'll be happy just to watch you drink it. Go on, take it.

0831180509001778--.name: The person who gave it to me said it's very nutritious. If you like it, let me know. I can ask him for more.

0831180509001779--.name: I'm so glad you accepted it. I would've felt awkward if you said refused.

0831180509001780--.name: I cooked some food my wife used to make. I never watched her cook, though.

0831180509001781--.name: It tastes like its missing something, but I can't quite put my finger on it... What do you think?

0831180509001782--.name: Hmm, not bad, but could use a sprinkle of MSG.

0831180509001783--.name: It's pretty delicious just the way it is.

0831180509001784--.name: Hmm? MSG? I'll just use a pinch, and... Mm, mm! Yes, now it tastes perfect!

0831180509001785--.name: Hmmm, why don't you try tasting it again in a little bit and let me know what you think then?

0831180509001786--.name: I'm glad you're not a picky eater, $OwnerName$. Thank you for eating everything I cook for you.

0831180509001787--.name: You may think so, but I can tell something is missing. I should've asked my wife when I could... It's just another one of the many, many things I miss about her.

0831180509001788--.name: Tsk, you should be more careful. I found this by the front door on my way out.

0831180509001789--.name: Usually, I can't see far enough to notice an item on the ground, but lucky for you, I had to adjust my shoes.

0831180509001792--.name: It's not? Some stranger barged into the house the other day. Maybe he dropped it. I'd better keep it in case he comes back.

0831180509001793--.name: Then how did it get here? Anyway, since this is your house, the item belongs to you now, so you take it.

0831180509001795--.name: You should take better care of your things.

0831180509001796--.name: I ran into Choi the real estate agent on my way home today. One of his clients just moved to a smaller and gave him a bunch of furniture that wouldn't fit.

0831180509001797--.name: It was way too much, but Choi didn't want to throw it out, either. He asked me to take whatever I wanted, so I grabbed this. It looked like the best of the bunch. It's all yours now!

0831180509001800--.name: Hm, then what should I do with it? I don't think Choi will take it back, and I don't want to throw it away.

0831180509001801--.name: Hah hah hah, I guess I shouldn't have taken it! Everyone makes mistakes, and mistakes teach you valuable lessons. Those who claim never to have made a mistake are either lying to themselves or not living life to the fullest.

0831180509001802--.name: So I picked something good, huh? I'm glad to be of help.

0831180509001803--.name: Do you need anything else? Choi had a lot of other stuff, too.

0831180509001804--.name: Do you know what happened today? I was out walking when I ran into an overturned wagon. I helped the owner move it back into place.

0831180509001805--.name: And he gave me money for helping him. Hah hah hah! Here, take it. I've got no use for so much money. Think of it as an allowance from your grandpa.

0831180509001808--.name: It was easy money. Come on, I insist.

0831180509001809--.name: I wouldn't have offered it if I didn't care about you. The greatest happiness in life comes from knowing that you're being loved. This may not be the best way to show it, but I'm quite fond of you.

0831180509001810--.name: What a great day! I got to help someone, get free money, and give you an allowance! Hah!

0831180509001811--.name: Hah hah hah, how wonderful! Oof, I'm aching all over now. I'll probably spend more on pain medicine than I earned...

0831180509001812--.name: Not much. I worked around the house all day.

0831180509001813--.name: A writer once said the people weren't born to work. If we were, it wouldn't make us so tired.

0831180509001814--.name: I agree with him, now that I know how tiresome housework really is.

0831180509001815--.name: I was thinking of my wife while I cleaned today. She used to hum when she did her chores.

0831180509001816--.name: So I tried that today. It actually lifted my spirits and made the work less boring.

0831180509001817--.name: Nothing happened to me or the house, but...

0831180509001818--.name: I met Choi the real estate agent while taking a walk. He said he saw someone hanging onto a flying eagle.

0831180509001819--.name: I don't know why he makes such absurd claims sometimes. It would've been more believable if he said he saw someone hanging onto a balloon. Hah hah.

0831180509001820--.name: While I was grocery shopping, I saw the comedian who plays the fool on that popular TV show. The kids there were copying his character and laughing at him.

0831180509001821--.name: A great comedy writer once said, "The toughest role in comedy is the fool, and playing it requires a genius."

0831180509001822--.name: I was watching a TV quiz show this morning. There were three doors. Two of them had a goat behind them, and the third had an expensive mount. The contestant didn't know which was which, of course.

0831180509001823--.name: So he picked a door. The host opened one of the other doors to reveal a goat. He then asked the contestant if he wanted to change his choice. What would you do if it were you?

0831180509001824--.name: I'm not a funny person, and I don't know any funny stories. Hah hah hah. But I know how to keep people engaged in what I'm saying, and that's to tell them what I think of them.

0831180509001825--.name: I can tell you what I think of you, if you want. Oh, your ears are already perking up! Hah hah!

0831180509001828--.name: You want to ask me something personal?

0831180509001829--.name: We all are like the moon: each one of us has a dark side that we don't want to show others.

0831180509001830--.name: If you're asking about my dark side, I'd rather not talk about it. Let's talk about yours instead. I'm all ears.

0831180509001831--.name: You've been all over Victoria Island. Which part do you like the most?

0831180509001832--.name: I don't care if you go anywhere else, but please don't go to $map:2000124$.

0831180509001833--.name: One morning I woke up to realize that all my desire for worldly wealth had vanished overnight. Everything here is fleeting.

0831180509001834--.name: The realization that the years you have left are fewer than the years you've already lived does that to you.

0831180509001835--.name: An old scholar once said man's purpose is to make meaningless things meaningful. I'd better live whatever life I have left to the fullest, so I can die without regrets.

0831180509001836--.name: I really like this job. When my wife passed, I was so heartbroken that I didn't want to do anything for a long, long time.

0831180509001837--.name: Then I realized living in the past was doing me more harm than good.

0831180509001838--.name: So I decided to let the past go, enjoy the present, and wait for whatever the future brings.

0831180509001839--.name: I started writing a while ago. But I'm not writing a novel.

0831180509001840--.name: I'm not writing something to show others. It's just for myself.

0831180509001841--.name: Someone once told me that writing helps you deal with difficult emotions and find happiness again.

0831180509001842--.name: So I'm writing to be happy. Please don't be too nosy about what I'm writing.

0831180509001843--.name: Does my writing include things about you? Well... You'll see for yourself if I decide to show you one day.

0831180509001844--.name: You want to know about me and my wife? I can't think of anything special to say. Hah hah.

0831180509001845--.name: It was always just the two of us, me and Madelle. We couldn't have children... That was hard for both of us.

0831180509001846--.name: In hindsight, maybe that made us even closer. It was a pain we shared together.

0831180509001847--.name: Am I sorry that I don't have children? No. But I miss the time I shared with my wife.

0831180509001848--.name: Being with Madelle, I always felt warm and peaceful. We'd been together for so long that we could read each other's thoughts. But when I think about it now, I wish I had talked to her more often.

0831180509001849--.name: Do you have someone you love? If not, I hope you find someone as good as my Madelle.

0831180509001850--.name: I didn't hear the bell ring. May I ask who you are? Are you here to see the owner of the house?

0831180509001854--.name: I work for him. If you'd like me to pass along a message... Actually, no. That was presumptuous of me. You probably want to speak in person.

0831180509001855--.name: I see. Just pretend I'm not here and make yourself at home.

0831180509001856--.name: Then what brings you here? How did you get in, anyway? Was the door open?

0831180509001857--.name: Then what brings you here? If you're here for an open house, you've got the wrong address. This home is not for sale.

0831180509001858--.name: Common courtesy would be introduce yourself first before asking, but I'll cut you some slack. I'm not a stickler for the rules anyway, hah hah.

0831180509001859--.name: I am the housekeeper. Now, may I ask who you are?

0831180509001860--.name: Nice to meet you. Hah hah.

0831180509001862--.name: May I ask who you're looking for?

0831180509001867--.name: Don't worry about this old man...

0831180509001869--.name: Life is... life. It is what you make of it.

0831180509001873--.name: Hmm... I wish I could see better...

0831180509001877--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001878--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001880--.name: It's a wonderful day today, isn't it?

0831180509001881--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001882--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001884--.name: You're just in time, $OwnerName$. I was just sitting down to eat.

0831180509001885--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001886--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001889--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001890--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001892--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001893--.name: It's a wonderful day today, isn't it?

0831180509001894--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001895--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001897--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001898--.name: You're just in time, $OwnerName$. I was just sitting down to eat.

0831180509001899--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001900--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001902--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001903--.name: Oh, you want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509001904--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509001906--.name: Time sure flies. Thanks for hiring me again this month, dearie.

0831180509001907--.name: Oh, how kind of you! I didn't even have to remind you! I don't like asking for money, even if I've rightfully earned it.

0831180509001908--.name: Whew, thank you! This means I don't have to worry anymore. Why don't I cook us some nice unagi today to celebrate?

0831180509001909--.name: So everything's worked out? Good! Now I can cut loose! How about I treat you to a feast today to celebrate?

0831180509001910--.name: I was looking over my books today and noticed our contract is expiring soon. Have you been so busy you've forgotten, dear?

0831180509001911--.name: You did, didn't you? I knew it! Tsk.

0831180509001912--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001913--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001915--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001917--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001918--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001920--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001921--.name: What a wonderful day today, isn't it?

0831180509001922--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001923--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001925--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001926--.name: I'm a little busy right now, dearie.

0831180509001927--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001928--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001930--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001931--.name: Oh, don't push yourself, dearie. Our contract doesn't expire for a while. You can pay me later, hun.

0831180509001932--.name: Oh my, you've already paid me for the month, hun. We agreed that I would be paid once a month, remember, dearie?

0831180509001933--.name: This is not the amount we agreed upon. No, no. Did you really think you could fool a woman with decades of experience under her apron?

0831180509001934--.name: How strange! Based on experience, problems like this usually go away if you just try again. Now, don't just stand there. Try again.

0831180509001935--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid. Any good news?

0831180509001936--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001937--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001939--.name: $OwnerName$, you look like you haven't slept for days.

0831180509001940--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001941--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001943--.name: You should take care of yourself when thing get tough. Especially while you're young.

0831180509001944--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001945--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001947--.name: Looks like my contract expired, $OwnerName$. Didn't I warn you this would happen a couple days ago? Should've done something then, dearie.

0831180509001948--.name: Oh, $OwnerName$, our contract has expired. Have you checked the contract? You should, hun.

0831180509001949--.name: Don't worry about me, dearie. If worse comes to worst, I can always sell my house.

0831180509001950--.name: $OwnerName$, I know you're going through a hard time. I understand, hun.

0831180509001951--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001952--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001955--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001956--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001958--.name: Oh, $OwnerName$, it's late, and you haven't eaten? There's some frozen rice in the freezer. Reheat it and eat up. I'm glad I saved it for you, hun.

0831180509001959--.name: I need to cut down my spending this month. Things are a bit tight, now that my income is so low. It's about time I went on a diet anyway.

0831180509001960--.name: Will my $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ will ever grow up? He cried all morning for new shoes. Doesn't he know what mommy has to go through to feed him?

0831180509001961--.name: Mm? Is there something you want to eat?

0831180509001962--.name: Let me know if you get hungry.

0831180509001963--.name: What would you possibly want to know about an old lady like me?

0831180509001964--.name: What can I do for you?

0831180509001965--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001966--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001968--.name: What can I do for you?

0831180509001969--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001970--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001972--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509001973--.name: Sure, dearie, if you don't mind talking to an old lady like me.

0831180509001989--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001990--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001992--.name: What a wonderful day today, isn't it?

0831180509001993--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001994--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509001996--.name: I'm a little busy right now, dearie.

0831180509001997--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509001998--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002000--.name: There's a new juice that's all the rage amongst the young folk of $map:2000001$. I tried making it today.

0831180509002001--.name: The mineral water from $map:2000089$ was difficult to procure, but besides that, it wasn't too hard to make. What do you think?

0831180509002003--.name: Why is this juice so popular in $map:2000001$?

0831180509002004--.name: I didn't leave your house unattended, if that's what you're asking. I made $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ help me.

0831180509002005--.name: Do you even know where $map:2000089$ is? It's deep in a forest. Do you think an old lady like me would survive that journey?

0831180509002006--.name: The youngsters of $map:2000001$ believe sharing this juice with people that they love will make their love last forever. How do you like it?

0831180509002007--.name: It's because of a rumor that it promotes eternal love when lovers drink it together.

0831180509002008--.name: I don't believe it, though. I'm sure it's just a corporate scheme.

0831180509002009--.name: I made a snack with some of the leftover ingredients you had in the kitchen. My $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$  just loves sweets. I hope you like these, too, $OwnerName$.

0831180509002010--.name: You can eat it all, dearie. When you get to be my age, it all goes straight to the hips.

0831180509002013--.name: I can see the snack lifting your mood, hun. Sugar does that to you.

0831180509002014--.name: I didn't think you'd scarf it down so fast. Don't blame me if you get a tummyache later!

0831180509002015--.name: Thank you for saying that, dearie. Aren't you just the sweetest!

0831180509002016--.name: Tsk, you're such a bad liar. Your eyes gave you away. I had quite the figure back in the day, you know... It's not much fun getting old.

0831180509002017--.name: I noticed you're having a hard time waking up in the morning. I made this to help start your day off right.

0831180509002018--.name: It's a potion with all kinds of healthy ingredients in it. Drink up. It'll wake you up right away.

0831180509002020--.name: Why don't you drink some, too?

0831180509002021--.name: Huh? It is? That can't be right. It's healthy, sure, but it's not supposed to taste good...

0831180509002022--.name: Oh, you're just saying that to be nice. No health drink actually tastes good. Even I can't drink a full glass of it!

0831180509002023--.name: Are you worried about my health, hun? Don't worry. I already had some.

0831180509002024--.name: You have a good heart, dearie. I wish $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ was as good as you. Then I wouldn't have to worry about him all the time.

0831180509002025--.name: $OwnerName$, I cooked you up something special.  Nothing is more important than eating three meals a day, you know.

0831180509002026--.name: Eating well is the cornerstone to good health, after all.

0831180509002029--.name: No, no. You shouldn't skip meals. Eat it right now, even if you don't want to. Trust me!

0831180509002030--.name: Food doesn't taste good when it's cold. Try to eat at least some of it. $OwnerName$, you're as bad as $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ sometimes...

0831180509002031--.name: Oh, I love how you eat anything I give you. I wish $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ ate as well as you do.

0831180509002032--.name: I'm glad you like my food. You've gained weight since I've started working here. Perhaps it's time to cut some carbs. Hmm...

0831180509002033--.name: A salesman visited today. I told him I wasn't interested, be he insisted I take a look at his wares. I was really just only going to look, but then I thought you might like this, so I bought it for you.

0831180509002034--.name: What do you think? Do you like it?

0831180509002036--.name: It's not good to make impulse purchases.

0831180509002037--.name: I know, but he was such a smooth talker! Maybe I just shouldn't talk to anyone I don't already know.

0831180509002038--.name: But I got it for 50 mesos off! Ahhh, I guess you're right. But what can I do about it now?

0831180509002039--.name: It looks good on you, $OwnerName$! And I got a great deal on it, too!

0831180509002040--.name: I knew you'd love it, $OwnerName$. I also bought a couple of things for $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$. Hee hee.

0831180509002041--.name: $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is really good with his hands. He dropped by yesterday to take a look around, then stopped by again today and brought this. He made it himself!

0831180509002042--.name: It matches your house perfectly, don't you think?

0831180509002045--.name: Oh, didn't I tell you? $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is an old neighbor of mine.

0831180509002046--.name: My son $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ loves him. I'm sure you've seen him around $map:2000017$.

0831180509002047--.name: I met him $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ in $map:2000001$. We became friends because of $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$. He said he used to be a $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$, so I have no idea where he learned to make something like this!

0831180509002048--.name: It's great, isn't it? I told you $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is good with his hands. Now I want to do something for him in return. Maybe he'll like my special pudding!

0831180509002049--.name: $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is so kind, don't you think? Now, $OwnerName$, why don't place it somewhere right now? It'll brighten things up!

0831180509002050--.name: Today a stranger came and begged me for food. I felt sorry for him, so I gave him some leftover rice and chicken. He ate two bowls of rice! Before he left, he gave me some mesos.

0831180509002051--.name: I really didn't want to take his money, but he insisted.

0831180509002054--.name: I know I shouldn't, but I couldn't say no to such a sad-looking face. I didn't even think to ask his name.

0831180509002055--.name: It was just leftovers! He looked familiar, somehow... Like maybe I've seen his face on a leaflet in $map:02000100$.

0831180509002056--.name: He wore goggles around his head and a red cape on his shoulders. He seemed anxious. Couldn't stop peering around as he ate. Whatever his story is, it can't be a good one.

0831180509002057--.name: I asked him his name, but he refused to say. He was blond and had a scar on his face.

0831180509002058--.name: He was a bit intimidating, to be honest. I could tell he was on the run. Still, I couldn't refuse him. I could tell he hadn't eaten or slept in days...

0831180509002059--.name: You came at the just the right time. I've got something to tell you.

0831180509002060--.name: I wanted to grill some eels for dinner, but I couldn't get the fire going and didn't want to use the stove. Fire-grilled eels taste best, you know. A passing mage offered to help, so I gladly accepted.

0831180509002061--.name: But then he hollered, "I'll burn you all!" and shot a giant fireball at the eels! He would've burned down the whole house, but then he shouted "I'll freeze you all!" and put out the fire with an ice bolt.

0831180509002062--.name: Nothing much happened. Oh, where did time go? I'm not even halfway done with my cooking.

0831180509002063--.name: Time goes by so quickly when I work around the house, but don't you wander off. Your food is almost ready. I made mushroom hot pot for you today to invigorate you.

0831180509002064--.name: Sure, I know something interesting. Sometimes, the food I toil so hard over disappears!

0831180509002065--.name: I don't know how it's possible. Is someone stealing it?

0831180509002066--.name: I never hear footsteps, so it has to be an animal. Maybe a stray cat or something. It's so frustrating!

0831180509002067--.name: What's my specialty, you ask? Hee hee, grilled eels, with a delicious sauce!

0831180509002068--.name: $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ loves them so much that sometimes he stops by my house just to eat them.

0831180509002069--.name: People always tell me I should open a grilled eel restaurant, but I want to keep cooking a hobby, not a job.

0831180509002070--.name: Hmm, a young lady has stopped by a lot recently to visit me. She wants to learn how to cook for her boyfriend. She's a cute girl with glasses... I can't remember her name.

0831180509002071--.name: Yesterday, I taught her how to cook mushroom hot pot. I showed her how to prepare the $npc:21000001$, and suddenly she paled and burst into tears.

0831180509002072--.name: She said the $npc:21000001$ looked so pitiful that she couldn't chop them up. Ahh, she may be too soft-hearted to be a good cook.

0831180509002073--.name: To me, cooking is all about love. From deciding the menu to picking the ingredients to the actual preparation, I think about who I'm feeding and what would make them happy.

0831180509002074--.name: That's why you should try to enjoy the food that I cook for you, even if it isn't your favorite. Got it?

0831180509002075--.name: Good ingredients make good food. Speaking of which, did you know $map:2000076$ is stocked with amazing ingredients?

0831180509002076--.name: Fresh eggs, milk, pork, beef, chicken, and even fish. I lived in $map:2000076$ when I was young, and that's part of the reason I got into cooking. That's also probably why the people who live in $map:2000076$ are generally good cooks.

0831180509002077--.name: Today's pudding is especially well-made. I'll invite my son over to eat some, too. Sometimes, that kid can get more curious than this mama can handle!

0831180509002078--.name: My son's name is $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$. You might have seen him in $map:2000001$.

0831180509002079--.name: He keeps forgetting to return books to the library on time, and $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ the librarian is not happy about it. But what can I say? My boy is just too curious for his own good!

0831180509002080--.name: I'm a little worried that all he does is read, though. Children his age need to go out and play!

0831180509002081--.name: This pudding is $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$'s favorite. Speaking of which, I wonder if he's feeding himself right... Huh? Who's $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$?

0831180509002082--.name: We met in $map:2000001$. $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ loves him because he tells him all kinds of interesting tales about things that he's seen while traveling the world selling his wares.

0831180509002083--.name: In fact, my son loves him so much that every time he goes over to $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$'s house, he stays there until way past dinnertime.

0831180509002084--.name:
$npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ has mentioned more than once that he wants to quit being a
hawker and settle down somewhere. I don't know how he's doing with that. Buying a house is never easy.

0831180509002085--.name: Did you skip lunch today? You can't go on adventures if you don't take care of yourself! You know, not even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ gets food as delicious as this!

0831180509002086--.name: ...Huh? $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ wants to know about his father. He grows more mature each day...

0831180509002087--.name: $OwnerName$, you look like you're curious , too. $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$'s father... He... He went on a journey to a far away place. That was... wow, it was seven years ago.

0831180509002088--.name: I haven't heard from him since. Everyone tells me I should move on, but I don't want to. I know he'll come back one day.

0831180509002089--.name: Hm, maybe I shouldn't have told you that. You look like you want to pepper me with more questions, but please understand, there are some things I'd rather not talk about.

0831180509002090--.name: What do I think of $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$? Don't be silly. Sure, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is a good man, and I like that he loves my cooking.

0831180509002091--.name: $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ reminds me of the good old days. I may be an old lady now, but I used to be quite popular amongst the gentlemen.

0831180509002092--.name: I live in $map:2000001$ now, but originally I came from $map:2000076$. Believe it or not, I used to be as pretty as $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$, and I was good at cooking even then. All the fellows used to come to $map:2000076$ just to see me.

0831180509002093--.name: There was one fellow who left a bunch of wildflowers on my doorstep every day. I thought he was a good man, but he never asked me out. Hmph, you don't draw your sword unless you intend to use it, you know!

0831180509002094--.name: Anyway, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ looks just like that fellow. That's why he reminds me of the old days.

0831180509002095--.name: Mm? I don't think I've seen you before. What brings you to this residence?

0831180509002097--.name: I thought the house was empty.

0831180509002099--.name: You must be smelling my pudding. Mm? Are you hungry? I'm sorry, but I'm only making four servings each time: for me, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$, $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$, and $OwnerName$.

0831180509002100--.name: You're not the first to venture here while following their nose! My cooking skills are quite renowned in $map:2000001$. Today I'm making my special: grilled eels.

0831180509002101--.name: Oh, don't say that. You must be tired coming all the way out here. Have a seat and put your feet up. You can help me peel the garlic if you want.

0831180509002102--.name: That's what everyone who comes into the house says. Hm, I'd better do something about that. I'll to talk to $OwnerName$ and see if we can put up a doorplate.

0831180509002103--.name: I help with the housework, but I'm so much more than just a servant. You know, the owner wouldn't remember to eat without my constant reminders. Speaking of which, have you had breakfast, young adventurer?

0831180509002104--.name: My name is $MaidName$, and I'm help with the housework. If you're going to $map:2000001$, could you tell my son that I want him to come over for some pudding? His name is $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$.

0831180509002105--.name: Just leave the housework to me.

0831180509002106--.name: Sheesh, this house is a mess.

0831180509002110--.name: You wiped your feet before you came in, right?

0831180509002111--.name: I need to trim our grocery budget...

0831180509002112--.name: It's important not to waste a single meso.

0831180509002116--.name: More of the food has disappeared...

0831180509002117--.name: What should I cook for dinner tonight?

0831180509002121--.name: $OwnerName$, welcome home. Huh? N-no, I wasn't waiting for you or anything...

0831180509002122--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002123--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002125--.name: I'm busy. If you have something to say, just say it.

0831180509002126--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002127--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002130--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002131--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002133--.name: $OwnerName$, welcome home. Huh? N-no, I wasn't waiting for you or anything...

0831180509002134--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002135--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002137--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002138--.name: I'm busy. If you have something to say, just say it.

0831180509002139--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002140--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002142--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002144--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002145--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002147--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002148--.name: Huh? Do you want to give me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509002149--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509002151--.name: I hope you're not expecting me to thank you. I earned this. But it does motivate me to work harder...

0831180509002152--.name: Okay, fine, thank you. But let me make one thing clear: I'm not doing this because I like you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509002153--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Her eyes get misty.)</font>
Oh! How...? I'm not crying, you idiot. I've just got something in my eye!

0831180509002154--.name: Sheesh, took you long enough! Make sure it doesn't happen again! It... makes me so worried.

0831180509002155--.name: Hey, our contract expires soon. You wouldn't want to forget and for me to go away, would you? Right??

0831180509002157--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002158--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002160--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002161--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509002162--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002163--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002165--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002166--.name: If you're bored, why don't you help around the house?

0831180509002167--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002168--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002170--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002171--.name: There's a really good fish market in $map:02000111$. Maybe you should check it out.

0831180509002172--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002173--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002175--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002176--.name: This is pathetic. Ugh. Fine, whatever. Things happen. So you don't have money to may me right now. Fine.

0831180509002177--.name: Can't you even keep track of your own expenses, $OwnerName$? You've already paid me this month! Sheesh!

0831180509002178--.name: You can't fool me! I knew you weren't going to pay me. Are you really this stupid?

0831180509002179--.name: Mm? This is all your fault, $OwnerName$. You take care of it. N-not that I need your help to fix this!

0831180509002180--.name: ...You can ask all you want, but I'm not going to craft anything for you right now.

0831180509002181--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002182--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002184--.name: I've got nothing to do. Maybe I should go visit $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$...

0831180509002185--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002186--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002188--.name: Did you just ask if I'm okay? You dummy, you know I'm not!

0831180509002189--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002190--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002192--.name: $OwnerName$... You let my contract expire. I really need this job!

0831180509002193--.name: Stop trying to change the subject! Our contract has expired. I warned you so many times, but you didn't listen! How are you still alive?!

0831180509002194--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid. Any good news?

0831180509002195--.name: Ugh, why do I even bother to ask?

0831180509002196--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002197--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002199--.name: $OwnerName$, I really don't know what you're thinking.

0831180509002200--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002201--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002203--.name: Maybe it's time we go our separate ways. I can't wait for you like this forever, you know. Maybe I should just go back to mom and help her with her business...

0831180509002204--.name: We should've opened a bed and breakfast like I suggested. I can't believe things have gotten so bad that you can't even pay me.

0831180509002205--.name: Am I worried about you? N-no, why would I be? S-stop being delusional. A-and stop looking at me with those doe eyes!

0831180509002206--.name: Sure, you've come to the best.

0831180509002207--.name: Maybe I should do this for a living.

0831180509002208--.name: Wh-why are you staring at me like that?

0831180509002209--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509002210--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002211--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002213--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509002214--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002215--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002217--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002218--.name: I wonder how my mom's shop is doing...

0831180509002223--.name: I know I'm here to help, but you can pick up your clothes at least!

0831180509002233--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509002234--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002235--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002237--.name: If you're bored, why don't you help around the house?

0831180509002238--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002239--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002241--.name: There's a really good fish market in $map:02000111$. Maybe you should check it out.

0831180509002242--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002243--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002245--.name: I want to ask you something. I don't know if you know this, but my mom has a fish market in $map:02000111$.

0831180509002246--.name: I've helped her with her business since I was young. Then suddenly, she says I should stop helping her and start doing what I want to do.

0831180509002247--.name: But her shop hasn't been doing well, and she has no one else to help her. What do you think I should do, $OwnerName$?

0831180509002249--.name: Listen to your mama and follow your heart.

0831180509002251--.name: How can you treat me this way?!

0831180509002252--.name: You think so? I guess you're not useless after all, $OwnerName$. Hmm...

0831180509002253--.name: I see. Thank you for your input.

0831180509002255--.name: Have you been to $map:02000137$? I run errands there for my mom. Recently the whole place has been turned upside down because of someone named $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$.

0831180509002256--.name: I asked someone who $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ was, and she rolled her eyes and told me I was an idiot. But I think she's the idiot. She cried and fainted when he showed up.

0831180509002258--.name: It takes a lot of passion to care that much.

0831180509002259--.name: But maybe I shouldn't have called her an idiot to her face. That wasn't nice.

0831180509002260--.name: I've got to admit, though, he was pretty handsome. Those eyes... That hair... Hmm, maybe I've got a thing for $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ too...

0831180509002261--.name: You have a point. Maybe I should try to understand what makes $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ so popular.

0831180509002262--.name: Hmmm. I didn't think about it that way. Why do you think $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is so popular? It's really... kind of intriguing... Hmm...

0831180509002263--.name: Don't you think this house is too big for just two of us?

0831180509002264--.name: How about we turn it into a bed and breakfast? $OwnerName$, you're almost never home, anyway. This will let us make extra money and meet new people!

0831180509002265--.name: I'm not really asking for approval. I already posted an ad on a display in $map:02000100$. Teehee!

0831180509002266--.name: Nothing really happened, but... $OwnerName$, what's this gash on your arm? Did a monster hurt you?

0831180509002267--.name: ...Wh-what? Why are you staring at me like that? D-don't think I asked because I was worried about you!

0831180509002268--.name: You're the one who pays me. Of course, I don't want you to get hurt. G-get it?

0831180509002269--.name: I went to $map:02000100$ and saw a masked man. He was tall, had red eyes, and was clad in black from head to toe. $npcName:11000233[gender:1]$ said he might be the famous $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$.

0831180509002270--.name: $OwnerName$, have you heard of $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$? No? Well, he just looked so different from everyone else. I want to know if the rumors about him are true!

0831180509002271--.name: Huh? You haven't heard the rumors? If you're so curious, then why don't you go to $map:02000100$ and find out yourself?

0831180509002272--.name: Have you been to $map:02000153$? It's the stronghold of Dark Wind, an organization led by $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

0831180509002273--.name: The organizations claims to protect the peace of $map:02000100$, but not everyone seems to agree.

0831180509002274--.name: $npcName:11000233[gender:1]$ said things were much better when Dark Wind was led by its former captain. Mm, what was his name? Winn Stilton, I think?

0831180509002275--.name: What happened to him? I don't know exactly. I heard he died in an accident.

0831180509002276--.name: You'd know if you visited $map:02000100$ how rotten the whole city is.

0831180509002277--.name: And that's not going to change until Goldus Group stops being so greedy. I have no faith in Dark Wind or the mayor.

0831180509002278--.name: Have you been to $map:02000092$? The water there is no longer drinkable because of $map:02000084$.

0831180509002279--.name: That's not the only problem. $map:02000111$ is infested with angry giant turtles who have been forced from their homes due to the contamination.

0831180509002280--.name: Worse still, $map:02000138$ is a slum now. What's the mayor doing? He says he's making the city better, but why are people becoming poorer?

0831180509002281--.name: Ugh! This guy named $npcName:11000362[gender:0]$ set up a stall right next to Mom's shop!

0831180509002282--.name: He sells $itemPlural:30000140$, and it's totally affecting Mom's business!

0831180509002283--.name: He could've bought some fish from Mom to put in his corn dogs, but nooooo. He doesn't care about anyone but himself!

0831180509002284--.name: I wonder how Mrs. $npc:11000424[gender:1]$ is doing. If you go to $map:02000100$, could you send her my regards?

0831180509002285--.name: Her only granddaughter is missing. I can't imagine how devastating it must be to her.

0831180509002286--.name: Her name is Maggie, and she's a friend of mine. She was being treated in $map:02000071$ when she suddenly disappeared.

0831180509002287--.name: Some time ago, I heard a strange rumor. Maggie had a doll that she loved, and a monster that looks just like her doll has shown up.

0831180509002288--.name: A monster that resembles her doll... What do you think happened to Maggie?

0831180509002289--.name: Right now, Mom and I are living in $map:02000111$. It was less than two years ago when we moved to where we are now, near $map:02000100$.

0831180509002290--.name: We used to live in $map:02000062$. Mom said she decided to move to the big city for her business, but I know the truth: it was for my future.

0831180509002291--.name: But I can't seem to get used to the dreary city life. The rich get richer and the poor get poorer. Everyone's too busy with their lives to care about anyone else. Sometimes, I miss the days when I lived in $map:02000062$.

0831180509002292--.name: ...Gosh, wh-why am I even telling you this? Forget I said anything.

0831180509002293--.name: This is embarrassing, but I haven't found my passion. I don't know what I want to do for the rest of my life.

0831180509002294--.name: $npcName:11000788[gender:0]$ may be a big mouth, but he has a dream and that's to become an adventurer. $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ seems to have achieved his dream, which I guess is to become every girl's dream.

0831180509002295--.name: As for me, I still don't know what I want to do or what I'm good at.

0831180509002296--.name: I like helping my mom, but it doesn't fill the void inside me. And sometimes I envy others my age when I look at them.

0831180509002297--.name: $OwnerName$, I never thought I'd talk to you like this. I feel better now that I got that off my chest.

0831180509002298--.name: Hello! Looking for a place to stay?

0831180509002302--.name: Then you came to the right place! I'm in the process of turning this place into a bed and breakfast. Please come back again when it's ready, okay?

0831180509002303--.name: I knew it! It's 10,000 mesos for the night. Don't worry about the owner. I promise nobody will bother you!

0831180509002304--.name: ...Y-you're not? Well, good! I wasn't going to offer to let you stay here anyway.

0831180509002305--.name: Hmm? Then why are you here? Hmm? Hmmmm?

0831180509002306--.name: Didn't you see my ad in Kerning City? I'm transforming this into a bed and breakfast! I hope you'll come stay here when it's ready.

0831180509002307--.name: I'm thinking about launching a bed and breakfast business. Of course, I'll have to talk to get permission first. Teehee!

0831180509002309--.name: Well, I hope we get along.

0831180509002312--.name: D-don't think I'm happy to see you because I'm not.

0831180509002313--.name: I haven't seen you for so long, I almost forgot how you look.

0831180509002325--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002326--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002328--.name: Scanning target... Beep! $OwnerName$ has been recognized.

0831180509002329--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002330--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002334--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002351--.name: Do you want to give me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509002352--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509002354--.name: Ding, ding! You have renewed your contract! Thank you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509002355--.name: Ding, ding! You have renewed your contract! I will serve you until I am no longer of use, $OwnerName$!

0831180509002356--.name: Ding! Paycheck received! Canceling service disconnection... Vrroomm...

0831180509002357--.name: Ding! Paycheck received! Canceling maximum power saver mode... Checking system status... Beep! Beep! Beep!

0831180509002358--.name: Beep! Alert, $OwnerName$: our contract expires in a few days.

0831180509002359--.name: When our contract expires, my main system will automatically shut down.

0831180509002360--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509002361--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002363--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002366--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002368--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509002371--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509002373--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)
