0831180509003494--.name: Very well. I accept your terms. I hope you weren't expecting any thanks... I'm sure I've earned this.

0831180509003495--.name: Confirmed. I accept the position. We have a great working relationship, as long as you continue to maintain a professional distance.

0831180509003496--.name: $OwnerName$, our contract expires soon. No need to thank me. Managing your schedule is part of my job.

0831180509003497--.name: Just don't make me repeat myself.

0831180509003498--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003499--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003501--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003503--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003504--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003506--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003507--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003508--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003509--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003511--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003513--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003514--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003516--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003517--.name: Ah, I expected this. Anyone can see that you're pretty wasteful.

0831180509003518--.name: You're even more financially inept than I anticipated. What I mean is, you've already paid me this month.

0831180509003519--.name: Yes, I already knew this would happen. I keep tabs on your bank account, you know. Please don't waste my time on this again. Now, I have some documents to sort through...

0831180509003520--.name: This is hardly ideal. Please don't allow this to happen again.

0831180509003522--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003523--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003525--.name: Time is money, and... aren't your broke? Make this quick.

0831180509003526--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003527--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003529--.name: Our contract has expired. What else is there to discuss?

0831180509003530--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003531--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003533--.name: My contract has expired, and I live and breath by contracts. I can't work until you sign a new one.

0831180509003534--.name: I'm stunned. Did you realize our contract expired, even after I reminded you? So let's talk about that. How could you let this happen?

0831180509003535--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since our contract expired. You don't need to give me any excuses.

0831180509003537--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003538--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003540--.name: If you don't have anything important to say, I'd like to go. Do you mind?

0831180509003541--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003542--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003544--.name: I don't have time to look after you unless you rehire me, but I'm not leaving either. My desk here is set up just the way I like it. So don't mind me. Just do whatever it is you need to do.

0831180509003545--.name: You've been acting so strange lately, not at all like yourself. What are you up to?

0831180509003546--.name: You want a drink? Really? Do you realize our contract remains unsigned? Now, excuse me. I have business to take care of.

0831180509003549--.name: Please, let's not mix business with pleasure.

0831180509003551--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003552--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003555--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003556--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003558--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003559--.name: I'm rather busy, so make this quick.

0831180509003575--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003576--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003578--.name: $OwnerName$, let's go over your schedule for the day...

0831180509003579--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003580--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003583--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003584--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003586--.name: Be straight with me for a minute.

0831180509003587--.name: You know I'm not working for you because I like you...

0831180509003588--.name: So... why don't you just let me go?

0831180509003589--.name: Hey, your skills are top notch.

0831180509003591--.name: Talking to you makes me feel like I'm losing brain cells.

0831180509003592--.name: Am I really stuck with you?

0831180509003593--.name: Ah, perfect. That's just the way I like it.

0831180509003594--.name: I appreciate your honesty. I may have been wrong about you.

0831180509003595--.name: Why are you staring at me?

0831180509003596--.name: I'm used to people glaring at me at the Black Market, sure, but...

0831180509003597--.name: I don't enjoy being gawked at by you. Please try to stop.

0831180509003600--.name: Perhaps there is such a thing as too much honesty, after all...

0831180509003601--.name: ... Does that mean you're not going to stop?

0831180509003602--.name: Oh. Well, you don't have to go that far. Now things are uncomfortable...

0831180509003603--.name: So you won't do it anymore? Good.

0831180509003605--.name: Some men in masks barged into the house, demanding I hand over everything of value.

0831180509003607--.name: Even in my pencil skirt, I was able to bruise them up pretty good. I'm a certified instructor in several forms of martial arts.

0831180509003608--.name: No need to look so shocked. In my line of work, self-defense is essential. Money makes people desperate, which can lead to crazy behavior, and I have to be able to make decisions without worrying about that.

0831180509003609--.name: $OwnerName$, while you were out, $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ called once and $npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called twice.

0831180509003610--.name: $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ stated that he received new product, which he thought you might be interested in.

0831180509003611--.name: $npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called because he can't get a hold of $npcName:11000106[gender:1]$ and was wondering if you knew where she was.

0831180509003612--.name: Later, he called back to ask my name. I guess that part isn't really relevant.

0831180509003613--.name: Now, excuse me. I have some goods to oversee.

0831180509003615--.name: It's a good thing I just made this special juice. Drink it. It'll give you an energy boost.

0831180509003616--.name: I whipped it up myself. Maybe we should name it.

0831180509003617--.name: It has a whole $npcName:21000001$ in it. How about we call it... Power Mush?

0831180509003618--.name: Most of the objects traded at the $map:02000216$ are rare and expensive.

0831180509003619--.name: Why is the $map:02000216$ such a popular place to sell? It should be obvious.

0831180509003620--.name: The $map:02000216$ is the only place you can trade valuable items quickly and safely.

0831180509003621--.name: More importantly, you can remain anonymous. We don't ask questions about where you obtained your item at the $map:02000216$. All we care about is how much it's worth.

0831180509003622--.name: Today was exhausting. Funny how all it takes is a little ignorance to ruin your day, isn't it? We had a new customer show up at the $map:02000216$.

0831180509003623--.name: He paid an exorbitant price for a cheap item without researching what he was buying.

0831180509003624--.name: After he realized it, he raised a real ruckus, screaming that he'd been scammed, we'd hear from his lawyer, yadda yadda.

0831180509003625--.name: It's not our fault he made a poor purchase. Even if we wanted to help, our policy at the $map:02000216$ is to never release the personal information of our sellers.

0831180509003626--.name: Even you aren't above that policy, $OwnerName$, so be careful what you purchase and sell at the $map:02000216$.

0831180509003627--.name: Are you trying to ask about Blackstar? I had no idea you were even aware of that organization.

0831180509003628--.name: Does this mean you've also heard of $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$? What exactly is it that you want to know?

0831180509003629--.name: $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$ is one of the $map:02000216$'s many sponsors. He was instrumental in the establishment of the market.

0831180509003630--.name: Do I hear suspicion in your tone? Are you trying to ruin our business relationship?

0831180509003631--.name: I'm perfectly aware that not everyone has a positive opinion of our business...

0831180509003632--.name: But no one can deny that the $map:02000216$ has helped revitalize the economy in the area.

0831180509003633--.name: Most of the citizens of $map:02000100$, including Mayor $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$, support us. We've made ourselves vital, and now we're unstoppable.

0831180509003634--.name: Ah, this is specifically covered in our contract.

0831180509003635--.name: You'll see in Section IV, Article 17, that for the duration of my period in your employ, you are not to pry into my personal business.

0831180509003636--.name: Now, if you're done trying to break the rules of our contract, I'd like to return to work.

0831180509003637--.name: Such persistence, $OwnerName$! What exactly do you want to know so terribly much?

0831180509003638--.name: My work history? My childhood? My relationship with my family?

0831180509003639--.name: None of that makes a bit of difference. I know who I am: one of the top traders at the $map:02000216$ and your personal secretary. Does the rest matter?

0831180509003640--.name: I do have a hypothetical quandary to discuss with you. I'm interested in your opinion.

0831180509003641--.name: Say there was a girl who grew up in the slums of $map:02000100$. An orphan, with no memory of her parents, begging and stealing and trying to survive.

0831180509003642--.name: Let's say one day she tried to steal a man's wallet and was caught.

0831180509003643--.name: To her surprise, instead of throwing her in jail, the man made a joke, admired her cleverness, then took her to his home, where he gave her clean clothes, a delicious meal, and a safe place to sleep, away from the vultures at the $map:02000100$

0831180509003644--.name: She was so grateful for his kindness, she became determined to pay him back in any way she could. He had changed her life.

0831180509003645--.name: For the next few decades, she worked tirelessly for that man. But then, one day, she learned that was he was doing was... morally abhorrent.

0831180509003646--.name: Since then, she's been torn, unsure whether to follow her moral inclinations or remain loyal to the man who had saved her from a life on the streets. What would you do, if you were her? Remember, I'm asking for a friend.

0831180509003647--.name: You seem awfully curious to find out why I took on secretarial duties.

0831180509003648--.name: Let's just say... I'm doing it as a favor for someone who's been like a father to me since I was a child.

0831180509003649--.name: I'm here to track your every move. That's all I can tell you.

0831180509003650--.name: As for who this man is... Heh. I don't know, why don't you try to find out? It could be someone you know.

0831180509003652--.name: I'm here to see the owner.

0831180509003655--.name: Did you? Strange. I don't have you in the schedule...

0831180509003656--.name: If that's the case, please call me to schedule an appointment first.

0831180509003657--.name: Interesting. If you have business with me, please come see me at the $map:02000216$ instead.

0831180509003658--.name: Do I look like I have time for games?

0831180509003659--.name: I am $MaidName$, $OwnerName$'s personal secretary. And you are...?

0831180509003660--.name: I am the secretary of the owner of this house. Now, care to explain why you barged in uninvited?

0831180509003661--.name: Hello. My name is $MaidName$. From this moment on, I am your secretary.

0831180509003662--.name: Please refrain from asking personal questions.

0831180509003663--.name: May I ask who you are?

0831180509003666--.name: I hope you'll let me know if you're going to be late.

0831180509003670--.name: Yes? Why are you staring at me?

0831180509003671--.name: I'll adjust your schedule for the day.

0831180509003672--.name: Let me give you a briefing of your day.

0831180509003676--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509003678--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003679--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003682--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003683--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003686--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003687--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003690--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003691--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003693--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003695--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003696--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003698--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003700--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003701--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003703--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003704--.name: You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003705--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003707--.name:
Time passes so quickly. Perhaps it's because I'm with you, $OwnerName$.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003708--.name: You're paying me already? Hey, that makes you my favorite person today.

0831180509003709--.name: You've been neglecting me, $OwnerName$. I don't like it. Not one bit. If it's because I haven't had time to hang out with you, well, I suppose that makes us even. Let's make up.

0831180509003710--.name: And here I thought you were a lost cause. Things have been tough lately, haven't they? Here, how about a pat on the back? Haha.

0831180509003711--.name: $OwnerName$, did you know our contract expires soon?

0831180509003712--.name: I know you're busy, but you need to pay attention to me sometimes.

0831180509003713--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003714--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003716--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003717--.name: $OwnerName$, things have been so boring here without you.

0831180509003718--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003719--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003721--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003722--.name: Come on, loosen up a bit. Aren't we friends?

0831180509003723--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003724--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003726--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003727--.name: I'm tired. Maybe I should take a nap...

0831180509003728--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003729--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003731--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003732--.name: Aw, $OwnerName$. This is just like when you tell your friends you'll treat them to dinner and the restaurant tells you your card's been declined. It's okay. I understand. Don't worry about me.

0831180509003733--.name: You feeling all right? You've already paid me this month. Let me feel your forehead.

0831180509003734--.name: This is really not the time to make jokes, $OwnerName$. I'm not in the mood. I'm serious!

0831180509003735--.name: Can't believe this is happening to me. Never in my life... Just, give me a minute, okay?

0831180509003736--.name: Okay. It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid. Please tell me you have good news.

0831180509003737--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003738--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003740--.name: Can't eat... Can't sleep... My mind just keeps spinning and spinning...

0831180509003741--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003742--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003744--.name: Before I got my big break, things were tough. Real tough. Been thinking about that a lot lately.

0831180509003745--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003746--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003748--.name: Wait, my alarm went off, but I don't have a shoot scheduled... Oh, right. $OwnerName$, my contract expired.

0831180509003749--.name: Why are we talking about that when you let my contract expire. $OwnerName$, give it to my straight. You don't want me around any more?

0831180509003750--.name: Honestly, I don't even understand what's going on any more. I'm not used to rejection. I'll be strong, though.

0831180509003751--.name: But that doesn't mean you should stop worrying about me.

0831180509003752--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003753--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003755--.name: $OwnerName$, just tell me. Don't you want me around any more?

0831180509003756--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003757--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003759--.name: $OwnerName$, I enjoy being around you. But I guess the feeling's not mutual.

0831180509003760--.name: I cook for for you, clean for you, make healthy smoothies for you, give you gifts I got from my fans... Wait, is that what this is about? Because I gave you gifts from my fans?

0831180509003761--.name: $OwnerName$, maybe you should give me control of your accounts in the future. I mean, what are you doing with your money that you can't even pay me?

0831180509003762--.name: Sure, sure. Just say the word.

0831180509003763--.name: I don't mind doing stuff for you.

0831180509003764--.name: I don't mind being stared at, but it makes me blush. Heh.

0831180509003765--.name: Don't worry about me too much.

0831180509003766--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003767--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003769--.name: Don't worry about me too much.

0831180509003770--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003771--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003773--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003784--.name: All right, what do you want to talk about?

0831180509003789--.name: $OwnerName$, things have been so boring here without you.

0831180509003790--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003791--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003793--.name: Come on, loosen up a bit. Aren't we friends?

0831180509003794--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003795--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003797--.name: I'm tired. Maybe I should take a nap...

0831180509003798--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003799--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003801--.name: It's been a while since I had to cook. And I've never really cooked for, you know, someone special. Feels kind of nice.

0831180509003802--.name: Instead of MSG, I put in an extra dose of awesome. Because I'm awesome, get it?

0831180509003803--.name: I can't really tell what flavor you're going for.

0831180509003805--.name: Yeah, everyone tells me my tastes are unique. Might take you some time to get used to it. Not bad, though, right?

0831180509003806--.name: Heh, sorry. Like I said, I don't cook much. Next time, I'll just have something delivered.

0831180509003807--.name: Eat up! I can always make more if you want. I mean, it might take me a while, but I don't mind.

0831180509003808--.name: Uh, yeah? I mean, I made it, didn't I? Of course it's good. I mean, after my last performance, I'm pretty much an artist and cooking is an art, so, you know... the math works.

0831180509003809--.name: I whipped this up just to see if I enjoy cooking. Have a bite?

0831180509003810--.name: Don't give me that look. You know I can't eat it with you. I've got gigs coming up. I've got to watch my weight.

0831180509003812--.name: But you can just do a few extra sit-ups later!

0831180509003813--.name: Hey, my exercise regimen is a delicate balance. Besides, my trainer would kill me.

0831180509003814--.name: I know you can't see through my clothes, but you don't get as cut as I do eating whatever you want. It takes discipline.

0831180509003815--.name:
I do, don't I? I inherited some amazing genes.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003816--.name: Can't stop checking me out, can you? I get it. My good looks outshine even my singing and acting skills.

0831180509003817--.name: My company sent me this juicer...

0831180509003818--.name: It's supposed to be able to juice up anything you throw in it. I had to test it out. Here, $OwnerName$, have a taste.

0831180509003821--.name: What? You're rejecting me? Somewhere, some of my fans are about to riot.

0831180509003822--.name: C'mon, I didn't put anything bad in it. At least, smell it! C'mere...

0831180509003823--.name: How is it? Tasty? This is such a great way to clear the fridge of old veggies.

0831180509003824--.name: Hey, you look good when you drink. Have another sip. Yeah, that's it. Now, hold it right there. Amazing!

0831180509003825--.name: Did I tell you I was on a cooking show a while back, $OwnerName$? I thought you might like one of the dishes, so I had them send me the recipe.

0831180509003826--.name: Just think! The exquisiteness of fine cuisine from the comfort of your own home. Let me feed you a bite. And... how is it?

0831180509003829--.name: Ah, yeah. To be expected from a plebeian unaccustomed to the finer things in life. Don't worry, I'll teach you how to enjoy fine dining.

0831180509003830--.name: Oops. Now that I think about it, I may have skipped a step or two of the recipe...

0831180509003831--.name: Of course it is! It's a great recipe prepared by a great guy!

0831180509003832--.name: I'm glad you enjoyed it. Maybe I should have them send me all their best and most secret recipes. Wouldn't you like to try them?

0831180509003833--.name: I got this from a fan, but I'm not quite sure of its purpose...

0831180509003834--.name: Anyway, I have no use for it. Maybe you do, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003835--.name: Oh, no, it's too much. I can't accept that.

0831180509003837--.name: Suit yourself. I'll just keep it.

0831180509003838--.name: Did you just reject me, $OwnerName$? Hah, that's not really something I'm used to...

0831180509003839--.name: Do you even know what it is? Can you... explain how it works?

0831180509003840--.name: Right-o. Just don't tell anyone. I wouldn't want to upset my fans.

0831180509003841--.name: My agent forwarded this to me. It's from the Moms Who Love $MaidName$ fan club.

0831180509003842--.name: Hey, I'm just really lovable, okay? Anyway, I don't need it. You can keep it if you want.

0831180509003844--.name: Gross. This was meant for you.

0831180509003845--.name: Hey, I'm just trying to spread the love. Why is that a problem?

0831180509003846--.name: You don't want it? But it's nice. I'll donate it to a charity auction, I guess.

0831180509003847--.name: Great! I'm glad it's going to a good home. I love all my fans but I've already got too much stuff like that.

0831180509003848--.name: Thanks to my fans, you're getting all kinds of free goodies for your house, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003849--.name: I was using the vacuum to practices some poses when something strange got sucked into it. My curiosity got the best of me, so I opened it up and found this.

0831180509003850--.name: You shouldn't leave stuff like this just sitting around, you know.

0831180509003854--.name: If the vacuum did break, why don't you just get a robot vacuum?

0831180509003855--.name: Remember how I had to spot you for the food delivery guy last time? Well, maybe you should keep your mesos somewhere you can find it for next time.

0831180509003856--.name: Keep your mesos close and your $MaidName$ closer, you know. Hahaha.

0831180509003858--.name: Oh, I got a commercial proposal.

0831180509003859--.name: For an anti-dandruff shampoo, I think.

0831180509003860--.name: There is nothing more special than this moment right here, right now with you, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003861--.name: Just soak it in, $OwnerName$. This moment, free from the raving masses of fans, free to do whatever I want.

0831180509003862--.name: Whew, close one. Even wearing a hat, sunglasses, and even a mask, someone recognized me.

0831180509003863--.name: He kept following me with his camera. I had to circle the neighborhood several times before I snuck away.

0831180509003864--.name: Fame is stressful. You hear me, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003865--.name: A single word of encouragement from you, $OwnerName$, gives me more strength than the support of all the rest of my fans added together.

0831180509003866--.name: Let's not fight and be good to each other always.

0831180509003867--.name: Sometimes my heart races, and I think there's gotta be cameras hidden around the house somewhere. I just get so used to them, you know?

0831180509003868--.name:
Why am I so fearful of a hidden camera? I'll let you figure that one out.
<font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>

0831180509003869--.name: You wanna hear my secret, how I captivate my audience?

0831180509003870--.name: I pick one girl and stare at her throughout my performance. I tell myself, "doesn't matter if I'm the handsomest guy here tonight or not, I will make that one girl mine."

0831180509003871--.name: You should see the dreamy look those girls get. Because, let's face it, I'm always the handsomest guy around.

0831180509003872--.name: Why are you giving me that look? You know it's true!

0831180509003873--.name: I'm surprised you even care. Do you want to become a singer, $OwnerName$? Or do you just want to know about me?

0831180509003874--.name: When the going gets tough, the tough come home.

0831180509003875--.name: You know I'll always be here to welcome you home, don't you, $OwnerName$?

0831180509003876--.name: Why are you smiling? What's the good news? Then again, everyone who looks at me can't help but smile.

0831180509003877--.name: Some of them even forget to close their mouths and start to drool. Might be a cute look on you, $OwnerName$. Hahaha.

0831180509003878--.name: Don't believe the news! It's not true!

0831180509003879--.name: We only had dinner together once! And I haven't seen her since!

0831180509003880--.name: Oh. You haven't seen the news. And you don't care. Well, then.

0831180509003881--.name: A while back, I was practicing my singing when someone banged at the door. I guess I was a little too loud.

0831180509003882--.name: Still, even if it was just practice, I mean, it was me. It should've sounded amazing.

0831180509003883--.name: Maybe that's why she didn't yell. She just glanced around the house one time, then left.

0831180509003884--.name: Before I got my big break, there was this girl I liked. She wanted to be a singer, too, and we practiced together.

0831180509003885--.name: We were both broke, but we'd share what little food we had, practice all night, and wait for the first bus of the day together. But then, right before our debut...

0831180509003886--.name: She fainted in the middle of practice. They rushed her to the hospital, and we found out she was really, really sick. It was her lifelong dream to sing in front of a huge audience, but...

0831180509003887--.name: She died before her dream could come true. What was supposed to be our debut just became my solo debut...

0831180509003888--.name: Why are you giving me that suspicious look? Do you know?!

0831180509003890--.name: I'm a fraud! A big stinkin' liar!

0831180509003891--.name: Of course you figured it out, $OwnerName$. I mean, we live together!

0831180509003892--.name: I just want you to know, I'm going to tell my fans soon, I swear. But I'll say it out loud to your first.

0831180509003893--.name: Ugh, this is tough! Okay... so... the height listed in my profile... it includes the two inches of the heel of my shoes, plus two thick layers of inner soles! Aah, please don't look at me differently now!!

0831180509003894--.name: How can I help you? Oh, let me put on my mask. That's better. Now, are you here to see the owner of this house?

0831180509003898--.name: Really? You're not here for... me? Are you sure? Didn't we meet once at the subway station? Or maybe it was a convenience store? You wanted my autograph, right?

0831180509003899--.name: Whew! I'm so, so, so glad you didn't recognize me! Huh? What? I didn't say anything!

0831180509003900--.name: Ah, so you're a fan? How did you find me? Haha, I can give you an autograph, but please, no pictures. I don't have my make-up on.

0831180509003901--.name: If you're not here for that then... Wait, wait. I got it. You're from a hidden camera show, aren't you? Hah hah, good one. All right, where's the camera?

0831180509003902--.name: That's a secret. It's better if you don't know. I'm sorry I sang so loudly and excellently that you couldn't help but barge in to see my beautiful face, but... well... okay, one autograph won't hurt.

0831180509003903--.name: Excuse me?! You... don't know? Do you live under a rock or something? Hmph.

0831180509003908--.name: You're home awfully late, aren't you?

0831180509003910--.name: I'm feeling a little under the weather...

0831180509003912--.name: The lips, the teeth, the tip of the tongue. Ah ah ahhhh.

0831180509003913--.name: Feeling a bit starstruck, are we?

0831180509003914--.name: My ears itch. Someone must be talking about me.

0831180509003916--.name: If I do it like this...

0831180509003917--.name: I might be a little tired.

0831180509003918--.name: Spider!! ...Oh, it's just a dust ball.

0831180509003921--.name: Hi, $OwnerName$, what can I do for you?

0831180509003922--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003923--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003925--.name: Today is quite wonderful, isn't it?

0831180509003926--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003927--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003929--.name: Hmm... This might be a problem... Maybe?

0831180509003930--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003931--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003933--.name: Hi, $OwnerName$, what can I do for you?

0831180509003934--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003935--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003937--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003938--.name: Today is quite wonderful, isn't it?

0831180509003939--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003940--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003942--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003943--.name: Hmm... This might be a problem... Maybe?

0831180509003944--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003945--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003947--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003948--.name: You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509003949--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509003951--.name: Are you sure you want to pay me already? I won't stop you if you insist, but please make sure people know I didn't request it.

0831180509003952--.name: I got paid! Hmm, should I ask $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ out for lunch? What do you think?

0831180509003953--.name: Where did you get so much money? Well, I'm not complaining...

0831180509003954--.name: Er, last I checked, you didn't have enough money. You d-didn't do anything illegal to get this money, did you? Please let it be known that I never once nagged you for my paycheck, $OwnerName$.

0831180509003955--.name: Excuse me, $OwnerName$. Our employment contract expires in a few days. Just wanted you to know.

0831180509003957--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003958--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003960--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003962--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003963--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003965--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003966--.name: A housekeeper guard is a rather unusual combo, isn't it?

0831180509003967--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003968--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003970--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003971--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509003972--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509003973--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003975--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003976--.name: $OwnerName$, are you going through a hard time? This isn't enough... But before you give me a single meso, have you thought you whether you should even pay me at all?

0831180509003977--.name: Ah... $OwnerName$... You already paid me this month. Now I'm not sure whether to accept or not...

0831180509003978--.name: It's past my payday, but you don't seem to have the money. I'm not sure whether I should ask for my pay or not...

0831180509003979--.name: As the old saying goes, "don't do something unless you're absolutely certain." It seems like you weren't one hundred percent certain. Why don't you try again?

0831180509003980--.name: Hmm... What do I do? ...Huh? Oh, nothing!

0831180509003981--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003982--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003984--.name: Should I do something to keep myself busy? Or should I just keep loafing around? Hmm...

0831180509003985--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003986--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003988--.name: Should I keep doing this or not? I don't know...

0831180509003989--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003990--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003992--.name: How should I word this delicately? Ahem, my contract has expired. I don't work for free! Whew, I said it...

0831180509003993--.name: Hmm, I need to tell $male:him,female:her$ that our contract expired but $male:he,female:she$ just won't stop talking. Is that a strategic ploy? Oh, ahem, you heard me? Well... our contract has expired.

0831180509003994--.name: I got some much-needed rest over the last $MaidPassedDay$, and look how refreshed I look now!

0831180509003995--.name: Th-that doesn't mean I want to rest forever...

0831180509003996--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509003997--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509003999--.name: I don't know what to do...

0831180509004000--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004001--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004003--.name: I've been thinking, $OwnerName$. Maybe you should wait until you're rich to pay me. I don't want you to go hungry, you know?

0831180509004004--.name: Hmm, I can't stand such a messy house, but I'm not a charity, either. I don't think it's right to work without payment. $OwnerName$, just look at those dust bunnies. Are you really okay living in such filth?

0831180509004005--.name: $OwnerName$, if you don't pay your rent, you'll lose your house, and I'll lose my job. But if you do pay your rent... you won't have enough left to pay me. Hmmmm...

0831180509004006--.name: Who says guards can't cut gems, even if it's just a hobby?

0831180509004008--.name: Since you asked, I can tell you, but don't complain if you find it boring.

0831180509004010--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004011--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004014--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004015--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004017--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004020--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard!

0831180509004025--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard!

0831180509004028--.name: I don't know what to do...

0831180509004030--.name: Tell me about the Royal Guard!

0831180509004034--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004035--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004037--.name: A housekeeper guard is a rather unusual combo, isn't it?

0831180509004038--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004039--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004041--.name: Was there something else you needed?

0831180509004042--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004043--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004045--.name: Come to think of it, I'm forgetting something! Or... maybe not?

0831180509004046--.name: It's time I take control of my own life! I'm taking your advice, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004047--.name: I'm going to ask $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ out to eat black noodles with me! I've been in love with her forever. I'm going to tell her how I feel! Right? Should I? I should, shouldn't I?

0831180509004049--.name: Eh, the timing might not be quite right...

0831180509004050--.name: Yeah, I think so too. Girls like her don't go for guys like me, hah hah hah...

0831180509004051--.name: I've waited three years, what's a few more? I can wait as long as needed!

0831180509004052--.name: You think so? R-r-really? I mean, I do, too! Just let me catch my b-b-breath first!

0831180509004053--.name: You've given me the courage I needed. Deep breaths. Deeeeeep breaths. Okay, I'm ready! I'm going to do this!

0831180509004054--.name: I've been doing some serious reflection.

0831180509004055--.name: The other guards think I'm too indecisive. Not a day go by where $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ doesn't scold me.

0831180509004056--.name: Maybe I'm not cut out to be a guard. $OwnerName$, what do you think?

0831180509004057--.name: Yeah, maybe you should give up.

0831180509004058--.name: Are you really giving it your all, though?

0831180509004059--.name: Hah hah, you think so? I knew I shouldn't have joined the Royal Guard.

0831180509004060--.name: Hmmm, let me just... think about it.

0831180509004061--.name: I feel like you just punched me in the face. Thanks for the pep talk.

0831180509004062--.name: You're right. I'm ashamed of myself. I've been whining without even trying my best.

0831180509004063--.name: I've heard a strange noise outside for the past few hours. I hate ignoring it, but it's not like I can go out and check.

0831180509004064--.name: I can't leave the house unattended, you know? What if we get robbed? I don't want that on my head.

0831180509004065--.name: If you want to go investigate the noise yourself, feel free.

0831180509004066--.name: But just to be clear, I never asked you to, okay? I don't want that responsibility.

0831180509004067--.name: I wasn't sure if I should tell you, but $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ stopped by today...

0831180509004068--.name: He wanted to know about the recent increase in the number of adventurers fracturing bones in $map:2000118$.

0831180509004069--.name: Hey, I never asked anyone to do anything. If they volunteer to investigate the quakes and then trip and break some bones, how is that my fault?

0831180509004070--.name: He said he wanted to check out the place himself and then left for $map:2000118$. Ugh, what if $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ gets hurt too?

0831180509004071--.name: I've been told, if I have time to sit around and fret about things, I should do something to change them. So today, I decided to do just that! ...I wonder if it was the right choice.

0831180509004072--.name: A salesman stopped by the house today. Usually, they get annoyed by my indecisiveness and leave, but I was determined to make a purchase today!

0831180509004073--.name: He said this bowl had a self-washing feature. Well... see this oil stain?

0831180509004074--.name: This is why I shouldn't try new things. Ugh.

0831180509004075--.name: I really admire Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. He's the reason the people of $map:2000001$ can sleep at night.

0831180509004076--.name: People often compare $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ with $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$, but I think $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is better.

0831180509004077--.name: It's not because I've seen them fight or anything. It's the way the Empress treats them.

0831180509004078--.name: $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ always looks composed when she talks to $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. She looks at him with unshakable trust in her eyes.

0831180509004079--.name: But she's different in front of $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. She looks disconcerted and worried. No one else makes her look like that.

0831180509004080--.name: In other words, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ has the ability to disarm her. Get it, $OwnerName$?

0831180509004081--.name: Hmm, if i had a worthy rival, I'd be way stronger than I am now. Like, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$!

0831180509004082--.name: Did you know there's a rivalry between $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$? Everyone in $map:2000001$ knows.

0831180509004083--.name: Guard Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and Knight Captain $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were kids.

0831180509004084--.name: They're both really good at fighting, too. A lot of people have high expectations of them, and everyone thinks of them as rivals.

0831180509004085--.name: I don't know if they'd agree, though. One second they're screaming in each others' faces, the next they're fighting enemies, side by side.

0831180509004086--.name: Some folks say $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$ at the armory should be my rival, but he has a long way to go. Hmph.

0831180509004087--.name: The Royal Guard is charged with the safely of the entire $map:2000001$ palace.

0831180509004088--.name: $map:2000001$ is home to the Empress and the nobility. Not a day goes by without an incident of some sort. We have long, grueling shifts.

0831180509004089--.name: Luckily, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ has allowed us to pick up work on the side.

0831180509004090--.name: The truth is, quite a number of people have filed injury claims against me, and I'm not making enough as a guard to pay them all. Just my luck, you know?

0831180509004091--.name: If you're asking because you're thinking of joining the Royal Guard, I suggest you reconsider.

0831180509004092--.name: $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is strict. It takes a tremendous amount of determination and effort to train under him.

0831180509004094--.name: When I lived in $map:2000001$, I never imagined I'd join the Royal Guard. But three years ago, my father applied for me, without telling me.

0831180509004095--.name: If he didn't, I'd still be living happily in $map:2000001$. Being a guard isn't so bad, I guess...

0831180509004096--.name: All I have to do is follow the captain's commands. I don't have to worry about making decisions.

0831180509004097--.name: Whenever I can't decide something, someone else comes along and decides for me. What more could I ask for?

0831180509004098--.name: $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ said we could apply for different responsibilities if we wanted to. I'm getting tired of investigating the quakes in $map:2000118$, so I considered it.

0831180509004099--.name: I thought about applying for front gate duties in $map:2000001$, but then realized I didn't want to deal with tourists.

0831180509004100--.name: I also didn't want to fight on the front lines in $map:2000146$ because I don't want to get hurt.

0831180509004101--.name: I would love to try new things, but when I start thinking about them, I get so worried and can't make up my mind.

0831180509004102--.name: Hmmm, I think I'm going to have to mull this over for a week or two.

0831180509004103--.name: Have I told you about $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$? She works in front of $map:2000001$ $map:2000188$ to help travelers find their way.

0831180509004104--.name: One time, I was standing in front of $map:2000188$, unable to decide what I should eat for over an hour. Did I want black noodles or spicy noodles? Suddenly $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ showed up and handed me a bowl of black noodles.

0831180509004105--.name: She solved my dilemma so easily! How could I not fall in love with her right then and there? I don't know if $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ knows how I feel about her, though.

0831180509004106--.name: I miss $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$... I've been trying to decide for hours. Should I go to $map:2000001$ to see her?

0831180509004107--.name: Should I tell her my true feelings?

0831180509004108--.name:
You see, I'm not the only one with a major crush on 
$npcName:11000160[gender:1]$. I think $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$ from the armory also likes her.

0831180509004109--.name: If $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ rejects me, it'll make things so awkward. If she doesn't reject me, things would get weird between me and $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$...

0831180509004110--.name: So you understand why I can't decide what to do, right?

0831180509004111--.name: Hmm, you look like a stranger. Oops, should I not have said that?

0831180509004113--.name: I thought the house was empty. My mistake.

0831180509004115--.name: Think about it. If you are a stranger, you might be mad I said that. If you're not a stranger, I just offended the boss's guest.

0831180509004116--.name: Ummm... Give me a moment to think how I should respond. I'm not quite sure what to say...

0831180509004117--.name: Oh, did you? Hmm, what should I do? Let you go, or arrest you for attempted burglary? Hmm...

0831180509004118--.name: Breaking and entering, huh? But what should I do? Contact the royal guard or arrest you myself? Not quite sure about the protocol here. Let me think about this...

0831180509004119--.name: Me? Hmm, should I tell you my name? Or shouldn't I...?

0831180509004120--.name: I'm the man in charge of keeping the house secure! Who are you?

0831180509004122--.name: Hm, should I speak first or not?

0831180509004123--.name: May I ask who you are?

0831180509004124--.name: Hmph, how can you barge into someone else's house like this?

0831180509004126--.name: Should I admit I broke a plate... or not?

0831180509004127--.name: Hmm... Should I speak up... or not?

0831180509004128--.name: Hmm... Should I work... or not?

0831180509004129--.name: Can I move this there... or not?

0831180509004133--.name: I wonder what $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ is doing right now...

0831180509004136--.name: Yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! Anything, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! Oops, sorry! Occupational habit.

0831180509004137--.name: Who's there?! Ah, it's you, $OwnerName$. Heh heh.

0831180509004138--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004139--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004141--.name: The coast is clear, like always!

0831180509004142--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004143--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004145--.name: I'm on duty. Please make it short.

0831180509004146--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004147--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004149--.name: Who's there?! Ah, it's you, $OwnerName$. Heh heh.

0831180509004150--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004151--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004153--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004154--.name: The coast is clear, like always!

0831180509004155--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004156--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004158--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004159--.name: I'm on duty. Please make it short.

0831180509004160--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004161--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004163--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004164--.name: Are you giving me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509004165--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509004167--.name: Whoa, you're paying me already? Thank you much! Teehee! Let's have a feast tonight!

0831180509004168--.name: I needed this! I spent all my money on a preparing a fancy lunch box for $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the other day. Teehee! Thank you, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004169--.name: Yay, you finally have money to pay me! I thought I was going to starve to death. I'm so happy everything worked out!

0831180509004170--.name: Whoa! I was debating whether I should look for another job. It's not because of you, $OwnerName$, promise. But, a girl's gotta eat.

0831180509004171--.name: Hmmm, our contract expires in a few days and I'm running out of money for groceries. Are you planning to pay me soon?

0831180509004173--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004174--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004176--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004178--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004179--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004181--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004183--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004184--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004186--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004187--.name: Is there something else you wanted?

0831180509004188--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004189--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004191--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004192--.name: ...Err? Hah hah! N-nothing. I didn't hear or see anything! Ah... Ah hah hah... Hah hah...

0831180509004193--.name: Um, didn't you already pay me this month?

0831180509004194--.name: I see. It's not that you're intentionally not paying me, you just don't have the money. It is what it is.

0831180509004195--.name: W-wait! Let's no panic! C-calm yourself and try again.

0831180509004197--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004198--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004200--.name: What do you think $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would say if she finds out about this?

0831180509004201--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004202--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004204--.name: The injury I got from training isn't healing well, but I don't have the money to pay ointment for it...

0831180509004205--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004206--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004208--.name: My contract expired. You're not really trying to make me work without pay, are you?

0831180509004209--.name: Excuse me, $OwnerName$, but our contract expired, just like I've been warning you about for days. I can't believe you let it expire!

0831180509004210--.name: I haven't eaten for $MaidPassedDay$. Maybe my injuries aren't healing due to lack of nutrition!

0831180509004212--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004213--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004216--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004217--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004219--.name: Now I know that being neglected is worse than being scolded. $OwnerName$, you don't want me, do you?

0831180509004220--.name: Is this because I gave your food to $npc:11000502[gender:0]$? I hope not. I didn't think you were a petty person.

0831180509004221--.name:
If I die from starvation, please bury me somewhere sunny in $map:02000076$, somewhere close to
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. Don't let her know I suffered... What?! I'm really hungry!!

0831180509004222--.name: I love messing around with beads! I'm good at it, too.

0831180509004223--.name: I can craft stuff for you whenever.

0831180509004224--.name: Our contract includes some details about me.

0831180509004226--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004227--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004230--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004231--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004233--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004239--.name: Everyone in $map:2000076$ should be okay, right?

0831180509004244--.name: I don't have time for chitchat.

0831180509004250--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004251--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004254--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004255--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004257--.name: Is there something else you wanted?

0831180509004258--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004259--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004261--.name: $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$... I wonder if she's eating well...

0831180509004262--.name: $OwnerName$, I want to ask you something. I can't stop thinking about $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. I'm worried she might think I'm bothering her.

0831180509004263--.name: A while ago, I was badly injured during an operation. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ was furious! I've never seen her like that. Do you think... she hates me?

0831180509004265--.name: I think it's the opposite, actually.

0831180509004266--.name: I see... $OwnerName$, you have no idea what it's like to be hated by someone you admire.

0831180509004268--.name: Huh? What do you mean? You think she got angry because... she cares about me? You really think so?

0831180509004269--.name: So you're saying $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ was angry because she was worried about me? Ah, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$!

0831180509004270--.name: The Green Hoods protect the order of Maple World! But...

0831180509004271--.name: A while ago, I was injured during an operation, and my father has been urging me to quit ever since.

0831180509004272--.name: I understand he loves his daughter, but I don't want to quit. I don't want disappoint my father, either... What do I do?

0831180509004273--.name: Stay true to your convictions, for yourself and your father's sake.

0831180509004274--.name: Stop caring only about $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. Think about your parents, too!

0831180509004275--.name: Wow, ever heard of tact? Sheesh!

0831180509004276--.name: Wh-what?! Of course $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is important to me, but I'm in the Green Hoods to protect Maple World!

0831180509004277--.name: I knew you'd say that. You're right. I can't quit!

0831180509004278--.name: That's right! By protecting Maple World, I'm protecting my father. $OwnerName$, you have such sound logic!

0831180509004279--.name: $npcName:11000508[gender:1]$ stopped by this afternoon. She and I grew up together in $map:2000076$.

0831180509004280--.name: She said $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ ate nothing but a piece of bread for lunch today.

0831180509004281--.name: I can't believe they're neglecting her meals like that!!

0831180509004282--.name: So I packed a three-layered lunch box with the ingredients that I was going to use for dinner tonight and sent it back with $npcName:11000508[gender:1]$. Gosh, the Green Hoods can't do anything without me! ...By the way, we'll have to skip dinner tonight.

0831180509004283--.name: Today, after finishing the housework, I patrolled the house and saw a stranger.

0831180509004284--.name: He looked suspicious, so I hid and watched... He snuck into our house! I stayed still because I wanted to catch him red-handed.

0831180509004285--.name: He went into the kitchen and poked around, looking for food. I couldn't wait any longer, so I pounced on him! And...

0831180509004286--.name: It was someone I knew: $npc:11000502[gender:0]$. He's a disgrace to his father.

0831180509004287--.name: He looked like he hadn't eaten for two days, so I had to give him food... I'm sorry I gave away your food. You can take it out of my pay if you want.

0831180509004288--.name: It's too boring to stay inside the house all day. I want to go out and exercise. $OwnerName$, want to come with me?

0831180509004289--.name: I want to join $map:61000006$, which takes place in $map:2000064$ every day, once in the morning and once in the evening.

0831180509004290--.name: It'll be fun! We'll do it together! Come on, go change into your workout gear!

0831180509004291--.name: Have you heard of $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ in $map:2000001$? Everyone in $map:2000076$ insists she was as beautiful as $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ in her time.

0831180509004292--.name: But obviously, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is way more beautiful.

0831180509004293--.name: Ahhh... $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$... What I wouldn't give for a chance to comb her hair every day...

0831180509004294--.name: $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is amazing. She leads the Green Hoods with a gentle yet firm hand.

0831180509004295--.name: $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ says it's important to protect the weak and to safeguard justice. It's the reason the Green Hoods exist. She inspires responsibility and pride in all of us.

0831180509004296--.name: As for me, I'm more interested in protecting $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ than in protecting Maple World.

0831180509004297--.name: I know $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is much stronger than I am, but I'm sure she has things that she can't tell others... I want to help her in any way I can...

0831180509004298--.name: Uhh? What am I saying? Ah... Ah hah hah... Hah hah...

0831180509004300--.name: W-wait. Did something happen to $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$? Is that it? Huh? Huh? Come on, you're killing me here. Answer me!

0831180509004301--.name: ...Oh. You don't think $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ washed her hair today. Sheesh, what does it matter if she washed her hair or not?

0831180509004302--.name: Besides, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is not a slob. She must have gotten oil on her hair while fighting. Duh!

0831180509004303--.name: Many of us joined the group because we admired $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. T-that was my reason, obviously.

0831180509004304--.name: Charismatic, a natural leader, a heart of gold, amazing combat skills, and unparalleled beauty! $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is perfect in every way.

0831180509004305--.name: Hey, if you think I'm infatuated with her, fine. Think whatever you want, as long as it distracts you from crushing on her yourself.

0831180509004306--.name: A Green Hood from $map:2000076$, that's me! Born and raised in $map:2000076$, I know everyone there as well as my own family.

0831180509004307--.name: Have you met $npcName:11000508[gender:1]$ in $map:2000203$ before? She's been my best friend since we were young.

0831180509004308--.name: That girl is so strong that she can do any man's work with no problem... Hm, I guess the same goes for me too, huh? Teehee!

0831180509004309--.name: That reminds me of $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$. I hope he's not being taken advantage of by anyone, wherever he is.

0831180509004310--.name: He's some guy I've known since I young. He's a decent fellow, but a bit naive and immature. It makes him easy prey.

0831180509004311--.name: I don't know why he couldn't learn from his father... $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is the son of Elder $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ in $map:2000076$.

0831180509004312--.name: Come to think of it, rumor has it that every elder for generations has had a troublemaker son. Do you think that's true?

0831180509004313--.name: I thought I was going to live ordinary life, staying in peaceful $map:2000076$ for all of my days.

0831180509004314--.name: Meeting $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ completely changed my life. Watching a small, dainty-looking woman command a cohort of warriors touched me in a way nothing else ever has.

0831180509004315--.name: I'd never seen the world outside of $map:2000076$ or held a bow in my hand, but I decided to join her group, despite my father's objections.

0831180509004316--.name: Now that I've joined the Green Hoods, sometimes I feel sorry for $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. She was trained to be the leader of the Green Hoods since she was born, and being responsible for so many lives has to be tough.

0831180509004317--.name: I'd love to be there when she needs someone to talk to, but I know $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would never show any weakness, no matter how troubled she was on the inside..

0831180509004318--.name: Ugh... I don't think the injury I got on that last operation ever properly healed. It's throbbing.

0831180509004319--.name: Do you mind putting this medicated patch on my back? I can't do it myself.

0831180509004320--.name: Whew, thanks. I bet you're curious how I got this injury...

0831180509004321--.name: I was on duty at the guard post when a group of creeps attacked. I'd never seen them before, and they used some kind of strange magic.

0831180509004322--.name: Ah, I'm still not good enough for $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. I can't protect myself, let alone her...

0831180509004327--.name: You do, huh? Hm. All right, you can stay, but don't try anything stupid.

0831180509004328--.name: Mm, I don't think I've seen you before. Look, if you're here for the wrong reasons, I will make you regret it.

0831180509004329--.name: Ah, I see. Mistakes happen. You can be on your way now.

0831180509004330--.name: Are you lost? I'm a member of the Green Hoods, so let me know if you need help.

0831180509004331--.name: My name is $MaidName$. I'm a member of the Green Hoods. Now, it's your turn to identify yourself.

0831180509004332--.name: My name is $MaidName$, and I keep watch over this house. How may I help you?

0831180509004333--.name: I'm $MaidName$, a proud member of the Green Hoods!

0831180509004334--.name: Leave the security of your house to me!

0831180509004338--.name: Welcome home, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! Heh heh... Is that too much?

0831180509004339--.name: Ah, my injury isn't getting any better...

0831180509004341--.name: Ugh, I put the medicine on, but it still hurts...

0831180509004342--.name: Maybe I can take a break now.

0831180509004346--.name: I don't see anyone suspicious around here.

0831180509004347--.name: I wonder what $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is doing right now...

0831180509004348--.name: Just tell me what you need!

0831180509004349--.name: And today, our very special guest is... Oh! Hi, $OwnerName$! I was just practicing, hehe.

0831180509004350--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004351--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004354--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004355--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004357--.name: Do you have something to say?

0831180509004358--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004359--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004361--.name: And today, our very special guest is... Oh! Hi, $OwnerName$! I was just practicing, hehe.

0831180509004362--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004363--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004365--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004367--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004368--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004370--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004371--.name: Do you have something to say?

0831180509004372--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004373--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004375--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004376--.name: You want to give me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509004377--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509004379--.name: I'm touched! You're so busy yet you still remembered to pay me! I promise to be the best servant ever!

0831180509004380--.name: You take such good care of me. I can't thank you enough. I am forever indebted to you!

0831180509004381--.name: I knew you wouldn't abandon me, $OwnerName$. I promise to never, ever disappoint you!

0831180509004382--.name: Ahem! There may have been a slight misunderstanding between us. As a token of my regret, I'd like you to be the first guest on my show when it opens!

0831180509004383--.name: Good day, studio audience. I'd like to introduce you to our special guest for the day, $OwnerName$! Now, the million meso question, $OwnerName$... Our employment contract is expiring soon. Are you planning to extend it?

0831180509004384--.name: Yes? No? Ahem, are you planning to answer?

0831180509004385--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004386--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004388--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004389--.name: Did you have something to say to me?

0831180509004390--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004391--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004393--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004394--.name: What a wonderful day, isn't it?

0831180509004395--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004396--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004398--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004400--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004401--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004403--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004404--.name: Ah... Bwahahaha! Oh, $OwnerName$, you're hilarious! That was a joke, right? I mean, why would you say you're paying me when you don't even have the money?

0831180509004405--.name: Yes or no, $OwnerName$. Do you realize you've already paid me for the month? Ahem! How'd I do? Did I sound serious? A good host has to know how to ask the deep, probing questions!

0831180509004406--.name: $OwnerName$, enough with the jokes already. If you have no money, why do you keep saying you're paying me?

0831180509004407--.name: Hmm, I've never encountered situation like this before. I'm, well, I'm flustered! Excuse me while I grab a glass of water.

0831180509004408--.name: Someone once said that positive minds attract good luck!

0831180509004409--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004410--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004412--.name: $OwnerName$, did something good happen today? Hm?

0831180509004413--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004414--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004416--.name: Please stop doing this. You're hurting my heart...

0831180509004417--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004418--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004420--.name: I could give you a list of two dozen reason why asking someone to labor without pay is wrong... Or you could just renew my contract.

0831180509004421--.name: I received a call today from Helping Hands notifying me that our contract had expired. I was so busy dreaming of which guests to invite to my show that I hadn't even noticed. Were you aware, $OwnerName$?

0831180509004422--.name: Ahem! It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I stopped working for you...

0831180509004423--.name: W-wait, you're not thinking about letting me go permanently, are you?

0831180509004424--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004425--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004427--.name: I will never give up my role as a servant or as a talk show host!

0831180509004428--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004429--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004431--.name: Is this because I'm always talking about my future show? Be honest. Does it annoy you?

0831180509004432--.name: Excuse me?! You think I should give up my dream and return to making smoothies? No way! I didn't come this far just to give up!

0831180509004433--.name: Welcome to my show, ladies and gentlemen! I have with me, $OwnerName$, brave defender of Maple World. Well, $OwnerName$? Fight any big monsters today? Discover any amazing items? What's the latest?

0831180509004434--.name: Believe it or not, I used to work at a juice bar.

0831180509004435--.name: Ask me for any drink you want.

0831180509004436--.name: Nice to meet you. I'm Maple World's greatest talk show host, $MaidName$! Ahem, aspiring talk show host.

0831180509004437--.name: By the way, was there something you needed?

0831180509004438--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004439--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004441--.name: By the way, was there something you needed?

0831180509004442--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004443--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004445--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004446--.name: Sure, you can tell me anything.

0831180509004451--.name: Did you have something to say to me?

0831180509004456--.name: Just thinking about my show makes my heart flutter.

0831180509004461--.name: Did you have something to say to me?

0831180509004462--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004463--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004465--.name: What a wonderful day, isn't it?

0831180509004466--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004467--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004470--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004471--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004473--.name: $OwnerName$, be honest with me about something.

0831180509004474--.name: You hired me as your servant, and I've been loudly practicing my show host skills every single day.

0831180509004475--.name: Does it bother you? Please be honest.

0831180509004478--.name: ...I see. I don't get many jobs hosting shows, and I'm terrible at keeping house. I don't know what to do...

0831180509004480--.name: You really think so? Then my dream has a chance at coming true, right?!

0831180509004481--.name: Entertaining? Me? That's the sweetest compliment anyone's ever given me in my entire life. Thank you!!

0831180509004482--.name: Every single day, I practice my hosting skills, but I can't help but worry sometimes.

0831180509004483--.name: I really want to be a great talk show host, but I'm just not sure I'll ever get my big break.

0831180509004484--.name: I'm not getting any younger, and you know they like to hire young. Should I just go back to working at the juice bar? What do you think?

0831180509004485--.name: It's not the end of the world to just stick to what you're good at.

0831180509004487--.name: Yeah? Maybe I'm just not cut out for bring a host. Excuse me... I'd like to be alone for a while.

0831180509004488--.name: You think so? I never thought being good at something would break my heart. If only I were good at what I really, truly want to do...

0831180509004489--.name: ...You're right. You're absolutely right! Shame on me for even considering giving up. It was a moment of weakness.

0831180509004490--.name: Yes! That's the spirit! I won't give up on my dreams, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004491--.name: Oh, our next door neighbor stopped by.

0831180509004492--.name: I was practicing for my show, when someone banged on the door.

0831180509004493--.name: I guess he thought I was too loud. He told me to keep it down so he could sleep, but I knew fate had sent him to me.

0831180509004494--.name: I needed someone to be the guest on my show. On my practice show.

0831180509004495--.name: It went great! Now I have confidence that I can run my show seamlessly, no matter how wacky the guest is.

0831180509004496--.name: I hope he can help again tomorrow! He looked thoroughly exhausted when he left, though...

0831180509004497--.name: Come to think of it, $npcName:11000012[gender:0]$ stopped by this afternoon to give me some mail.

0831180509004498--.name: I was hoping it was an invitation from the palace to host some grand event, but it was from $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$. He wants me to host his son's ninth birthday party.

0831180509004499--.name: That's not as exciting as a royal event, but beggars can't be choosers. And us twingos need to help each other, you know?

0831180509004500--.name: I'm going to make $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$'s son's birthday the best event ever! Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got to get practicing.

0831180509004501--.name: I hope I get to host something amazing soon. Like... Like... Like $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s wedding!

0831180509004502--.name: It'd be such an honor. My family would be so proud! Just the thought of it is making my pulse race!

0831180509004503--.name: I mean, she's not even engaged... And she can't even hold public events right now... But it would be such a fantastic, magical, beautiful event, don't you think? Ahh, I can dream, can't I?

0831180509004504--.name: Every show needs a special segment that captures the hearts and imagination of the masses.

0831180509004505--.name: ...Oooh, how about this? "Special: Help $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ Find Her Man!"

0831180509004506--.name: I'd invite $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to come on the show and then help her find the man of her dreams! Like, I could have her choose between $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$, and then let her keep choosing between people until she found her perfect match!

0831180509004507--.name: I can definitely make this work. I just need to get $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to agree to come on the show. All right, then! Off to the palace! I'm sure she can make time for me. La, la, laaaa!

0831180509004508--.name: I've been asked to prepare a special twingo show. Oooh, I get butterflies just thinking about it!

0831180509004509--.name: There are so many possibilities! A twingo talent show, a twingo reality show, or, oooh, maybe a twingo dance contest?

0831180509004510--.name: I can't make up my mind! $OwnerName$, what do you think?

0831180509004511--.name: Okay, $OwnerName$, let's practice for the world's greatest talk show!

0831180509004512--.name: Hellooooo, ladies and gentlemen! It's me, your cute and super talented host, $MaidName$!!

0831180509004513--.name: ...Ugh, that sounds corny. It totally sets the wrong tone!

0831180509004514--.name: Hello, studio audience! Welcome to The $MaidName$ Show!

0831180509004515--.name: Our guest today is the one and only... $OwnerName$! Come on in, $OwnerName$.

0831180509004517--.name: Huh? You've been busy leveling? No, no, no, $OwnerName$. What kind boring answer is that? I know this is just practice, but try to take it seriously, okay?

0831180509004518--.name: Practicing every day takes a toll on my vocal cords, and these babies are vital to my career.

0831180509004519--.name: That's why I try not to talk too much when I'm not practicing. I mean it. Please don't talk to me unless it's necessary, okay?

0831180509004520--.name:
...
...
...
Are you really just going to stop talking to me now? Because I asked you to? Really?

0831180509004521--.name: You may have wondered why I accepted a job with Helping Hands when my dream is to be a talk show host, but you don't understand.

0831180509004522--.name: Here, I get to practice my show-hosting skills around the clock, and I get paid for it! Also, strangers barge in all the time...

0831180509004523--.name: And I get to pretend they're guests on my show! A great host knows how to respond to unexpected situations with poise.

0831180509004524--.name: I end up interviewing them as I would if they were guests on the show. Sure, most of them try to sneak out in the middle of the interview, but I don't let them move an inch until I'm done with them.

0831180509004525--.name: Ahh, I wish I could host the event in $map:02000064$. I'm positive I could make it so much more exciting.

0831180509004526--.name: I've offered my services to the palace several times and get the same response every time:

0831180509004527--.name: "Thank you for your interest. That event does not require a host." I just don't get it!

0831180509004528--.name: Think about it! If you were in the $map:61000001$ audience, wouldn't you have fun trying to guess the winner?

0831180509004529--.name: But according to the palace, that's too close to gambling, which is prohibited.

0831180509004530--.name: Hmph. The palace is a rather old-fashioned, if you ask me.

0831180509004531--.name: In my younger days, I worked at a juice bar. My joy in life was listening to the customers and making their tasty drinks.

0831180509004532--.name: One day, one of the regulars came looking sad. He has broken up with his girlfriend a week ago and just couldn't get over it. I knew he needed a good laugh.

0831180509004533--.name: So I went all out. I listened to him, then I told him jokes and funny stories.

0831180509004534--.name: He left that night with a smile on his face, and it made me realize what I really want to do with my life.

0831180509004535--.name: My dream is to become Maple World's greatest show host! I have a long way to go, but I'll get there one day.

0831180509004536--.name: Let's give a warm welcome our first guest of the day to The $MaidName$ Show, $MyPCName$!

0831180509004539--.name: Get me out of here. Immediately.

0831180509004540--.name: Exactly! Hi! Now, tell us alllll about your interesting life!

0831180509004541--.name: Well, hi back! Make yourself comfy. You'll be with us for the next two hours, spilling all the juicy details of your fascinating life!

0831180509004542--.name: Don't be shy, now. Just be yourself! Go on, say hello to our studio audience!

0831180509004543--.name: No need to be confused, my friend. We're about to dive into our first segment of the day: "Juicy Details of $MyPCName$'s Personal Life"!

0831180509004544--.name: Oh, no. Please! I haven't had a guest on my pretend show for three hours!

0831180509004545--.name: Please! Even if you're busy, spare me an hour—no, thirty minutes!

0831180509004546--.name: From this moment on, I'm your servant.

0831180509004547--.name: Welcoooome to the $MaidName$ Show! Shoot, was the mic too loud?

0831180509004549--.name: We've been anxiously awaiting the arrival of our special guest...

0831180509004550--.name: Finally! Our guest of the day has made an appearance!

0831180509004551--.name: I was so busy practicing I didn't hear you come in.

0831180509004552--.name: Please stop doing this. You're hurting my heart...

0831180509004553--.name: Do you have any good news?

0831180509004554--.name: Now, let's try again, shall we?

0831180509004555--.name: I should also clean the house...

0831180509004559--.name: This mic doesn't seem to be working right.
