0831180509004561--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509004562--.name: Mm? You itching for some action too?

0831180509004563--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004564--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004566--.name: Huh? Ah, $OwnerName$. It's you. I didn't know who it was for a second.

0831180509004567--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004568--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004570--.name: I want to do something fun.

0831180509004571--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004572--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004574--.name: Mm? You itching for some action too?

0831180509004575--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004576--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004578--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004579--.name: Huh? Ah, $OwnerName$. It's you. I didn't know who it was for a second.

0831180509004580--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004581--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004583--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004584--.name: I want to do something fun.

0831180509004585--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004586--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004588--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004589--.name: You want to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509004590--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509004592--.name: Oooh, you pay me ahead of schedule every month. Thanks! Adventurers are so capable. I want to become as great an adventurer as you, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004593--.name: Hurrah, I got my paycheck!  Thanks for hiring me for this month again. Hah hah!

0831180509004594--.name: Huh? I thought you didn't have enough money to pay me. Where did you get this? Ah, I guess this goes to show that I have to become a great adventurer like you!

0831180509004595--.name: Oh yeah, I forgot that adventurers don't have a stable income. They can be completely broke one moment and filthy rich the next. I wasn't thinking clearly when I decided to give up my dream of becoming one. Heh!

0831180509004596--.name: $OwnerName$, our employment contract expires soon. You know that, right? What? You didn't?

0831180509004597--.name: Well, adventurers have a lot on their mind. I understand.

0831180509004598--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004599--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004601--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004602--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509004603--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004604--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004606--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004608--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004609--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004611--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004613--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004614--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004616--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004617--.name: Wait, don't you have money to pay me? No way. I thought adventuring was lucrative. This can't be true. You're lying, right? Please?

0831180509004618--.name: ...Huh? But you paid me for this month already. Hah hah, you shouldn't be so forgetful.

0831180509004619--.name: Ah... <font color="#ffd200">$OwnerName$</font>, looking at you, I've been reconsidering my decision to become an adventurer. I didn't know adventurers were so broke.

0831180509004620--.name: I've never encountered this before. Whoops, maybe we've made a new discovery! Come on, let's try again!

0831180509004621--.name: Ahh... Should I give up my dream?

0831180509004622--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004623--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004625--.name: I've been thinking a lot lately...

0831180509004626--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004627--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004629--.name: Should I get a different job?

0831180509004630--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004631--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004633--.name: Oh no! My contract expired. How can you even eat right now?!

0831180509004634--.name: Oh, no! My contract expired! What am I doing? I don't have time for chitchat right now!

0831180509004636--.name: I can't sleep no matter how hard I try. Maybe I should read a book...

0831180509004637--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004638--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004640--.name: I can't sleep no matter how hard I try. Maybe I should read a book...

0831180509004641--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004642--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004644--.name: This is really important to me. You know I've been saving to go on an adventure, right? Now that I have income, how can I carry out my plan?

0831180509004645--.name: If I give up my dream of becoming an adventurer, will I still be me? What do you think?

0831180509004646--.name:
Zzz... Zzz... Zzz... Zzz... Mm...?
<font color="#909090">(He must have fallen asleep while reading.)</font>

0831180509004647--.name: I have to know how to cook to stay alive at sea.

0831180509004648--.name: I can cook anything you want.

0831180509004651--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004652--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004655--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004656--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004658--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004659--.name: I want to go on an adventure!

0831180509004661--.name: Tell me a story about an adventure!

0831180509004666--.name: Tell me a story about an adventure!

0831180509004669--.name: I can regale you with adventure stories all night long.

0831180509004671--.name: Tell me a story about an adventure!

0831180509004674--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509004675--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004676--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004679--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004680--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004683--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004684--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004686--.name: Since you asked, I did see some guy clad head to toe in armor deep within the Ant Tunnel. He was all solemn and asked how I'd gotten that far. I had to stop myself from laughing. He was so pretentious!

0831180509004687--.name: Then he said there was a legendary $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ in the back of the cave!

0831180509004688--.name: Now, I'm from $map:2000062$, so I've heard all sorts of adventure stories, but that was one of the biggest lies I've ever heard.

0831180509004689--.name: Who knows? It could be true!

0831180509004690--.name: Pssh, that guy was definitely a liar.

0831180509004691--.name: I know, right? He's worse than I am. Uh... I mean... Ah hah hah hah!

0831180509004692--.name: Totally. $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$? Pssh! If such a thing really existed, don't you think it would've destroyed the world already? Hahaha.

0831180509004693--.name: Do you really think so? Does that mean the guy I talked to... is the knight from all the fables?

0831180509004694--.name: Come to think of it, there's no explanation for the quakes, either. Hm... Is there really something going on?

0831180509004695--.name: I've been thinking a lot lately.

0831180509004696--.name: I've always wanted to be an adventurer, but I've never actually tried.

0831180509004697--.name: Mom says I should just take over the store. Do you think I should give up on becoming an adventurer and join the family business?

0831180509004699--.name: You'd give up, just like that?

0831180509004700--.name: They do, don't they? Ah, maybe I should just give up on my dreams...

0831180509004701--.name: I thought, of all people, you would encourage me to pursue my dreams! But I was wrong...

0831180509004702--.name: What? N-no! I haven't given up. I swear!

0831180509004703--.name: What am I saying? Of course I'm going to be the world's greatest adventurer!

0831180509004704--.name: I went to $map:02000031$ this afternoon to see if I could find books that contain clues to hidden treasure.

0831180509004705--.name: But... it's pointless. I can't read a book for two minutes without falling right asleep.

0831180509004706--.name: Every time I try, I fall asleep and wake up two hours later, totally disoriented.

0831180509004707--.name: At this rate, I might waste away my life sleeping before I have the chance to go on an adventure! What's wrong with me?

0831180509004708--.name: I was dusting the bookshelf today when I found this piece of paper. See that strange picture? Doesn't it look like a treasure map?

0831180509004709--.name: See? Right here. That curvy, strange-looking pattern. It's almost like it was a quick sketch, right?

0831180509004710--.name: Judging by the grime, it looks like a pretty old treasure map. And the shape of the picture resembles the northwest part of Victoria Island.

0831180509004711--.name: ...Huh? This paper was just a doodle, and then used to wipe someone's nose? N-no way! You're wrong! Eek, take a closer look!

0831180509004712--.name: Today I tried a new recipe, and I think I just made the best food I've ever tasted in my life.

0831180509004713--.name: It smells good and tastes perfect. I'm thinking maybe I've discovered a new gift.

0831180509004714--.name: This doesn't mean I'm no longer going to be an adventurer. It's the opposite, actually. Practicing cooking is part of my plan.

0831180509004715--.name: You can't eat at restaurants when you're out at sea. I'm honing my cooking so I can survive any situation.

0831180509004716--.name: Haven't you heard? The great adventurer $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$ is also known for his cooking skills! They say it rivals that of a royal chef!

0831180509004717--.name: Everyone's trying to keep this hush hush, but I over heard. There's another world besides Maple World!

0831180509004718--.name: Personally, I think it's related to the Shadow Doors scattered around the world. There's got to be a new world beyond those doors.

0831180509004719--.name: Have I been through those doors? W-well... That's... Oh, right—the stove! I had a chance, but I couldn't because of the stove!

0831180509004720--.name: I was just about to walk through one of those doors when I remembered I forgot to turn off the stove before I left the house. My forgetfulness stopped me from exploring a new world. What a shame!

0831180509004721--.name: I heard something from sailors in $map:02000062$. They said if you travel south, you'll run into a dreadful sea monster.

0831180509004722--.name: It's not a giant squid, like you'd think. Oh no.

0831180509004723--.name: It's a creature with the head of a gorilla, wearing a skull mask. It has horns and flies around on giant bat wings.

0831180509004724--.name: I can't even picture it. But here's the thing: everyone who says they saw the monster remembers it differently. So who can say if they're telling the truth or not.

0831180509004725--.name: It sounds dangerous, but I'd love to see this creature with my own eyes one day. Hah hah!

0831180509004726--.name: There are so many different types of adventures, but I grew up in a port village, so the type that calls to me are sea adventures!

0831180509004727--.name: But that requires a ship and a crew, and ships are not cheap. I've been saving up for a long time, but I don't have enough to even buy the smallest boat! However, I've come up with an answer...

0831180509004728--.name: I'm going to form a party! $npcName:11000116[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000024[gender:1]$ have already agreed to join me! And, between you and me, I can't stop thinking about $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$...

0831180509004729--.name: I just so happened to overhear some folks in  $map:02000069$ mention that $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$ wants to buy a ship and set sail for adventure, too! He acts like he's soooo high above me because he works at $map:02000068$, but... he can be pretty charismatic and determined when he puts his mind to it.

0831180509004730--.name: I can't decide if I want to ask him to join me or not. But you can't breathe a word of this to $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, all right? You promise??

0831180509004731--.name: $OwnerName$, have you ever visited $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$? Every wannabe adventurer has their heart set on joining that association.

0831180509004732--.name: About a month ago, I went there to apply, and the guy who worked there said I had to pass an entrance exam.

0831180509004733--.name: The exam is simple: just discover something no one else ever has. I built a raft right away and set sail from $map:02000062$.

0831180509004734--.name: I must have been on the sea for two days. I was so hungry and exhausted that I was about to give up, when lo and behold, I saw a patch of land, just off the horizon.

0831180509004735--.name: My heart raced! I thought I'd discovered a new land no one had ever set foot on before! But as I sailed closer, I realized... it was just $map:02000124$, which is really not all that far from $map:02000062$.

0831180509004736--.name: The warden intercepted my ship and held me there for a week before finally letting me return to $map:02000062$. Gosh, that's embarrassing. You're the first person I've ever told that story to, $OwnerName$.

0831180509004737--.name: I heard a story the other day about a kid in some village who wanted to become a pirate.

0831180509004738--.name: He ate some strange berries that gave him the power to stretch his body.

0831180509004739--.name: And he used that ability to conquer the sea and become a pirate king! Hah hah!

0831180509004740--.name: It's too crazy to be real, but you'd better believe I'll be poppin' every berry I see into my mouth for the rest of my life!

0831180509004741--.name: $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$ thinks he's better than me because he works at $map:02000068$, but hello, sitting at a desk stamping docking permits is hardly the same thing as sailing for adventure.

0831180509004742--.name: I don't need help from some stupid association to go on an adventure. Not when I have friends who think like I do!

0831180509004743--.name: Already $npcName:11000116[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000024[gender:1]$ have agreed to join me. $OwnerName$, what about you? I should probably also mention there's a 300,000 meso membership fee.

0831180509004744--.name: The yearning to set sail for adventure eats away at my very core!! My ultimate dream is to be the very first to set foot on a brand new continent!

0831180509004745--.name: I've already named my ship. Now, I just need to acquire her! Hah hah!

0831180509004746--.name: I can tell you the name, if you're curious, but you can't tell a soul. Okay... I'm going to name her... the Nautilus!

0831180509004747--.name: So until the day I meet my Nautilus, I'll work hard as your servant! Hah hah!

0831180509004748--.name: I must have been around eight. We had a big ol' bookshelf at home, and one of the books on the bottom shelf changed my life forever.

0831180509004749--.name: It was written by a great explorer, and his every word enraptured me. My heart fluttered, my eyes glazed over... I felt like I was exploring the world at his side!

0831180509004750--.name: I knew then and there I had to become an adventurer. Ahhh. Such a great book. It was written by $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$. Have you read it?

0831180509004751--.name: What?! You ran into $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$ in $map:02000062$?! Why didn't you tell me? I could've gone and gotten his autograph!

0831180509004752--.name: Maybe it's not too late. I'm going to go look for him! Hey, I'm busy. Stop bothering me, will you?

0831180509004753--.name: I'm pretty passionate about adventuring, but not as passionate as the guy in the Ant Tunnel.

0831180509004754--.name: I think his name is $npcName:11000145[gender:0]$. He wears really weird clothes and says he's from the future.

0831180509004755--.name: He did a good job with his costume... but I think he really truly believes he's from the future.

0831180509004756--.name: Poor guy. I feel sorry for him. He's clearly not well.

0831180509004757--.name: Hello. It's a perfect day to go on an adventure, isn't it?

0831180509004761--.name: Yeah! We think alike! High five!

0831180509004762--.name: Argh, what I wouldn't give to be out on the sea right now!!

0831180509004763--.name: What? You are no longer allowed to go outside. Go home and lock yourself in! Right now!

0831180509004764--.name: Ah, so you've never experienced the thrill of adventure. What a shame!

0831180509004765--.name: Me? I am $MaidName$, the world's greatest adventurer... in the making. You'd better write down my name.

0831180509004766--.name: I am $MaidName$, first mate of this house! Hah hah hah! Doesn't that sound awesome?

0831180509004771--.name: Did you make a new discovery?

0831180509004772--.name: You look like you've been lost at sea for weeks.

0831180509004774--.name: Ahhh... I can't give up like this...

0831180509004779--.name: Where can I find a treasure map?

0831180509004780--.name: Mwa hah hah! What a great discovery!

0831180509004782--.name: Why are humans so high maintenance?

0831180509004783--.name: Please! One moment, I'm talking to this zelkova.

0831180509004784--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004785--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004788--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004789--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004791--.name: Please be careful not to tread on grass or flowers when you walk.

0831180509004792--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004793--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004795--.name: Please! One moment, I'm talking to this zelkova.

0831180509004796--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004797--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004799--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004801--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004802--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004804--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004805--.name: Please be careful not to tread on grass or flowers when you walk.

0831180509004806--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004807--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004809--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004810--.name: Did you just say you're going to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509004813--.name: Aha, our contract renews every time you pay me, right? That's how human contracts work? I feel like I've learned something new and fascinating about human culture, and that makes me happy!

0831180509004814--.name: Ah, I know. Accepting this means I accept the extension of our contract. I'm learning so much about you unusual creatures, thanks to you!

0831180509004815--.name: Keeping a promise made to a human is tough, but I saw it through, didn't I? I feel like I've really accomplished something great. Thanks for the experience!

0831180509004816--.name: Really? Hehe. I had no idea how difficult it was to be idle all day. Thank you for helping me keep my promise, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004817--.name: $OwnerName$, did you know our employment agreement expires soon?

0831180509004818--.name: Why are humans so high maintenance?

0831180509004819--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004820--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004822--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004823--.name: Mm? Do you have something else to tell me?

0831180509004824--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004825--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004827--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004828--.name: Please! One moment, I'm talking to this zelkova.

0831180509004829--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004830--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004832--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004833--.name: Please be careful not to tread on grass or flowers when you walk.

0831180509004834--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004835--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004837--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004838--.name: Don't be embarrassed. You can pay me whenever you have the money.

0831180509004839--.name: Hehe, you already paid me this month, $OwnerName$!

0831180509004840--.name: You're trying to help me keep my promise. I appreciate that so much, but it won't work if you don't have enough money. Thank you for trying.

0831180509004841--.name: Oh, how did you do that? Neat! Show me again!

0831180509004842--.name: There are some things I just can't do, no matter how hard I try.

0831180509004843--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004844--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004847--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004848--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004850--.name: I want to plant more flowers! You're not interested in that, are you?

0831180509004851--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004852--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004855--.name: I'm so sorry to interrupt, but this is important! Our contract expired! $OwnerName$, please check the contract!

0831180509004856--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since our contract expired. I may live a long, long life, $OwnerName$, but I want our time together to be meaningful.

0831180509004857--.name: Time never stops, and it never waits for anyone.

0831180509004858--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004859--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004862--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004863--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004865--.name: $OwnerName$! What happened? Won't you tell me? I know something happened... I thought we were closer than that...

0831180509004866--.name: Did you know fairies make contracts to use magic and spells? To us, contracts are promises we make in exchange for power. Humans, it seems, mainly use contracts for things involving time and money. When I signed on with Helping Hands, I made a promise to the company about accepting a certain wage.

0831180509004867--.name: I would love to do you a favor without anything in return, but that would mean breaking my promise... I made a promise to Helping Hands in exchange for an opportunity to learn more about humans. I hope you can understand that, $OwnerName$.

0831180509004868--.name: $OwnerName$, you haven't talked to me lately. You didn't use to be like this. Oh, never mind. For a moment, I forgot you were human, hehe!

0831180509004869--.name: Mama taught me this! I'm good at it, hehe.

0831180509004871--.name: $OwnerName$, you're the first human I've shared so much with...

0831180509004873--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004874--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004877--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004878--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004880--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509004881--.name: Fairies are good at keeping secrets. You can tell me anything!

0831180509004886--.name: You look like you have something to say.

0831180509004891--.name: Sometimes, I wonder how things are back in $map:2000023$.

0831180509004896--.name: Mm? Do you have something else to tell me?

0831180509004897--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004898--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004900--.name: Please! One moment, I'm talking to this zelkova.

0831180509004901--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004902--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004904--.name: Please be careful not to tread on grass or flowers when you walk.

0831180509004905--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004906--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004908--.name: I can't help it. I just don't trust humans.

0831180509004909--.name: I know you're not like the others, $OwnerName$. But... we're just so different.

0831180509004910--.name: I know we should all just accept one another, but I can't get used to your kind's disregard for nature or penchant for violence. Am I wrong to feel this way?

0831180509004913--.name: No matter how hard I try, there's just some things I can't do. I don't know if a human could really understand...

0831180509004914--.name: I thought of all people you'd understand me. Just forget I said anything.

0831180509004915--.name: Thank you for understanding. All I want is for your kind to stop fighting and to live wisely!

0831180509004916--.name: $OwnerName$, I knew you'd understand. You're different from the rest.

0831180509004917--.name: $OwnerName$, I want to ask you something.

0831180509004918--.name: I've mentioned a few times that fairies aren't fond of humans.

0831180509004919--.name: But what's your opinion, $OwnerName$? Do you like fairies?

0831180509004921--.name: I want to learn more about your species, honestly.

0831180509004922--.name: I've heard of humans who said the same thing, then brutally betrayed us. I'm not saying you're like that, but...

0831180509004923--.name: Just like that? It sounded a little insincere, if you ask me...

0831180509004924--.name: Ah! You and I are kindred spirits in that regard, $OwnerName$. I'm so happy we met!

0831180509004925--.name: Yes, I want to learn more about humans, too!

0831180509004926--.name: I made this pendant with a stone I found in my forest. Pretty, isn't it?

0831180509004927--.name: Heh heh, surprised? My mom taught me when I was young. She's a famous craftswoman in $map:02000023$.

0831180509004928--.name: But I don't think this is just some ordinary stone. It gives off a strange vibe, like... magic.

0831180509004929--.name: I want to know more! I'm going to show it to $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ tomorrow.

0831180509004930--.name: Yesterday $npcName:11000034[gender:0]$ stopped by. He must have been worried that I'm staying with a human.

0831180509004931--.name: He kept urging me to return to the forest, but I told him I can better relate to you than I can to other humans. And it's true. Hehe.

0831180509004932--.name: $npcName:11000034[gender:0]$ would agree if he met you. If you ever have business in $map:02000023$, would you give my regards to $npcName:11000034[gender:0]$?

0831180509004933--.name: I prepare food for you every day, but do you really have to eat animals and plants?

0831180509004934--.name: Fairies only need one glass of honey milk in the morning and one in the afternoon. Animals and plants are my friends, and I shouldn't eat my friends, right?

0831180509004935--.name: You don't need to look so guilty. I know you can't live on just milk like I can.

0831180509004936--.name: "Nature makes us what we are." That's what $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ says. Eat up!

0831180509004937--.name: Humans have long coveted the ancient knowledge of the fairies. They spy on us and try to steal it when we aren't looking.

0831180509004938--.name: Those who do are usually driven to ruin by their own greed!

0831180509004939--.name: With the current situation, we've had no choice but to join forces with humans, but that doesn't mean we like you. I've seen some pretty great humans but only a few of you are wise.

0831180509004940--.name: The wise humans know their place in the grand scheme of the universe. Then again... I doubt even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is completely free of selfish desires...

0831180509004941--.name: Do all humans allow strangers into their homes? Today, three strangers barged in, but ran off when they saw I was here.

0831180509004942--.name: They were surprised, stating that they didn't hear my footsteps. Well, that's because fairies glide instead of stomp.

0831180509004943--.name: We don't want to hurt even a single blade of grass. Eeek! There are ants crawling all around your feet! Be careful not to step on them!!

0831180509004944--.name: Have you ever wondered why I don't have wings?

0831180509004945--.name: It's because there are all different types of fairies... Tree tree fairies, flower fairies, river fairies, and all sorts of others.

0831180509004946--.name: Some have wings, some don't... and some just have one wing...

0831180509004947--.name: Never mind that. My point is, if you ever visit $map:02000023$, make sure you don't ask such a silly question or everyone will laugh at you.

0831180509004948--.name: $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$... She's lost her shoes again. How disgraceful!

0831180509004949--.name: I've told her so many times! If she truly loves her shoes, then don't wear them outside of the forest!

0831180509004950--.name: Unbelievable! I hope no one helps her this time, so she learns her lesson.

0831180509004951--.name: ...But that's wishful thinking. Humans can't resist helping her when she cries, and she knows that.

0831180509004952--.name: Yesterday, the wind told me that trees and flowers are disappearing on the west side of Victoria Island.

0831180509004953--.name: I'm guessing it must the area around $map:02000100$. I've never been there, and I'm glad! I couldn't survive even a single day in such a sad place.

0831180509004954--.name: Why do humans love to dig? Why do you love tall buildings so much?

0831180509004955--.name: You're building homes for yourselves but destroying ours.

0831180509004956--.name: I don't hate all humans. I have great respect for $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ and for $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$.

0831180509004957--.name: I have many things I can learn from $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$. I think there are only a handful of fairies who possess more ancient knowledge than he does.

0831180509004958--.name: Humans and fairies are so different. I'm having a hard time getting used to you. We haven't interacted with each other for a long time. You can't expect for us to become friends overnight.

0831180509004959--.name: Soon it'll be my birthday. Let's celebrate together. And don't even think to ask how many candles we'll need...

0831180509004960--.name: Oh, fine, since you're my friend, I'll give you a hint.

0831180509004961--.name: I just want one candle. I'm not even a hundred yet! I'm pretty young for the fairfolk.

0831180509004962--.name: Fairies live a lot longer than humans, you know.

0831180509004963--.name: You'd be shocked if you knew how old $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ or $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ are. You really just can't think of our ages in human years.

0831180509004964--.name: Lately $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ hasn't looked so good. I'm worried something happened to him.

0831180509004965--.name: I tried to ask, but he wouldn't answer. $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ seemed to know something, but he wouldn't tell me either.

0831180509004966--.name: Actually $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ was the reason I got a job with Helping Hands. He left one day all of a sudden, and it dawned on me that I didn't know much about him.

0831180509004967--.name: $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is half-human and half-fairy. It must have been hard growing up like that, but he never showed it. I would've been nicer if I'd known he'd leave so abruptly...

0831180509004968--.name: That's why I wanted to learn more about humans. I'm glad I applied for this job. Staying here with you has been so informative!

0831180509004969--.name: Eeek! Human!! Sheesh, you scared me!

0831180509004971--.name: Ha! I'm gonna step on you!

0831180509004974--.name: I'm not used to talking to humans... It's okay, I forgive you.

0831180509004976--.name: I'm going to tell $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$! You'd better get away from me before I turn you into a frog!

0831180509004977--.name: M-me? I'm of the fairfolk... Eek, sorry! I don't think I'm ready to talk to strange humans!

0831180509004978--.name: H-hey, that doesn't matter. If you have business with <font color="#ffd200">$OwnerName$</font>, you don't need to talk to me.

0831180509004979--.name: Mm... Is this what a human abode looks like from the inside?

0831180509004980--.name: I hope the human isn't too violent...

0831180509004982--.name: Err... P-please don't talk to me...

0831180509004985--.name: I can't tell what you're thinking.

0831180509004987--.name: I think I'm getting used to this.

0831180509004988--.name: I wonder how mom is doing...

0831180509004989--.name: Oh, I'd better prepare some food.

0831180509004991--.name: I'd love to see more flowers around here.

0831180509004994--.name: Hmph! What in blazes is it?

0831180509004995--.name: Why do you keep summoning me? Don't you know I'm old?

0831180509004996--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509004997--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509004999--.name: Hmph! Why do you keep bothering me?

0831180509005000--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005001--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005003--.name: All right, all right. What do ya wanna to talk about?

0831180509005004--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005005--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005007--.name: Why do you keep summoning me? Don't you know I'm old?

0831180509005008--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005009--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005011--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005012--.name: Hmph! Why do you keep bothering me?

0831180509005013--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005014--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005016--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005017--.name: All right, all right. What do ya wanna to talk about?

0831180509005018--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005019--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005021--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005022--.name: Did you just say you're going to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509005023--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509005025--.name: Ooh, has it been that long already? Thanks for hiring me again. Hah hah.

0831180509005026--.name: Ah, you're paying me early. Great! My, my, you're glowing today!

0831180509005027--.name: Hah, you're never home. Been working the old grind, eh? Good, good. I'm proud of ya.

0831180509005028--.name: Aw, you've disappointed me for so long, but you've made it up to me now. I feel like I can fly! I'll let your slight slide, hah hah.

0831180509005029--.name: $OwnerName$, you know what day it is? You'd better check your calendar. Our contract expires soon. You'll take care of it, right?

0831180509005030--.name: I don't have to worry, do I?

0831180509005031--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005032--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005034--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005035--.name: Why do you keep summoning me? Don't you know I'm old?

0831180509005036--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005037--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005039--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005040--.name: Hmph! Why do you keep bothering me?

0831180509005041--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005042--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005044--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005045--.name: All right, all right. What do ya wanna to talk about?

0831180509005046--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005047--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005049--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005050--.name: If you don't have the money, maybe I should teach you how to beg on the streets. Your pride won't keep you from starving, right?

0831180509005051--.name: Tsk. So young, but you're more senile than I am! You've already paid me for the month!

0831180509005052--.name: Hmph, how dare you tease me! Pretending to pay someone when you have no intention of actually paying is worth than giving someone something and then taking it away! You little rascal!

0831180509005053--.name: Huh? Th-this... Well, this... Ahem! If you don't know what's going on, just keep quiet.

0831180509005054--.name: Tsk, tsk. Young people these days have no patience.

0831180509005055--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005056--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005058--.name: You don't want me anymore. Is that it?

0831180509005059--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005060--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005063--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005064--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005066--.name: Hey, our contract expired. You're still gonna feed me, right?

0831180509005067--.name: Hmph, what are you doing? Our contract expired. Stop changing the subject, and check the contract.

0831180509005069--.name: Will I ever stop worrying about money?

0831180509005070--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005071--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005073--.name: I got this job because I didn't want to beg anymore... Ugh...

0831180509005074--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005075--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005077--.name: I didn't ask you to pay my medical bills or give me an allowance. All I asked was that you feed me three times a day, and you failed at even that! How can you sleep at night, knowing this frail old man is starving?

0831180509005078--.name: My vision is getting weaker, my hearing isn't any better, and I feel fainter by the day. I don't have many days left, you know. How would you feel if all of a sudden, whoosh, I'm gone? You should be nice to me while you still can.

0831180509005079--.name: Maybe it's time I quit and go back to where I truly belong: the streets of $map:02000051$.

0831180509005080--.name: Mm? Do you have something to ask me?

0831180509005082--.name: What do you want to know about a lonely old man?

0831180509005084--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005085--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005088--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005089--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005091--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005092--.name: If you have something to say, then say it.

0831180509005097--.name: What? You want me to tell your fortune?

0831180509005102--.name: I can hear you just fine. Tell me.

0831180509005107--.name: Why do you keep summoning me? Don't you know I'm old?

0831180509005108--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005109--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005111--.name: Hmph! Why do you keep bothering me?

0831180509005112--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005113--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005115--.name: All right, all right. What do ya wanna to talk about?

0831180509005116--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005117--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005119--.name: I want to ask you something.

0831180509005120--.name: You may think I'm a crazy old coot, but I'm not doing this because I like it.

0831180509005121--.name: Am I bothering you? Be honest. I won't get mad.

0831180509005123--.name: I know you have your reasons.

0831180509005124--.name: What? Y-y-y-you rascal! Haven't you heard you're supposed to talk to your elders with respect?! What is this world coming to?

0831180509005125--.name: What?! You think you'll be young and healthy forever, little punk?

0831180509005126--.name: You're not as stupid as I thought. Hah hah.

0831180509005127--.name: Hah hah, you shouldn't say that, knuclehead. Hah hah.

0831180509005128--.name: Are you sure you don't want to learn how to beg?

0831180509005129--.name: I don't make as much as I used to. I've become too famous.

0831180509005130--.name: You have the makings of a good beggar. So how about it? Want to beg with me on the streets of $map:2000051$?

0831180509005133--.name: I didn't think you'd say yes. Are you sure? You're young, but already a lost cause. Tsk.

0831180509005134--.name: You little...! That was a test, and you failed miserably!

0831180509005135--.name: No other job is as stable as begging, but I guess you're too young to stoop so low. All right, just don't say I didn't ask.

0831180509005136--.name: Starve for three days, and you'll be willing to do anything. When it happens, we'll see.

0831180509005137--.name: You little rascal! Do you treat your own grandfather this way?

0831180509005138--.name: How could you leave me alone in the house for so long? Do you know how bored I've been?

0831180509005139--.name: I've been a beggar for all my life, but that doesn't mean you can treat me like this! I'm going to tell the neighbors!

0831180509005140--.name: You're sorry? Sorry doesn't cut it. Although... if you give me some mesos, I might forgive you. But until then, forget it!

0831180509005141--.name: Nah, nothing happened today. But hey, what do you think of these clothes? They look like they were made for me, don't they?

0831180509005142--.name: I got them from that wardrobe over there, hah hah.

0831180509005143--.name: You have such nice clothes, and you never wear them, so I thought someone ought to enjoy them.

0831180509005144--.name: Huh? I'm wearing a dress? You rascal! You're only saying that because you don't want me to wear your clothes.

0831180509005145--.name: You're more cunning than I am. You'll go far in life.

0831180509005146--.name: Aaaack, my arms! Ugh, my legs! Oooouch, my shoulders, my back, my knees.  It's going to rain today.

0831180509005147--.name: I don't care how sunny it looks right now. Trust me. It's going to pour soon.

0831180509005148--.name: I'm soooo achy. My whole body hurts. I wish I had something to soothe my muscles. Hint, hint, hint...

0831180509005149--.name: Heh heh, if you want to see your fortune, you'd better have some money.

0831180509005150--.name: Eeeeeh! Aaaaaah! Mushroom god, swine god, slime god, hear me! Daaaaance!

0831180509005151--.name: Oooh, I see it! I see it! $OwnerName$'s future!

0831180509005152--.name: Your future holds incredible luck! You will succeed in every enchanting attempt, find amazing items in dungeons, and pick up ten billion mesos that other people dropped on the ground!!

0831180509005153--.name: Hey, if it turns out not to be true, don't blame me. I'm only relaying the vision the gods gave me, and sometimes, it's a little hazy...

0831180509005154--.name: Heh heh, if you want to see your fortune, you'd better have some money.

0831180509005155--.name: Eeeeeh! Aaaaaah! Mushroom god, swine god, slime god, hear me! Daaaaance!

0831180509005156--.name: Oooh, I see it! I see it! $OwnerName$'s future!

0831180509005157--.name: ...You will discover truth hidden in darkness... And protect the red maple leaf from the clutch of shadow...

0831180509005158--.name: ...You will save the last life of the cursed tribe... Umm... Hah hah, this isn't like my other fortunes. I must have eaten something funny when taking out the garbage last night.

0831180509005159--.name: Heh heh, if you want to see your fortune, you'd better have some money.

0831180509005160--.name: Eeeeeh! Aaaaaah! Mushroom god, swine god, slime god, hear me! Daaaaance!

0831180509005161--.name: Oooh, I see it! I see it! $OwnerName$'s future!

0831180509005162--.name: Wow, your luck is so bad today that if you were to fall backwards and hit the back of your head, you'd also break your nose somehow.

0831180509005163--.name: Tsk. On days like this, you shouldn't leave the house. Come on. Let's go watch TV together. I'll keep you safe.

0831180509005164--.name: Heh heh, if you want to see your fortune, you'd better have some money.

0831180509005165--.name: Eeeeeh! Aaaaaah! Mushroom god, swine god, slime god, hear me! Daaaaance!

0831180509005166--.name: Oooh, I see it! I see it! $OwnerName$'s future!

0831180509005167--.name:
The aura of romance floats in the west.
If you're single, you won't be for much longer.
If you're attached, your love will soon be tested.

0831180509005168--.name: Hah hah, well, good for you, $OwnerName$. Just don't overlook those who are dressed in brown. Heh heh.

0831180509005169--.name: Why are you harassing me? You're just like the rest, looking down on me because I'm a beggar.

0831180509005170--.name: I may beg for money in $map:02000051$, but I was a charming warrior in my day.

0831180509005171--.name: You don't believe me? You little rascal, I'm telling the truth! Even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ swooned over me.

0831180509005172--.name: This is why I hate getting old. People just start to think you're going senile. But without my generation, you wouldn't exist, you knucklehead.

0831180509005173--.name: Mm? What's this? A coupon I can use at $map:02000107$. Wow, is this really for me?

0831180509005174--.name: I knew you were good, deep down inside! How'd you know I wanted to look nice?

0831180509005175--.name: I would look so different right now if only... Ah... Never mind, just talking to myself. Hah hah.

0831180509005176--.name: Anyway, thank you for your kindness. Mushroom god, swine god, pour your blessings upon $OwnerName$.

0831180509005177--.name: Hey, you know where I can find some ancient tomes? I need to check something.

0831180509005178--.name: And don't you dare suggest $map:02000031$. I've already been there. Not only was the librarian completely unreasonable...

0831180509005179--.name: But I've already looked through every single book there. They didn't have the one I wanted.

0831180509005180--.name: I heard there's a magic library inside a forest... Heard of it? They just might have something that'll help me lift this curse...

0831180509005181--.name: What? Nothing. I just needed to check something. But if you don't know where it is, just forget the whole thing.

0831180509005182--.name: Grrr, that hag... One day, I'll make her... Aah! How long have you been standing there?

0831180509005183--.name: Hmph, why are you so interested in other people's business? Nothing is going on!

0831180509005184--.name: If you've got so much time on your hands, you should get out there and hunt some monsters. Hunt a lot, so you can feed me!

0831180509005185--.name: Or how'd you like to go to $map:02000051$ and beg with me? No, don't put on your boots. I was only kidding! Tsk.

0831180509005186--.name: Alms for the poor. Alms for the ugly. Take pity on an old man...

0831180509005190--.name: Such kindness! Thank you! Gods bless you! You are an angel from heaven!

0831180509005191--.name: Thank you, thank you! I'm taking this straight to spend at the $map:02000138$.

0831180509005192--.name: You heartless, no-good... So cold! I hope you get eliminated in the first round of $map:61000001$!

0831180509005193--.name: Y-y-y-you little...! Get out of my sight!

0831180509005194--.name: So rude! Beggars are people, too!!

0831180509005195--.name: Tsk. What is this world coming to? Pathetic.

0831180509005197--.name: Nice to meet you. I'd like some tea, please.

0831180509005199--.name: For the mushroom so loved the world...

0831180509005200--.name: Hmph, you knucklehead! What took you so long?

0831180509005201--.name: Welcome home. Now get over here and rub my feet.

0831180509005202--.name: Do I have a bug in my ear?

0831180509005203--.name: Right now, is it... today? Or is it tomorrow?

0831180509005209--.name: My knees are killing me. Is it going to rain?

0831180509005211--.name: Now, where should I go today?

0831180509005212--.name: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?

0831180509005213--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005214--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005217--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005218--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005220--.name: Welcome! ...Ah. I thought you were a customer. Hah hah.

0831180509005221--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005222--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005224--.name: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?

0831180509005225--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005226--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005228--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005230--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005231--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005233--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005234--.name: Welcome! ...Ah. I thought you were a customer. Hah hah.

0831180509005235--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005236--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005238--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005239--.name: Huh? Do you want to give me my paycheck? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509005240--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509005242--.name: My wallet has felt heavier lately because you always pay me early. Thanks for hiring me for another month! Hah hah!

0831180509005243--.name: Haha, thanks, $OwnerName$. I'm grateful to have a kind, competent boss like you.

0831180509005244--.name: Haha, I told you: money comes and money goes. Thank you. I'll try to minimize the number of customers who come to the house, but I mean, it can't be helped sometimes.

0831180509005245--.name: What? How'd you get so much money so quickly? $OwnerName$, this is serious. You gotta tell me how! Please!

0831180509005246--.name: $OwnerName$, is everything all right? Our contract expires soon and you haven't mentioned it, so I was just wondering.

0831180509005247--.name: But if you're not worried, I won't worry either.

0831180509005248--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005249--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005251--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005253--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005254--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005256--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005257--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509005258--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005259--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005261--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005262--.name: Ah, I didn't know you were standing there.

0831180509005263--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005264--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005266--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005267--.name: Ah, my contract doesn't expire for some time. You don't have to stretch yourself thin. Besides, if you pay me in multiple paychecks, I have to record each one in my ledger. I'd rather just do it once, if it's all the same to you.

0831180509005268--.name: Haha, $OwnerName$, you've already paid me for the month. I'm ethical, see? You can trust me.

0831180509005269--.name: From experience, I can tell you: when money's tight, you have to cut down on spending. It's okay if you can't pay me right now. We can renew our contract at a later date. I've got my own business, so I'll be fine without this job.

0831180509005270--.name: Hm, this must be a bug. I may not look it, but I know a thing or two about programming. If you can replicate the problem, it's definitely a bug. Let's see if you can replicate it.

0831180509005272--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005273--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005275--.name: Mm... Is this because I keep inviting customers over?

0831180509005276--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005277--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005279--.name: This is not because I'm too talkative or too boring, is it?

0831180509005280--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005281--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005283--.name: I'm sorry, $OwnerName$, but I can't. Our contract expired, and business is business, you know?

0831180509005284--.name: Is that really important right now, $OwnerName$? Our contract expired, and I don't mix business with pleasure.

0831180509005285--.name: It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I've stopped working as your servant. I'm doing just fine, to be honest.

0831180509005286--.name: You don't have to worry about me.

0831180509005287--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005288--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005290--.name: Hm... I'd better behave for a while...

0831180509005291--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005292--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005294--.name: I will attempt to stop inviting customers into your home. That's the reason you won't renew our contract, isn't it? Or is there something else?

0831180509005295--.name: Hm, this unexpected financial blow is affecting my business. I'll have to think of a solution. Don't worry about me. This isn't the first time I've had a hiccup with money.

0831180509005296--.name: I have my own business, so I still have a means to live, even if I'm not paid for this side job. But $OwnerName$, you don't have a side job. Are you all right?

0831180509005297--.name: I've learned this little trick while working as a hawker.

0831180509005298--.name: Let me know if I can help you.

0831180509005299--.name: I'm just an ordinary hawker. That's all.

0831180509005300--.name: Hm... Business is slow today... Ah, nothing. Hah hah!

0831180509005301--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005302--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005304--.name: Hm... Business is slow today... Ah, nothing. Hah hah!

0831180509005305--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005306--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005308--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005309--.name: Taking care of this house sometimes make me want my own property.

0831180509005314--.name: I wonder everything's going at the Barrota Trading Company...

0831180509005319--.name: I need my business to be successful, you know.

0831180509005325--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005326--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005328--.name: Do you have business with me?

0831180509005329--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005330--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005332--.name: Ah, I didn't know you were standing there.

0831180509005333--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005334--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005336--.name: I want to ask you a serious question. It's about what just happened to $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.

0831180509005337--.name: I think Dark Wind is suspicious of members of the Barrota Trading Company.

0831180509005338--.name: So... $OwnerName$, what do you think of Dark Wind?

0831180509005339--.name: Dark Wind is essential for keeping the peace in $map:2000100$.

0831180509005340--.name: That whole organization is rather shady...

0831180509005341--.name: Hm... You think so? I guess our opinions differ. I suppose that's only human nature.

0831180509005342--.name: Does that mean you think it's okay for them to treat me the way they do? The injustice!

0831180509005343--.name: I knew I couldn't be the only one who thought so! There's definitely something strange going on.

0831180509005344--.name: Right?! But that organization is already so entrenched in $map:2000100$... Anyway, thank you. Now I'm even more confident in my opinion.

0831180509005345--.name: Lately, I've been thinking maybe I gossip too much.

0831180509005346--.name: But hearing all sorts of rumors comes with my job. And it's not like I can just forget what I hear.

0831180509005347--.name: Should I stop telling others what I hear? What are your thoughts on this?

0831180509005348--.name: You should be careful about what you say.

0831180509005350--.name: You don't? But I don't want something bad to happen to me, so I'm thinking maybe I should stop.

0831180509005351--.name: You don't care. So that means you don't care if I tell others about you, right, $OwnerName$? I see what you do when you think I'm not looking...

0831180509005352--.name: I should, right? Thank you for being honest with me. I'll be more careful from now on.

0831180509005353--.name: But you like listening to me gossip, don't you, $OwnerName$? Still, I'm glad I asked.

0831180509005354--.name: Ahhh... Things haven't been so hot with the Barrota Trading Company.

0831180509005355--.name: We're Maple World's largest and most reputable group of traders! How did it come to this...?

0831180509005356--.name: I don't know how they knew where to find me, but a Dark Wind agent stopped by the house a while ago.

0831180509005357--.name: I swear to you, I've never done anything unethical as a hawker. Not once! Maybe a bit of gossip, but nothing even close to illegal.

0831180509005358--.name: He may be a Dark Wind agent, but that doesn't give him the right to treat me the way he did, accusing me of all sorts of horrible things, asking me all sorts of mean questions. I feel violated!

0831180509005359--.name: While taking care of your home, I've located many items that you don't use.

0831180509005360--.name: For example, this exercise equipment. Only used once or twice, am I correct?

0831180509005361--.name: $OwnerName$, with your permission, I'd like to sell these items. You get the benefit of less clutter, and I get the benefit of a cut of the profits. Win-win, all around, wouldn't you say?

0831180509005362--.name: I hung a banner over the door today, and a lot of people stopped by the house to shop.

0831180509005363--.name: I had no idea having a physical shop could be so convenient!

0831180509005364--.name: Ah, o-of course, $OwnerName$, this is your house, but I get bored sitting around, waiting for you.

0831180509005365--.name: So I was thinking... You don't mind if I do my business in your house from time to time, do you?

0831180509005366--.name: Okay, so you know $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ in $map:02000001$? He's a trusted subject of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.

0831180509005367--.name: He has a daughter, $npcName:11000058[gender:1]$. She lives in her father's mansion in $map:02000119$.

0831180509005368--.name: But rumor has it that the minister had another daughter...

0831180509005369--.name: No, not a lovechild. Sheesh, what are you talking about? $npcName:11000058[gender:1]$ had a twin sister, and she disappeared all of a sudden.

0831180509005370--.name: It happened a long time ago, so no one knows if her sister is alive or dead. Tragic, isn't it?

0831180509005371--.name: This is kind insane, but $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ in $map:02000100$ has a big secret.

0831180509005372--.name: Who? Really? You've never heard of Goldus Group?

0831180509005373--.name: Goldus Group partakes in all sorts of businesses—real estate, banking, pharmaceutical, to name a few.

0831180509005374--.name: And its chairman is—hm, I don't know if I should tell you this.

0831180509005376--.name: Ugh, no, I can't. If this gets out, the Barrota Trading Company can get in huge trouble.

0831180509005377--.name: Hawkers travel everywhere in Maple World. Some of us have even recently dared to enter the Shadow World.

0831180509005378--.name: Rumor has it that a hawker named $npcName:11000609[gender:0]$ returned from that shadowy realm, looking like he'd seen a ghost.

0831180509005379--.name: He was lucky. Blackstar protects merchants. I'd be surprised if a normal person made it back from that world.

0831180509005380--.name: $OwnerName$, don't you dare even think of going there. Stop it. Stop. I know you're already thinking about it...

0831180509005381--.name: They say Maple World is in shambles because of the actions of one young, harmless-looking man named... Um... What was his name?

0831180509005382--.name: Whatever. Dark Wind is searching everywhere for him.

0831180509005383--.name: I saw his wanted poster in $map:02000100$. He has blond hair, red eyes, and a scar on his face.

0831180509005384--.name: $OwnerName$, if you see anyone looking like him, you should report him to Dark Wind. That way you can collect the bounty and share it with me.

0831180509005385--.name: I have my reasons for being a hawker. Money is one of them, sure. I mean, we all need money, right?

0831180509005386--.name: But that's not the only reason. It might be hard for residents of big cities like $map:02000001$ to imagine, but some folks really do live far, far away from civilization.

0831180509005387--.name: And those people need me to get things for them. They count the days until my next visit and watch me approach with excitement in their eyes.

0831180509005388--.name: It's not easy traveling over rough terrain, weighed down with a backpack of cargo...

0831180509005389--.name: But I truly love it. Selling valued items, delivering news... I get so caught up in all of it that I lose track of time.

0831180509005390--.name: The Barrota Trading Company is Maple World's hawker union. We've got hundreds of members, hawking all over the world.

0831180509005391--.name: We don't just sell items. People also rely on us to deliver the latest news.

0831180509005392--.name: Think of it this way: If this world were a body, we'd be the blood vessels spreading life throughout it! Haha!

0831180509005393--.name: Well, we're in a tight spot right now, but it's got to be some sort of misunderstanding. I couldn't imagine Maple World without hawkers.

0831180509005395--.name: Long ago, we first met in $map:63000001$. You were looking for a trip to get to $map:02000062$  for the Empress's event, remember?

0831180509005396--.name: It's okay if you don't remember. I've got a good enough memory for the both of us. In fact, the whole trading company knows about my superb memory.

0831180509005397--.name: Back then, I was so excited about the Empress's little shindig... Who would've thought we'd end up living in the same house? The future is full of secrets, isn't it?

0831180509005398--.name: I've never really given serious thought to settling down. What can I say? I just love being a hawker.

0831180509005399--.name: Now, $npcName:11000170[gender:0]$, on the other hand, he found himself a lady while selling his wares. Says he's ready to settle down. He just has to work up the courage to talk to the girl.

0831180509005400--.name: It's made me think. I don't know, maybe someday I want to settle down, too... Have a family, all that...

0831180509005401--.name: But not yet. First, I want to hustle and build up an amazing reputation as a hawker!

0831180509005402--.name: Welcome! Is there something you're looking for?

0831180509005405--.name: I thought this was a house, not a store.

0831180509005406--.name: Oh. Right. Nobody actually says that. I don't actually have my wares on me right now, you see... Heh... Heh...

0831180509005407--.name: I would love too, but all my items are completely sold out for the day? Where do you live? I'll carry all my goods to you later this week for your own personal shopping experience.

0831180509005408--.name: Oh, come on, doesn't cost anything to take a look!

0831180509005409--.name: Hm... Then why are you here?

0831180509005410--.name: Oh, too bad... You see, I'm offering a 90% discount for anyone who visits here to see me. You sure you're not here for me?

0831180509005411--.name: Yeah? Then why didn't you knock before barging in?

0831180509005413--.name: It must be an act of providence that we've met again.

0831180509005414--.name: Welcome! Feel free to take a look around.

0831180509005415--.name: Get your high quality yet affordable products here!

0831180509005417--.name: Business was a little slow today.

0831180509005419--.name: Well, everything will work out somehow.

0831180509005421--.name: Shoot! I gave him the wrong change.

0831180509005428--.name: You're back. What do you need?

0831180509005429--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005430--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005432--.name: What can I do for you this time?

0831180509005433--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005434--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005436--.name: What is it? Do you need help?

0831180509005437--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005438--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005440--.name: You're back. What do you need?

0831180509005441--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005442--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005444--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005445--.name: What can I do for you this time?

0831180509005446--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005447--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005449--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005450--.name: What is it? Do you need help?

0831180509005451--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005452--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005454--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005455--.name: Are you going to pay me? (Wage: $MaidSalary$ — Extends Contract Through: $MaidExtendDate$)

0831180509005456--.name: Let me think about it some more.

0831180509005458--.name: Oh, you're paying me ahead of schedule. I appreciate it. Do humans label this type of behavior diligent or impatient?

0831180509005459--.name: Most currencies are shiny, and fairies love shiny things. Maybe that's why I'm in such a good mood.

0831180509005460--.name: A-ha, has our contract been renewed? Good timing. I had just gotten adequate rest. Thank you for hiring me again.

0831180509005461--.name: Ah, is it time for me to play house again? Good, I was getting bored. Humans call fairies fickle, but I think humans are far worse. What do you think?

0831180509005462--.name: Our contract will expire in a few days. Did you know that? Of course, $OwnerName$, you know your schedule better than I do, but I thought I'd give you a reminder.

0831180509005463--.name: By the way, I appreciate your checking my profile.

0831180509005464--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005465--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005467--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005468--.name: Was there something else you wanted?

0831180509005469--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005470--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005472--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005473--.name: What can I do for you this time?

0831180509005474--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005475--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005477--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005479--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005480--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005482--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005483--.name: Ahem! I may have a longer lifespan than you, but each minute of my time is just as valuable. What I mean is, $OwnerName$, if you'd checked your wallet before beginning this discussion, we could've both been doing something more productive.

0831180509005484--.name: Hmm? What day is it? If memory serves, we have at least a month left on our current contract. Would you like to go verify that information?

0831180509005485--.name: Ahem! I may have a longer lifespan than you, but each minute of my time is just as valuable. What I mean is, $OwnerName$, if you'd checked your wallet before beginning this discussion, we could've both been doing something more productive.

0831180509005486--.name: How strange! I read the Helping Hands handbook thoroughly, but there were no guidelines for situations like this. Maybe you should try again. If this problem persists, we need to document it.

0831180509005487--.name: I'll consider this time off as... a vacation?

0831180509005488--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005489--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005491--.name: Hm, what a strange point of view! Huh? Oh, I'm referring to the author of this book.

0831180509005492--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005493--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005495--.name: Hm... I can't believe this theory... Oh, sorry. Did you call me?

0831180509005496--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005497--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005499--.name: Sorry. Nope. I can't. My contract expired.

0831180509005500--.name: Wait, we shouldn't talk about that right now. Did you know our contract expired? And I'm not only bringing that up to avoid talking to you.

0831180509005501--.name: Huh? You and your obsession with my profile. I told you, this profile cannot capture even a 0.0000000000...0001 of who I am.

0831180509005502--.name: Ah... Let's not talk about this anymore. I don't want to argue.

0831180509005503--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005504--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005506--.name: I'd like to focus on what I'm reading. Please don't disturb me unless it's important.

0831180509005507--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005508--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005510--.name: I've seen many humans try to change their destinies. Most drive themselves to ruin, blaming anyone but themselves on the way. No, no, I'm not calling you irresponsible, $OwnerName$.

0831180509005511--.name: I'm trying to encourage to take control of your life and choices. You have such a short, short life, but it's still full of choices.

0831180509005512--.name: Why are you asking me about the contract renewal? If you want to do it, then do it. If not, don't. You are in control of that, because you're the one with the money.

0831180509005513--.name: I remember how shocked I was when I first learned about Helping Hands. I couldn't believe someone came up with such a one-sided, unreasonable system.

0831180509005514--.name: Why am I here despite my abhorrence of the system? Foremost, because I've met a human to whom I can relate and am interested in knowing. But initially, it was purely out of curiosity.

0831180509005515--.name: Are you wondering if the human I'm referring to is you? No comment. The point is, the time I spend here is only a fraction of my lifespan, so you can do whatever you want, $OwnerName$.

0831180509005516--.name: Fairies have this impression that humans are high maintenence. It wasn't until after I started working here—no actually, it wasn't until after our contract expired and I was forced to rest—that I realized how true that is.

0831180509005518--.name: Just tell me what you need, and I'll do the best I can.

0831180509005519--.name: My profile won't reveal how I've lived my life...

0831180509005520--.name: Curious about my past? But that has nothing to do with my job.

0831180509005521--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005522--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005524--.name: Curious about my past? But that has nothing to do with my job.

0831180509005525--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005526--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005528--.name: Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

0831180509005529--.name: You want to talk to me. Sure, what do you want to talk about?

0831180509005534--.name: I've been around a long time, $OwnerName$. Maybe my experience can help.

0831180509005539--.name: We can talk, but don't ask anything too personal.

0831180509005544--.name: Was there something else you wanted?

0831180509005545--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005546--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005548--.name: What can I do for you this time?

0831180509005549--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005550--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005553--.name: I need you to craft something.

0831180509005554--.name: I want to check your profile.

0831180509005556--.name: "Why do fairies live so much longer than humans," hmm? An excellent question. The secret to our longevity isn't quite what popular opinion would lead you to believe.

0831180509005557--.name: Most believe our ability to commune with nature grants us a regenerative ability that slows aging.

0831180509005558--.name: That's not quite right. The answer is actually because we are embodiments of nature herself. We live long lives the same way trees live for millennia and turtles live for centuries.

0831180509005559--.name: As for why humans can't, it's simple. You refuse to submit to nature. You've decided to change your destinies. And that's why you and I have drastically different natural lifespans.

0831180509005563--.name: Just because you don't understand it doesn't make it untrue... Now you've upset me.

0831180509005564--.name: I didn't expect you to fully understand, but I didn't expect you to react quite like this, $OwnerName$.

0831180509005565--.name: Oh, you understood all that? Your comprehension skills are better than I estimated. I think I can come to enjoy conversing with you.

0831180509005566--.name: If you have other questions, you may ask them, but try to space it out, okay?

0831180509005567--.name: $OwnerName$, why don't you ask yourself a question. For example, whether humans did the right thing in rejecting nature? That's rather philosophical, don't you think?

0831180509005568--.name: Ah, look at the time! I talked for longer than I thought. Well, that's because I enjoyed our conversation.

0831180509005569--.name: Why is the sea such a pretty blue? Are you looking for the scientific answer or the poetic one? I can't speak to why you think blue is pretty, so I'll answer the scientific question instead.

0831180509005570--.name: When light hits the sea, all light waves except the one that our eye interpret as the color blue is absorbed into the water. Do you understand? Similarly, red roses only reflect the red ray, which is why they look red.

0831180509005571--.name: Do you really believe that? Truly?

0831180509005573--.name: Then what is your opinion, $OwnerName$? Debate begins with a difference of opinion, and they often result in enlightenment and shifts in perspective.

0831180509005574--.name: So... you think the sea is blue because fairies painted it blue? Do you... really believe that? Well, let's not talk about it, then. I don't wish to argue.

0831180509005575--.name: Interesting. It's a pretty simple and well-known scientific fact, but you disagree. Well, what's your theory, $OwnerName$?

0831180509005576--.name: You don't know? But how can you disagree if you don't have your own idea of what the answer is? This conversation is nonsense.

0831180509005577--.name: What I just explained is the most well-accepted theory, but explaining nature with science can be harsh on your spirit and soul. Truth be told, I have a different idea.

0831180509005578--.name: In my heart, I believe that the sea is blue because it saw that the sky was beautiful and wanted to emulate it. Or because it's a mirror to the sky's own beauty. Or maybe, the sky touched the sea once, staining it forever...

0831180509005579--.name: I know that such theories aren't science. But still, they bring me joy. I hope you'll remember that, $OwnerName$.

0831180509005580--.name: Scientific facts are not based on belief. They're facts. Absolute. But I like that you asked that question. It shows you don't want to see the world through the lens of pure fact.

0831180509005581--.name: That type of mental flexibility will help you grow as a person, $OwnerName$. Trust me. I have an eye for that kind of stuff.

0831180509005582--.name: You have another question? Am I your walking encyclopedia? I'm sorry, but I'm in the middle of something. Maybe next time.

0831180509005583--.name: I'm sorry, but I don't have time to answer a question right now. As you can clearly see, I'm very busy. This isn't because I don't know the answer...

0831180509005584--.name: This is a story from so long ago that even history doesn't known when it happened. It's from a time when fairies could speak to the stars, wind, and moon. I wasn't there personally. This is a tale known to all fairies who love reading.

0831180509005585--.name:
It is about a male fairy, his sister, and an evil witch. 
<font color="#909090">(He goes on and on, summarizing the story from a historian's perspective.)</font>

0831180509005586--.name: <font color="#909090">(He goes into a lot of boring details and even the exciting moments are dragged down by his unnecessary analyses.)</font>

0831180509005587--.name: And thus, the brother and sister concluded their adventure. Did you enjoy the tale? You're an excellent listener. I enjoyed relaying the story to you.

0831180509005588--.name: This time, I will share something I experienced firsthand. I've seen quite a lot in my not-so-short life, and I'm sure you'd enjoy some of my extraordinary tales.

0831180509005589--.name: When I was young and curious, I traveled to many locales, even though I don't much care for traveling. This tale takes us to a remove village in the far south, whose name I can no longer remember.

0831180509005590--.name: There was a big tree in the center of the village, which the villagers consulted for important events...

0831180509005591--.name: <font color="#909090">(He goes into a lot of boring details and even the exciting moments are dragged down by his unnecessary analyses.)</font>

0831180509005592--.name: In the end, I left that village to return home, but I still wonder sometimes... what was that tree? Was it really holy?

0831180509005593--.name: I experienced that personally, and I guarantee everything I said is 100% truth. Well, I may have exaggerated a little, but doesn't that just make it 120% truth?

0831180509005594--.name: I can't right now. I just can't. Not even for you, $OwnerName$. You understand, don't you?
